204a6: pa dang por bcom ldan gsungs// de nas yi ge hUM gi bzlas pa'i don gyi bshad pa'i rgyud ni/ myur du thams cad rjes chags pas// dngos grub thams cad rjes su chags// rjes su chags par byed mchog ni/ snying po'i bzlas
204a7: pa'i don yin no// de nas rdo rje sems rgyud ni// glu rnams ci ltar khro bo ni// bsdus nas kun tu 'jug pa na// rdo rje thog ni brtan 'gyur pa// de bzhin rdo rje 'dus pa'o// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung ba shes pa'i rgyud ni/ tham
204a8: cad bdag nyid sems dpa'i ni// bdag gi bdag nyid la yang gnas/ rdo rje sems dpa' dngas su ni// myur du thams cad la yang zhugs// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba shes pa'i rgyud ni// 'dod la chags ba dga' //

204b1: de las sdig pa sdig las sdug/ sdug las ting 'dzin shin tu brtan// rdo rje nyid las sangs rgyas 'byung // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa 'byung ba shes pa'i rgyud ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs de nyid//
204b2: de nyid rdo rje'i rigs chen po// de nyid pad ma'i rigs dag pa// de nyid nor bu'i rigs mchog bshad// de nas mngon par byang chub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni// rang sems so sor rtogs pa ni// byang chub sems ni yang dag 'byung // rdo rje
204b3: nyid phyir sangs rgyas nyid// bdag nyid sangs rgyas rab tu bsgom// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud nyid du shes pa'i rgyud ni// rang sems nyid ni bdud nyid te// sems nyid de bzhin gshegs pa yin// rang gi sems ni 'dul ba'i phyir/
204b4: sangs rgyas bdud nyid du ni 'byung // de nas rtog pa thams cad bsgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni// rtog pa kun la grub bya gang // rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu yin// rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis// de dag thams cad bsgrub par bya// de nas dang
204b5: po'i snying po bsgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ bzlas pa'i don shes nus pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgrub ste// ji srid 'dod pa'i bzlas pa mchog/ dngos grub chen po'i bde ba ster// de nas snying po dang / phyag rgya dang
204b6: sngags dang / rig pa shes pa bsgrub pa'i rgyud ni// sems dpa' gang gi snying po dang / phyag rgya sngags dang rig pa dang / bzlas pa'i don du sems dpa' che// bdag nyid dam ni bsgrub bya ba/ de nas dngos grub shes pa'i
204b7: rgyud ni/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub che// de bzhin de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' nyid// las kun mchog gi dngos grub phyir// de nas bsod nams med pa nas kyi sa rtsu pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/
204b8: ci 'dod 'khor lo bris nas ni/ ci 'ang rung ba 'am thal bas kyang // sems dpa' chen po bzhag nas ni// nyin zhag bzhir ni bsgrub par bya// de nas slob dpon nyid kyi grub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ bde ba chen po rdo rje yis

205a1: gsang mchag dam tshig grong khyer pa/ pi bzhin rang bzhin rang nyid ra bzhugs te// bdud ci'i chu yis dbang bskur bya// de nas me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa 'bul ba'i shes pa'i rgyud ni rdo rje can la mchod pa kun/
205a2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la dkar// rdo rje bdag nyid nag po ste// dmar po pad ma nor buser// de nas dbul ba'i shes pa'i rgyud ni// rdzogs pa'am ni mtshang ba// yang na ci ltar brnyed pa ni// rdo rje gar sogs mchod pa yis/
205a3: rtag tu thams cad grub par 'gyur// de nas dus kyi mchod pa shes pa'i rgyud ni// drug ldan la sogs snyan pa'i glu// glu ni thams cad ci 'dod pas// rdo rje 'byed ma la sogs 'grol// mchod pa dag ni rab du bya// de nas gas kyi
205a4: mchod pa shes pa'i rgyud ni// rdo rje gar bcas mchod pa ni// go rims ci lta ba bzhin du// bzlas pa'i don gyi ma brjod kyang // mchog gi sgrub pa 'grub par 'gyur// de nas sdig pa chen po byed pa'ang shes pa'i rgyud ni// dkyil
205a5: 'khor la ni ma zhugs kyang // tshul khrims 'chal pa la sogs kyi/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi ni// sdig pa kun las 'grol bar 'gyur// de nas dngos grub mi thob pa'i rgyud shes pa'i rgyur ni/ chags pa smad par mi bya
205a6: ste// rnam dag de bzhin bde ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyang chags pa che// 'di ma dag pas 'grub mi 'gyur// de nas mchog gi dngos grub shes pa'i rgyud ni// ci bzhin yul dang ldan gyur nas/ mchog gi dngos grub
205a7: bsgrub par bya// rtog pa kun la rnal 'byor 'di// tshe 'di nyid la sgrub par byed// bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i rdo rje rin po che chen po las rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma'i cho ga rgyas pa'o//
205a8: de nas bcom ldan 'das rtog pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i rdo rje rin po che de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cho ga gzigs pa'i

205b1: y e shes kyi dbang phyug gi rdo rje'i pad ma de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i mdzad pas 'phrin las dam pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rdo rje thams cad la khyab pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i rdo rje'i khams brtan
205b2: p a'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par chos kyi dbyings spro ba thams cad khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'khor lo mngon par mkhyen par mdzad nas dang po'i snying po'i gsang
205b3: ba'i de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// ci srid 'khor ba'i gnas la zhugs// de srid sems can don par mdzad// mya ngan 'das bzhugs gzi brjid can/ sems can dod ni nus pa mir// de phyir
205b4: sems dpa' dam pa rnams// 'khor ba srid du 'khor bar bzhugs// sems can don ni mngon par bzhed// thams cad dag pa'i mchog chos can// de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'dul bas// sems can don mi mdzad/
205b5: bste// 'dir ni rab grub dngos grub mchog/ dus kun du ni thams cad du// rdo rje 'chang chen la sogs pa// ci ltar bsod nams rnam smin gyis// kun la mthong ba la sogs kyis// rang gi las kyi mdzad mi sbyong // dkyil
205b6: 'khor la ni ma zhugs kyang / srid pa 'di la skur grub 'gyur// shin tu mthong ba la sogs kyis// sems can thams cad rab skul mdzad// kun nas dus kun thams cad la// dngos grub thams cad rab stsol 'gyur/
205b7: rgyal po rdo rje 'chang chen po// srid pa'i dbang phyug kun gyi gtso// de phyir bsgrub bya 'di bshad bya// dngos grub shin tu brtag pa'o// gang gis srid pa 'di nyid du// shin tu rtag pa'i dngos grub thob// lugs ma 'aman
205b8: brdungs pa'am// ri mor bris pa 'am 'dus byas pa'i// phyag na rdo rje'i sku gzugs ni/ ci bzhin bshad par rab bzhug bya'o// bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi de kho na nyid bsgrub pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o//

206a1: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi slar yang phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// nyin re snga rol dus ci bzhin// dang po'i
206a2: bde ba chen// 'dis ni rtag pa thams cad la// phyag rgya thams cad mdor bsdus pas// dam tshig yang dag bcings nas grub// phyi nas ma bsgrubs grub par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje chos kyi de kho
206a3: nanyid kyi gsang ba'i sngags sgrub pa 'di gsungs so// langs pa'am ni 'dug pa'am// gang dang der ni gnas pa 'am// thams cad rjes chags rnal 'byor gyis// dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// de nas
206a4: bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// gsang ba'i gar mchog mchod pa 'am// yang na mchod pa ci bde bar/ byas te mgon po bsgrub byas na// mchog gi dngos grub myur
206a5: du thob// de nas rang gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid bsgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag ste// rang gi snying pos lan cig bsgrub// brtan zhing shin tu dgyes kun chags// shin tu dgyes gyur bdag po grub//
206a6: de nas yi ge hUM gis glu blang ba'i grub pa'i rgyud ni/ ri b+hi nga stsogs rgyan dang ldan// ci nus pa dang ci 'dod pa// dri za dang po blangs nas ni// yi ge hU~M gis grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen po dang /
206a7: po'i rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so// de kho na nyid chen po'i gsang ba'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i rgyud do// de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi las kyi phyag rgya bshad par bya'o// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das thog mang
206a8: tha ma med pa'i 'phrin las can rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// shin tu ring ba'i tshe 'phel ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje chos so// shin tu gzhon pa'i ni tshong 'phel ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bcud kyis len gyis so// gzugs

206b1: chen po dang gzi brjid chen po 'phel ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gzugs kyis gzi brjid kyis so// 'du byed chen pos thams cad 'phel ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje 'du byed chen pos so// sems can thams cad kyi bdag nyid thams cad bsrung
206b2: bani bde ba chen po rdo rje gsung bas so// phyogs thams cad dang mtshams dang dkyil 'khor bcing ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje bskor ba ste/ thams cad rdo rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid khro bo'i rgyal po chen po rdo rjes kyang 'jug par mi nus
206b3: shing mi phyed par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad bsrung ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pas so// bdag nyid kyi dngos grub thams cad dam gzhan dag rdo rjer byed pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje go chas so// 'thab mo tham
206b4: cad las rnam par rgyal ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung rgyan gyis so// 'thab mo srung ba ni bde ba chen po'i gzhan gyis mi thub pas so// gzhan gyis dpung thams cad gzhig pa ni rdo rje bde ba
206b5: chen po'i rdo rje 'dzin par byed pas so// gzhan gyi dpung nyams pa dang ldang ba dang ltung ba dang gsod pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje baglog bskor bas so// rims thams cad la sogs pa'i nad thams cad dang nad chen po
206b6: zhi ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje 'phrog pas so// dug thams cad gzhig pa dang drug med par bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje phyag rgya'i las kyis so// gdon thams cad las dgrol ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i 'byung po bskrad pas/
206b7: ma mo dang mkha' 'gro ma dang gdon thams cad dgrol ba bde ba chen po dang gzhom pa dang snying gzhan dbyung ba dang shi bi gso ba dang tshe 'phel ba de/ shin tu bsrung ba rnams ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje phyag rgya'i lan gyis so//
206b8: thams cad dbab pa dang g.yo ba dang 'ching ba dang gar byed du bzhug pa dang glu len du gzhug pa dang snga ma 'byung ba so sor brtan pa dang rmad du 'byung ba dang cho 'phrul bstan pa dang bde ba thams cad la thams cad slar

207a1: gzhug pa dang dgrol ba dang bsrung ba dang sos su bcug pa rnams ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dbab pas so// rtsub dang sirgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad la yid kyis 'dod pa'i bra dbab pa thams cad grub pa ni bde bachen
207a2: po rdo rje bra dbab pas so// rang gi lus dang ngag dang yid rdo rjes mthong ba dang thos pa dang sgru ba dang ston pa'i shes pa grub pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsgoms pas so// thams cad las 'das pa dang ma 'angs pa dang dag
207a3: byung ba thams cad bka' mthong ba'i yi ge sna tshogs pa 'am/ dngos po thams cad kyis rna ba'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje thams cad mkhyen pas so// glog dang char ba dang thog dbab pa thams cad
207a4: bzlog pa dang / sprin gzhig pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje khro bo'i lta bas so// sa'i 'og thams cad las sngar ma byung ba'i 'bru la sogs pa'i 'bras bu 'byung ba dang / nye bar len pa dang chu med pa'i gnas las chu'i dngos po 'byung
207a5: b a dang nye bar len pa dang mun pa chen por snang ba chen po bskyed pa dang nye bar len pa dang rlung thams cad la bka' bsgo ba dang nye bar len pa dang nam mkha' thams cad las yid kyi 'dod pa'i dngos po thams cad mthong ba dang nye bar
207a6: len pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas so// thams cad gzhom pa dang rengs pa dang dral ba dang rmugs pa dang gnyid log par bya ba dang rgyas gdab pa dang lhung ba dang rmongs pa dang gsad pa dang phyir ldog pa
207a7: ni bde ba chen po'i gdug pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyas so// thams cad rjes su chags pa dang dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang dbab pa dang bcing ba dang dkrol ba dang dral ba dang ltung ba dang lhung ba bslang ba dang 'dren pa dang bran du byed pa dang
207a8: mngag gzhug bka' bsgo ba byed pa dang thams cad tshur drang ba dang phar btang ba dang gsad pa dang slar gso ba la sogs pa'i las thams cad byed pa dang dbang du byed pa'i sgrub pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje'i thams cad sgrub pas so// rigs

207b1: thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub la sog pa'i mchog gi dngos grub thams cad dang / mchog gi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang thams cad rjes su chags pa la sogs pa'i bde ba dang /
207b2: yid bde ba thams cad rab tu gzhug pa dang / mchod pa chen po thams cad la sogs pa'i las thams cad myur du grub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje mchog gi dngos grub gyis so// de la bde chen po'i rdo rje gas
207b3: ba'i dam tshig gi dang po'i mchog gi dam tshig las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni 'di yin te/ bde ba chen po'i rdo rje ni rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe ster ba'o// 'di'i las kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcing po'o// dbus ma'i rdo rje btung bar
207b4: bya// rtse mo'i 'od zer byas pas gdod pa yongs su sbyangs te gdong bar dgrol bar bya'o// bdag nyid la kun tu bskor nas snying kar dgrol bar bya'o// gtsug gtor dang phyogs thams cad dang dkyil 'khor bskor ba'o//
207b5: snying ka dang yid kyis rgyab dang phrag pa dang spyi bo dang dpral bar gzhag la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis phreng ba bcings la go cha ba ste/ mdud pa byas nas rdo rje'i gnas rnams su slar yang phreng ba byas pas rgyab tu mdud pa byas te dang
207b6: dbyangs bya'o// snying ga dang dpral ba dang mgrin pa dang spyi bor gzhag par bya'o// dbus ma'i dang mchog go// bya ba ba'i gyen du kha bltas pa'i dbug pa dang 'jig pa'i gdong gis lta ba'o// 'bar ba bzhi'i tshul gyis 'dod
207b7: shing khros pa'i rang gi snying gar bcings te zhi ba'i lta bas rtse mo 'phrog par bya'o// lta bas 'phrog par bya'o// dbab pas myur du 'grol bar bya'o// yongs su bskor nas dpral bar gzhag ste/ dbus ma'i rdo rje sor mo'i rtse
207b8: gnyis bskyod par byas na ci lta ba bzhin du las byed pa'i snying gar gzhag ste dbus ma rdo rje'i las ni 'di lta ste/ snying kar stod pa dang skyed pa dang 'ching ba dang gar byed du bcug pa dang mgrin pa bsal ba dang rdo rje rtse mo bcing ba

208a1: dang kha dbub pa dang mgrin pa bsal ba dang bcings pa myur du dkrol ba dang bsrung ba dang byab pa'i las so// snying ga la sbyor ba spyod pa'o// nyi ne re zhing snga rol du lan cig lus yongs su sbyang ba dang / mgrin pa
208a2: gsal ba'i ngag dang snying gar gzhag pa dang phyag rgya la lta ba ste nyin re snga rol tu lan cig dbang po thams cad la kun tu bskor bar bya'o// dbus ma rdo rjes byed pa ni khro bo'i rdo rje'i lta bas so// dbus ma'i rdo rje'i las ni 'og nas 'byung
208a3: ste nye bar longs spyod pa dang thams cad la dgug par byed pa dang dbab pa sbyin pa dang 'bar ba'i me stag byed pa dang nye bar len pa dang rlung gi tshul dang nam mkha' bsgom pa las du ma'o// dbus ma'i rdo rje'i lus ni phyag rgyas gzhom
208a4: pa dang rtse mo gnyis snying gar btsir ba dang sen mo brud pa dang mig 'degs pa dang btsum pa dang / sor mo mnyam pos snying kar bteg pa dang ltung ba dang spang bar byed pa dang phan tshun rdeg pa dang rang gi snying gar rang bzhin du gzhag pa'i
208a5: las so// dbus ma'i rdo rje las ni mda' stong pa dang lcags gnyis kyi dgug pa dang g.yon pa la g.yas pa bcug pa dang rtse mo bskyed pa dang gdu bur bcing ba dang myur du dgrol ba dang sor mo mnyam por myur du dral ba dang
208a6: ltung bar byed pa dang 'og nas bteg pa dang g.yon pa g.yas pas drang ba dang / las thams cad la sbyar bar byed pa dang 'og nas bskyod cing gyen du drang ba dang / tshur 'dren pa dang phar gtang ba dang / g.yon dang g.yas kyis drag po
208a7: b dag pa dang rang gi snying gar rtse mo 'dren pa dang las thams cad la nges par sbyor ba byed pa'i las dang snying gar 'khor lo gzhug pa dang dbang skur ba'i phreng ba dang ngar dbyangs 'ching bar byed pa dang snying ga las drangs te bde batshur
208a8: 'dren pa thams cad yongs su srung ba dang gar gyis blangs te spyi bor dgrol ba'i las so// bde ba chen por 'grub dang // chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir// don yod thogs med sna tshogs pa'i// phyag rgya'i rgyud ni rab tu bshad//

208b1: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yis// sangs rgyas sras bcas bdag nyid kun// sems can thams cad skur grub phyir// don yod dngos grub kun stsol ba'o// dkyil 'khor dag tu mazhugs pa// sdig pa'i las ni kun dang ldan// de dag
208b2: kyang ni sgrub 'gyur te// bcings pa tsam gyis sdig byang phyir// gang zhig le lo nyid kyis sam// brtson 'grus ldan yang ma tshang ba// dkyil 'khor med pa'i sems can gang // slob dpon nyid byin ma brlabs dang // de dag ga
208b3: mchog rdo rje che// rdo rje slob dpon nyid du 'gyur// don yod mchog dang sna tshogs pa'i// bcings pa tsam gyis myur grub byed// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i// mchog gi dngos grub kun la 'jug/ dang po 'byung ba'i
208b4: rdo rje mchog/ bde ba chen las yang dag 'byung // dag cing shin tu grub pa dang // 'gro ba thams cad la yang ngo // de nas phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud ni// las 'dod thog mar phyag rgya ni// skal pa ci bzhin
208b5: snying pos grub// rang gi bdag nyid nges sbyang bya// bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las// bde ba chen po thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig don yod pa'i dngos grub kyi mchog ces bya ba rgyud phye ma'i tshe
208b6: gargyas pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yongs su mthar thug pa med pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje thams cad kyi las kyi sbyor ba ni/ rdo rje 'chang de dang
208b7: bcas pa rnams kyis bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 'dis sems can gyi khams ma lus pa kun tu khyab cing spro ba dngos grub thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa/ srid pa thams cad kyi rtse mo
208b8: yongs su mthar mthug pa'i gsung rab yongs su mthar thug pa'i don du thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab pa yin no// rdo rje'i nam mkha' chen po yi// chos kyi dbyings ni spro ba

209a1: mchog/ rdo rje nam mkha' chen po yi// chos dbyings spro ba'i dngos grub ste// rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad ni// rdo rje 'chang chen bcas pa dang // rdo rje 'chang gi theg pa na// yongs su mthar thuganus pa min// e ma'o
209a2: mngon zhen sems can dang // le lo can dang las kun ldan// thugs rjedam pa'i rdo rje khyod// byang chub sems ni than med// bde ba chen po rab bsgrub dang // chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir// rtog pa 'di ni mthar thug pa// rab tu
209a3: slab phyir mthar thug brjod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gsan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rdo rje sems dpa' byin gyis
209a4: brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// bde ba chen por bsgrub dang // chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir// thams cad dngos grub don du ni// yongs su mthar thug byin brlabs pa'o///
209a5: gang gis tshul mchog 'di ni nyan 'gyur dang // gang gis khyim na gsang ba thams cad gnas// bde chen mchog gi rdo rje mchog gsang ba'i// dngos grub tshe 'dir de dag rnams la bstan// brtan pa nyid phyir 'dul ba dang mi
209a6: byed// sems can don du rgyal ba las dag phyir// rnam par sbyang bar mdzad pa 'di yin te// rtog pa 'di ni bgegs med bdud rnams med// dngos grub 'phel med min pa byin gyis brlabs// bdud dang brtan med nyid
209a7: ni bdag mi byed// brtan pa nyid phyir 'dul ba dang mi byed// rtog pa chen po'i mchog ni gang bsgrub pa// myur du dngos grub mchog phyin bdag brtan 'gyur// brtan zhing rab bgyis brtan pas rjes su chags// bde ba
209a8: chen po kun byed shin tu rgyas// da yi dang po'i snying po gang bsgrub pa// de lad ni rtag tu dngos grub ster// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

209b1: gsungs pa la mngon par stod do// bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po mchog tu grub 'i na gyis yos su rdzogs s+ho/// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje
209b2: 'di nyid slar yang ston par mdzad cing zhal rab tu 'dzum pa dang / mchog dang po'i rdo rje bde ba chen po rdo rje bsnyems pas gsor nas rang gi thugs kar stong pa'i tshul du 'dzin cing mchog tu gas pa zhing mchog tu grub pa
209b3: d on yod cing thogs pa med pa bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig 'di rtog pa thams cad kyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa dang bdud thams cad 'dul bar byin gyis brlab pa'i dbang gis ma grub pa rnams kyang mchog
209b4: dam pa grub par byed pa dang mchog tu gsang ba dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i mtshon cha mchog dang po zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po'i chen po rgyud phyi ma gsungs pa/ de nas thog ma'i gnas nyams
209b5: dga'// nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas// rin chen 'od mdzes rab tu gsal// dri ma med pa'i mdangs kyis brgyad// zung bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sgo khyud rnams kyis rab tu brgyan// kha khyer gyis ni yongs su bskor//
209b6: rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod// zla ba phyed ni rab tu gnas// rdo rje rin chen 'bar byed pa// rlung gis bskyod pa'i rtse mo mchog/ dar 'phan dril bu sgra sgrogs pa// drab me long tog me tog/ me tog chun po'i rgyan gyis bskor
209b7: bde ba chen po rdo rje che// rdo rje kun gyis legs sbyar ba// rdo rje sems dpa'i bzhugs gnas che// sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes brten pa// byang chub sems dpa'i gnas kyi mchog/ rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi gnas// bde ba
209b8: chen po'i rdo rje chen// rdo rje rin chen mchog bya ba'o// rdo rje 'chang chen bzhugs nas ni// bde ba chen po rnam par bzhugs// thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' de// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba chen// kun tu bzang po

210a1: kun ba ga nyid// rdo rje snyoms tshul bdag po'i ba ga/ sems can kun gyi sems gang na// bstan pa'i phyir na dpa' zhes bya// bstan par bzhag pas cang 'dzin te// nges pa las na rdo rjer gyur// sems
210a2: dpar byin brlabs sbyor ba yis// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// byang chub spyod pa'i rjes mthun pa// bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid// byang chub sangs rgyas de nyid do// rdo rje
210a3: drag po mthar byed nyid// phyag na rdo rje nyid kyang de// de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// de nyid rdo rje'i rigs chen po// de nyid pad ma'i rigs dag pa// de nyid nor bu'i rigs bzang bshad// de nyid 'dod chags bral ba
210a4: nyid// 'dod dang 'grol ba de nyid de// dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum ste// 'jig rten gsum mchog khams gsum pa// mi g.yo thams cad mchog de nyid// brtan pa sra ba nor chen po// rgyu ba sems kyi 'dus byas pa/
210a5: thams cad byed pa thams cad nyid// dang po'i sems dpa' sems dpa' che// byang chub sems dpa' bde rab stsol// sems dpa'i dkyil krung bcas nas ni// pad ma'i steng du bzhugs pa ni// btsun mo'i tshogs bcas sna
210a6: tshogs pa// rdo rje lha mos yongs su bskor// bde ba chen po grub don du// 'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir// ma lus 'dul bya'i don du ni// dngos grub thams cad rab grub phyir// dam tshig mchog ni ma lus pa// rgyal
210a7: bas kyang ni bsrung bar bya// snyems bcas rdo rje gsor ba dang // rdo rje snyems pa'i tshul 'chang zhing // phyag rgya kun myur grub mngon du// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog grub phyir// dngos grub kun gyi thabs chen po// bsod
210a8: nams kun gyis cher mthong ba// ye shes phyag rgya yang dag ldan// snying po chen po ma yin te// gang gis bsod nams mi ldan pa'am// de bzhin dkyil 'khor ma zhugs pa'ang // don yod thogs pa med mchog 'gyur/

210b1: dngos grub thams cad rnyed dka' yis// bde ba chen po rdo rje che// gsang ba mchog gi dam tshig brtan// dngos po thams cad bsgrub pa ster// rtog pa thams cad myur grub byed// thog mtha' med phyir dang por 'byung /
210b2: dang po nas byubang bshad// TIg zhan gyi na ci 'dod dang / chags pa kun gyis pa dga' bar// rjes sachags par bgyi bshes// bzhin 'bab pa'i lags 'phya// nye ba'i rkang po banas snang ba// bzhim
210b3: dang por bcom ldan gsungs// / de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas thams cad sras bcas pa// rdo rje 'dzin bcas sna tshogs pa// skad cig gis ni 'dus par 'gyur// rdo rje 'dzin chen gyis bog
210b4: sar// yud kyi 'jig rten gsum po 'byung // ci lAr 'gro ba rab grub ces// bad gshegs rnams kyis dngos grub dris// de rnams kyis ni bka' gas na nas// rdo rje 'dzin rang 'gro ba ni// 'byin dang rtsol dang ston pa po//
210b5: byang bas tshig ni 'di skad gsol// chags bral gyis 'dul 'jig rten rnams// chags bral nyid kyis dag par 'gyur// 'dod chags chen po bde ba chen// 'di ni ci ltar 'grub par 'gyur// de'i tshig de gsan nas mi/
210b6: rgyal ba rang nyid gyis gsungs pa// byang chub sems de thog ma'i lha// khyod ni thabs chen nyid yin no// ci srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ri// mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe// de srid mtshungs mang sems can don//
210b7: mya ngan mi'anga'abyed par nus// ci srid sems can rnam rtog pa// de srid byang chub srid pa che// byang chub sems tsam la pan phyir// rdo rje can gyis ci bder gyis// de nas thog pa dang dkyil 'khor// dang po'i dkyil 'kho
210b8: byin gyis brlabs// rdo rje kun gyis dam tshig mchog/ ci bzhin tshogs bsgrubs pa nyid// de nas bcom ldan 'das de ni/ bde ba chen po grub phyir dang // 'dod chags chen po nam dag phyir// gtso bos mgon ma

211a1: gsol ba btab// bcom ldan khyod la gsol ba ni// 'dod chags chen po bde ba chen// snying po 'di ni rtog pa mchog/ bde chen myur du grub byed pa'o// de rnams kyi ni bka' gsan nas// rdo rje sems dpa'
211a2: bde chen po// bde ba chen po rdo rje che// dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal to// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa de// bde ba chen po rdo rje mchog/ gsang ba dam pa zhes bshad pa'o// thog mar dam tshig
211a3: gsum thob pa'i// rdo rje slob dpon rang phyag rgyas// 'khor lo kun gyi cho ga la// rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang bya// rtog pa thams cad yang dag 'bebs// dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub byed yin// dam tshig che gsum zhes bya ba'i//
211a4: rgyan 'di thams cad sgrub byed yin// dngos grub cho ga thams cad dang // rdo rje dril bu rab bskul bas// cho ga lhag gam ma tshang yang // 'grub 'gyur smad par mi bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//
211a5: mchog gi dang po mtha' yas mchog/ bla na med cing mnyam med pa// nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas// mchog ste yi ge dam pa yin// dkyil 'khor gnas nas sbyang byas la// de yi dbus su cho ga bzhin// dngos grub
211a6: byin brlabs cho ga yis// dkyil 'khor der ni grub par bya// glu dang rol mo'i cho ga dang // me tog spos sogs mchod pa yis// ci snyed pa dang ci 'dod par// mchog dang por ni rtag par bya'o// mchog gi dang por mtha'
211a7: yas mchog/ bla na med cing bde med pa// nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas// grong khyer dag ni mi 'gyur mchog/ thog ma med mchog rtag pa ste// sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang rab tu bzhugs// kun mchog mnyam pa nyid
211a8: rten pas// lhag dang ma tshang med kun gang / mtha' dbus med nam mkha' ni// 'di ni dbu mar na ma tags pa// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// de'i dbus mar rnam rtag nyid// de'i dbus su pad ma'i gzugs/

211b1: yu bar bcas pa rab tu gzhag/ sna tshogs pad mas yang dag khebs// thams cad dag pa'i gdan de yin// de nas srid bunyis 'gyur du// byas pa'i theg ni gdab bya ste// nam mkha' kun gyi tshad yin phyir/
211b2: gdul bya'i blon mtha' yas pas// tshad ni tshad med pa nyid yin// mi mnyam med bzur bzhi pa// dran dang dbang po sgo bzhi ste// bsam gtan rnams kyis rta babs bzhi// ting 'dzin khyams su bshad pa yin//
211b3: khyams la rten pa'i rdo rje'i bdag/ gzugs rnams lha mos mchod pa'o// rgyan rnams kun gyis bkra ba ni// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o// gdul bas bskyod pa sna tshogs mchog/ dam chos mchog
211b4: ste kun tu 'gro// rlung gis bskyod pa sna tshogs pa'i// ba dan rtser btags dril sgra sgrogs// me long ye shes rtag me tog/ byang chub yan lag me tog phreng // dra ba me long me tog che// me tog phreng ba'i rgyan gyis
211b5: bskor// kun grub mi 'gyur bde ba ni// bde ba chen po zhes bshad do// bde ba chen po'i gzhal yas khang // dang po'i gnas su bri bar bya// thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog/ kun mchog de ni legs bris
211b6: nas// thog ma tha ma med pa'i dbyings// phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid du bsam// de ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor lo// de'i nang gi 'khor lo ni// dkyil 'khor brgyad pa lta bu yin// 'di ni rnam thar brgyad po ste// dngos grub
211b7: kun gyi bde bster// byang sems theg pa chen po yi// mdo sde'i 'khor lo rab bskur bas// rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor ba// rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag ze// der ni sna tshogs pad ma cher// rdo rje sems dpa
211b8: dgod par bya// lugs ma'am yang na brkos pa'am// byas pa 'am yang na bris pa ste// 'dzum bcas zla ba'i mdog can la// dmar zhing sna tshogs 'od 'bar ba// sangs kyis kun gyi dbang la sogs

212a1: rgyan dang na bza' sna tshogs pa// sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung dag gis bzhugs// rdo rje snyems tshul 'chang ba'i mchog/ su ra ta s+t+waM zhes brjod cing // rang snying pos kyang gzhag par bya// de'i phyogs ni
212a2: thams cad du// mtshan nam de bzhin phye ma yis// gor medag ni ci bzhin du// rdo rje la mo yang dag zi// rdo rje mtshan stod la brtson bya// rdo rje chags ma mdun du bri// lha mo rdo rje ral mo ni// rdo rje can la rab 'byud pa// d+ha
212a3: du rdo rje dran ma ni// chu srin rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bsnyems bris// de nas 'di rnams dgod pa'i phyag rgya ni// dza badz+ra draSh+Ti sa ya ke ma Ta hUM/ oM badz+ra kI li kA li hUM/ baM badz+ra
212a4: ni s+pha ra ra Ta ho badz+ra ka me shAr ta/ 'tshams su rdo rje sems dpa' stogs// dus kyi mchod pa yang dag bri// rdo rje lhung ci ma dang sprin// ston dang dbun ni rdo rje ma// me tog bdug pa mar me che// dri ste spyi bor thal sbyar ba// rdo rje rgyal
212a5: po'i lha mo ste// de nas phyag rgya rab bshad bya// oM ma d+hu badz+ra g+huM g+huM/ oM badz+ra me g+he gu lu gu lu/ oM sha rad badz+ri/ oM oM/ oM badz+ra she sha ri hUM hUM/ sgeg mo gzhad ma glu chen ma// gar mdzad ma yi lha mo'i tshogs// rdo rje rol mo 'di
212a6: dag ni// phyi rol gyi ni 'tshams su bya// har ti badz+ra bi la saM ni dza ha ter ti badz+ra na da ti pe ba be ba/ sgo yi gnas ni thams cad du// gsol ka ba ni bzhi po ste// rdo rje lcags kyu zhugs pa dang // sngags sgrog de bzhin dral ma yi/
212a7: badz+ra a~M gu sha dza badz+ra pA she hU~M/ badz+ra shang ga le gaM/ badz+ra gan d+ha ho/ dam tshig 'di ni thams cad kyis// dgongs shing brtag pa nyid du 'gyur// rdo rje lha mo la sogs chags// dngas grub kun la 'grub par 'gyur/
212a8: gsol ka ba dang gsog mo yi// gcom po nya bran pa'o// de nas kun mchog la sogs pa// mngon bris yang dag bsgrub par bya// dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas su// ma hUM ba hoHzhes brjod bya// sems

212b1: dpa'i dkyil dkrung bcas nas ni// rdo rje can gyi spyan sngar 'dug/ bde ba chen po rdo rje mchog/ bdag po lan cig yang dag dgug/ d+haM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa/ ya hi sha g+hu ma/ ma hA su kha badz+ra a mo g+ha ya/ a nu pA la ya/ tha
212b2: bud+d+ha su ra te ta ma nu rag to me b+ha ba/ sug to sh+tsa maM b+ha ba/ dri rlo me b+ha ba/ su bo Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ b+ha ga bAn nan di na sa twa/ sarba sid d+hi me pra ya/ cha e she ta ma tri sha a be sh+ya sa ma ye ra bdad+ha/ ba shI ki ra maM/ yi mar mu tra ba daM/
212b3: dza hUM bta/ 'di yis bcom ldan 'das par ni// dkyil 'khor du ni rang nyid gshegs// bkug cing bcug la shin tu brtan// dbang du gyur nas rab tu tha/ ces bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen pos gsungs so// rdo rje
212b4: slob dpon rang lta ni// 'od zer kun ni ston la sogs// mtshan ma rnam pa mang po ni// ngo mtshar gyur pa mthong bar 'gyur// de nas rdo rje mchod yon ni// rdo rje thal mo kha dbyes dbus// bum pa gang dang ci snyed pa'i//
212b5: me tog la sogs kyis kyang mchod// ba dan rtse mor dril btags pa// 'tshams kyi char ni bzhag par bya// bum pa spos chus gang ba la// rdo rjer bcas pas byin brlabs pa// lcug ma la ni yongs su bzlas// de la
212b6: bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi chur bsgrub pa ni 'di yin te// hUM ma hA pu kha badz+ra a mo g+ha sa mo yo da sad da a b+hi Shinya tsa/ sarba su kha so ma na s+tha nud da ku ru ku ru dza hUM ba ho// 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su
212b7: bzlas la/ bdag nyid la rdo rjes dbang bskur bar bya'o// bsang gtor bya ba dang / 'thungs pas kyang sdug bsngal thams cad gsal ba dang / bde ba chen po thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
212b8: dpas gsungs so// de nas 'khor lor mi zhugs kyang // rang nyid thog mar byung thugs shing // ngo kun gyi thob dpon che// rdo rje can gyis rang byin rdzog// de nas rdo rje dzin thob dpon// rang nyid khrus byas drib lags

213a1: blugs// ci snyed pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan// shin tu dmar ba'i gos bgo zhing // me tog phreng btags kha dris bsgo// rnam sgeg dga' ba'i rdo rje dang // rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis// spyi bor me tog thal sbyar nas// gnas
213a2: de mgon la phyag bya'o// zhugs nas dkyil 'khor de la ni// bskor ba dag ni lan gsum bya// de nas mdun du 'dug nas ni// de kho na nyid lan gcig brjod// 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// rdo rje chen po nor che ba/
213a3: ye shes chen po las chen po// de dag rdo rje sems grub brjod// de nas me tog sil ma ni// mgon la gtor te cho ga bzhin// dang po shar la sogs pa// bstod pa glu ru lan cig blang// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
213a4: bstod pa'i rgyal po mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa de kho na nyid chen po ni 'di yin te// dpal mchog dang po sems dpa' che// dga' ba chen po'i dga' chen po// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i
213a5: bdag/ sems dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin mchog/ rdo rje rdo rje mchog chen po// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog/ bdud dang bdud ni rab 'joms pa// thams cad thams cad byang chub che// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas
213a6: skyes mchog skyes// rdo rje hUM mdzad yi ge hUM// 'jig rten dbang phyug nor rab gsal// 'dod chags chen po bde ba nyid// 'dod dang thar pa nor che ba// dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum dang // 'jig rten gsum
213a7: mchog khams gsum pa// brtan par rang byung gsal ba ste// rab phra rtsom dang legs bsags pa// rgyu ba rab mchog thob mdzad pa// srid pa 'khor ba spyod mdzad pa// thog mtha' med cing thog mtha' can// mda' ldan
213a8: dang por thams cad gnas// snying po phyag rgya sbyor dam tshig/ de nyid bden pa mchog pa ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub che// chos dang las ni khams chen po// dam pa'i chos te las mchog bdag/ byang chub

213b1: sams ni rab skyong mdzad// rdo rje khro bo khro ba che// dus mtha' ltar 'bar 'dul ba po// 'dul mdzad chen po gdug pa'i mchog/ drag po drag nyid zad mdzad pa// thams cad dag pa pad ma che// shes rab thabs
213b2: te tshul chen po// 'dod chags dag pa'i ting 'dzin mchog/ sna tshogs chags pa dbang phyug ce// nam mkha' mtha' yas rtag pa'i don// 'byung po thams cad gnas chen po// 'byor pa thams cad gnas 'byor/
213b3: pa// dpal dang gtso bo rgyal po ste// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa// phyag 'tshal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo// dad pas khyed la bdag rten bgyid// rdo rje sems dpar
213b4: bdag grub mdzod// gang zhig bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di// nyin re nang par brjod byed dam// chos kyi tshig gis lan cig brjod// dngos grub shin tu srung bar 'gyur// gal te 'dir grub mi 'dod na// dang po nyin re dus gsum
213b5: ru/ bstod na sdig pa las nges grol// zhing dag pa ni grub par byed// rtag tu sdug bsngal thams cad sel// lan cig rab tu brjod pa yis// dngos grub thams cad skal bzang byed// phun sum tshogs dpal 'phel bar
213b6: byed// dngos grub don yod yon tan can// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa'o// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pas ni// rab tu dga' bas mgon la mchod// rang gi phyag rgyas lan cig ni// rang gi phyag rgya bcings te grub//
213b7: de nas lha'i chu dang ni// de bzhin sku mchog gis dbang bskur// rang nyid rdo rje phyag rgya la// snying po 'di ni blang bar bya// de la rdo rje sems dpa' dbang skur ba'i snying po ni 'di yin te// hUM ma ha su kha badz+ra satwa a b+hi She ka na
213b8: hri a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ sarba badz+ra a d+hi da ti twaM ni D+ho me b+ha me d+ha d+ha nA ma ma ste b+ha ga ba na ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra su ra ta s+t+waM/ ma hA badz+ra satwa/ oM b+hur pu ba swa// de nas rdo rje dbang skur ba// phyag na rdo rje ming 'dzin pa// rdo rje 'dzin chen slob

214a1: dpon du// 'di nyid du ni rab grub 'gyur// de nas kyang ni ci 'dod par// cho ga'i dam pa bsgrubs nas ni// rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa yis// legs par mchod la phyir byung bya// de nas bcams te rdo rje'i bdag/
214a2: rdo rje kun gyi gsang rab 'dzin// rdo rje thams cad 'dzin slob dpon// dngos grub thams cad grub par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub che// phyag rgya kun bdag dbang phyug che/ d+ha/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i rdo rje che/
214a3: las rnams thams cad dbus la rtag/ mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pa// kun byed dngos grub thams cad ster// sems can kun gyi rgyal po che// tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs nus// thams cad rjes chags byed kun/
214a4: mchog/ kun rig pa dang kun gyi gnas// 'dod pa thams cad la rab sbyor// phun tshogs kun gyi dbang phyug che// lha la sogs pa'i sems can kun// bsgo ba thams cad rtag tu byed// sems dpa' kun ni rtag tu
214a5: mthong // tshe 'di nyid la grub par 'gyur// de nyid kyis ni 'dod par ldan// dga' zhing rang nyid de bdag por// rdo rje slob dpon 'gyur ba yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// bde ba chen po
214a6: rdo rje slob dpon byin gyis brlab cing 'dug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// // de nas slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rjes su bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//
214a7: rdo rje mchod yon snying kar bskor// bcings nas bsam g.yos bzhin gis ni// mgo bos yang dag phyag bya ba// dngos grub thams cad grub byed yin// dkyil 'khor du ni rab zhugs la// bskor ba lan gsum byas nas
214a8: ni// 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// 'go ba kun la'ang grub mdzad brjod// de nas dus kyis mchod pa yis// bde ba chen po yang dag mchod// de bzhin du ni dbang bskur bar// rdo rje gsang ba'i slob ma gzhug/ de nas

214b1: ci bzhin brgyan nas ni// rdo rje slob dpon gyis rab gzhug/ slob ma'i tshogs rnams bcug nas ni// ci 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob// de nas slob ma bcug nas ni// dga' ba chen po 'di brjod bya// rab dgyes
214b2: rab bde bstan pa yi// rdo rje sems bdag dang grub mdzod// de nas me tog phreng ba ni// spyi bo nas ni myur du der// gang du me tog babs gyur te// lhag pa'i lhar ni rab grub 'gyur// de nas lha yi chu yis na// rdo rje
214b3: 'dzin dang rang dbang bskur// rdo rje chen po rdo rje lnga// byin la rdo rje bo d+hi brjod// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra/ badz+ra a b+hi Sha ka na sA ma/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ ma hA badz+ra d+hA ra/ he badz+ra nA ma sid d+ha na maH/ gang la rdo rje ming gang zhig yin
214b4: bde la kye zhes bya ba'i sgra dang sbyar bar bya'o// de nas snying po byin la phyag rgya bcing ba bslabs nas/ ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa bsgrub par bya'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga 'am// gang 'dod rang grub pa de la// de nyid kyi ni
214b5: dam tshig nyid// 'jug la sogs pa'i cho ga bshad// 'jig rten pa ni sna tshogs dang // de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa rnams// thams cad rang gi go rims ni// rgyas par bsgrubs na rab tu 'grub// 'di la rab
214b6: tu 'jug tsam gyis// mi tshugs pa dang mi ldog pa// nyid du rgyal ba'i sras 'gyur zhing // bde ba chen po rab grub ster// de nas rdo rje 'dzin slob dpon gyi// mna' ni dam du bkag nas kyang // de nyid chos dang dam tshig ni//
214b7: rang nyid dang ni gzhan gyis bslab// de la 'di ni mna' grub pa'i rdo rje chus dbang bskur nas brjod par bya'o// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na 'grub par 'gyur/
214b8: dngos grub rdo rje bdud rtsi chu// de nyid chos dang dam tshig ni// gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smras// skye bo 'dug nang gnas pa 'ga'// dad pa med pas brgod par 'gyur// de la 'di ni de kho na nyid dang dam tshig gi/

215a1: gsang ba'i cho ga rab tu sbyin pa yin te/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa'i na// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje snyems tshal bdag po'i bdag/ de kho na nyid
215a2: mchog gis gsang ba lnga'i de kho na nyid chen po bshad par brjod par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de nyid chos kyi mchog bka' stsal par mdzad do// srid pa ngo bo nyid kyi dag/ ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas// rang
215a3: bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog/ srad pa mchog ni byed pa yin// de la srid pa rnam par dgu pa'i thabs rtog pa thams cad kyi gsung ba'i mchog dmatshig chen po brten par bya ba ni 'di yin te/ srid pa'i
215a4: bde ba shin tu chud// sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir ro// shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs// dam tshig rtag tu bsten par bya// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni// ci 'dod par ni bsten bzhin du// rang gi lhag
215a5: pa'i ltar sbyar bas// bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya// de la rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang pa'i mchog gi dam tshig chen po 'di brjod par byaste// ci srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni// mkhas mchog 'dug par
215a6: gyur pa'i tshe// de srid mtshungs med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// gsang ba mchog gi dam tshig thabs// bsod nams byin brlabs bsgrub byed pa// dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug rtag/
215a7: rgyun tu sems can don byed pa'o// de ltar sems na rab dang rdo rje nyid du byis// rang gi dam tshig mi bzang bde skyid brten par gyis// ngan 'gro la myur du bde ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rab tu mtshungs shing
215a8: rtog pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur// des na khyod kyi bcud dang / kha zas dang gnas pa dang / glu dang rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams legs par bsabs pa bas/ bdag nyid gang la sred pas

215b1: kyang rdo rje slob dpon chen po mchod par bya'o// rdo rje slob dpon me tog stsogs// ci 'dod par ni legs mchod cing // rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa yis// yang dag par ni mchod de byung // de nas rdo rje 'dzin slob dpon//
215b2: gar gyi mchod pas mchod nas ni// rdo rje thal mo sbyor ba yis// slob ma kun gyis rab tu mchod// ro dang kha zas gnas pa dang // glu dang rol mo ci 'dod pas// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin bdag/ yang dag mchod
215b3: nas phyir byung bya// dpal mchog dang po zhes pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsang ba'o//// de nas bsgrub pa bshad bya ba// dngos grub shin tu rtag pa ste// gang gis srid pa 'di nyid la// dngos grub rtag pa thob byed pa'o//
215b4: 'di yis byang chub sems dpa' ni// srid par gnas shing srid par sangs// dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub// rtag tu sems can kun don byed// 'di yis ji ltar mchog grub pa// de ltar byang chub spyod stsogs
215b5: pas// dge ba'i tshul ni gzhan gyis kyang // sangs rgyas kun stsogs thob mi 'gyur// 'dul bya min pa bsod nams med// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa ni// rnam pa kun tu mthong stsogs kyis// sems can don byed mi
215b6: nus so// de bas rgyud chen las grub pa// sangs rgyas sems ni rdo rje 'dzin// mthong la sogs pa sems can don// nam mkha' mnyam pa byed pa yin// 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// srid pa'i nges pa dri ma med// nam
215b7: mkha' mtha' yas sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed pa yin// dkyil 'khor dag tu mazhugs pa'am// bsod nams med pa'am le lo can// de yang kun mchog grub pa yis// tshe 'di nyid la grub par 'grub/ zhes
215b8: bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas don yod cing thogs pa med pa myur du sgrub pa'i mchog/ rjes su bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// lugs

216a1: ma 'am ni brkos pa'am// byas pa'am ni bris pa yi// dang po'i sems dpa' brtags nas ni// mdun du de ni sgrub par bya// nyin re zhing ni dang po ru// de bzhin yul dang ldan gyur pas// dang po'i gsang
216a2: mchog gis bskul ste// phyag rgya chen por rang byin brlab// rdo rje mig gis de bzhin bltas// rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po dang // rdo rje hUM ni grur blangs pas// rdo rjesems dpa' ba sgrub par bya// rdo rje cha lugs ci bzhin du/
216a3: mchog gi dang po rab tu dgyes// gzugs brnyan la sogs dang por ni// ci 'dod par ni rab tu sgrub// 'di yis 'dod pa kun dbang phyug 'dod pa tsam gyis 'gro 'ong lding // dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub// kun
216a4: mchog dam pa'i dbang phyug yin// phun sum tshogs kun bdag thams cad// 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// thams cad 'jug mdzad sna tshogs pa// rtag par kun tu 'dul ba'o// dngos grub kun gyi bde ba mchog/ phyag
216a5: rgya kun bdag dbang phyug yin// rdo rje kun gyi dngos grub che// thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'byung gnas che// mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pa// thams cad byed cing kun gyi gnas// khams gsum las rgyal sna tshogs pa// char
216a6: gcod pa dang phan 'dogs pa// kun la rjes chags kun gyi mchog/ kun rig dngos grub thams cad ster// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// rang gi rnam 'phrul rab ston byed// kun mchog dngos grub chen po
216a7: ste// dbang phyug chen po'i dbang phyug che// gzugs dang tshe stobs rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa bzhin// 'gro ba rnams kyis mchod cing brjod// rang gi gnyen rnams kyis brten pa// rgyal po rdo rje 'chang chen
216a8: nga// rga dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur// gal te rdo rje sams dpa'a'am/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems nyid 'dod// dngos grub di ltar 'dod pa nyid// tshe 'di nyid la grub par 'gyur// phyi ma 'am ni 'jig rten pa// rtog pa kun

216b1: ya dga'// rang rnam pa 9/ dngas thamams du 'gyu /// yang b+hag // r+dz+dza g+sa/ ga
216b2: gsungs// de la na sbyar na rang gi phyag rgya bsdub pa'i klud yin te// phyag rgya chen por mnyam bzhags// rang gagi nyid pos pa cig sdug/ byas na dag/ su ba sod la Ta// de la tsa kang yig dug klung
216b3: rgyud yin na na/ rid+ha ta sogs kyis brgyan ldan// ci nus pa dang ci dga'adang // gaN ra la phrogs grublangs pa'i// yi ge hUM gis 'grib par 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi mchog de sgrub pa'i rlung ba shad de/ gam
216b4: te phyag rgya sgrub 'dod na// de bzhin yul dang ldan gyur pas// rang nyid kyi ni rgya bcings la// yongs su mi spro'i bar du bsgrub// de la ci ltar na dam tshig thams cad grub pa'i rgyung zhe na// dam tshig phyag rgya bcings nas
216b5: ni// sa ma ya~M s+t+waM zhes brjod la// rang gi snying kar rim bzhin du// phyag rgya'i mchog de bsgrub par bya// de nas las kyi phyag rgya'i mchog sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa yis// yongs su me skyo'i bar
216b6: bsgrubs na// mched pa kun stsogs las rnams ni// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje 'chang chen nyid dang ni// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' nyid// gzhan yang dngos grub thams cad ni// dam po myur du
216b7: 'grib par 'gyur// rtog pa thams cad kyi sgrub pa chen po don yod par 'grub pa'i tshi ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do//// de nas rtog pa thams cad grub pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ni// nyin re zhing dang por lan cig phyag rgya ba sgrub par
216b8: don yod pa dngos grub thogs pa med par bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba dang / dkrug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba bsgrub pa la ni bde ba chen por

217a1: rdo rje lta bas so// bde ba dang yid bde ba dang phun sum tshogs pa dang dngos grub thams cad mngon par 'phel bar bya ba la ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i chos so// tshe dang lang tsho dang gzugs dang gzi byin chen po mngon par 'phel/
217a2: pabar bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje bcud kyis len gyis so// dpal chen po dang / skal pa bzang po dang / grags pa dang / snyan pa 'phel bar bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje grub pas so// stobs chen po dang ye shes dang chos dang las bsgrub par
217a3: bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje snying stobs che bas so// rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul dang rmad du byung ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ston pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje'i rnam par 'phrul pas so// thams cad du yi ge dang gzugs kyi bden
217a4: pa thams cad mthong ba dang thos pa dang smra ba dang 'dri ba grub par bya ba la ni dang po rdo rje don yod pa'i bden pas so// dbang po thams cad kyi bden pa thams cad mthong ba dang thos pa dang smra ba dang zil gyis mnan par bya ba la ni
217a5: dang po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i bden pas so// sgyu ma thams cad dang bde ba'i mchog dang lung sgo ba dang / lan thob pa grub pa la dang po'i rdo rje rmang du 'byung bas so// gter thams cad dbyung ba dang nor dbrog pa dang rgyal srid thob pa
217a6: dang / sa la nye bar longs spyod pa la ni dang po'i rdo rjes dbang bsku rabs so// yul thams cad de'i skye bo dang grong khyer dang nags dang chu bor nye bar longs spyod pa sprul pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje grub pas so// thams cad las sngon
217a7: mabyung ba'i lha yul dang rin po che dang kha zas dang srung ba dang g.yog 'khor la sogs pa stsal te/ nye bar longs spyod pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje sprul pas so// skad cig gis sa bzhi thams cad 'brul sogs smin par skyed pa dang
217a8: tshwa'i phung po chen po 'byung ba dang / snang ba chen po skyed pa dang / rlung thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje dbyings kyis dbang phyug gis so// rgyab dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad bza' ba dang btung ba dang rong rtsar

217b1: gzhug pa dang las thams cad la sbyar ba la ni/ dang po'i rdo rje na yod pa'i thams cad dbang du byed pas so// dngos grub thams cad las de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa po 'i nub gas pa su
217b2: la ni dang po'i rdo rje'i bsnyems pas so// rang gi bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad sprul cing ston pa mi snang ba dang nam mkhar 'gro ba grub pa dang / shin tu phra ba dang sbom pa dang du mar ston
217b3: pal ni dang po'i rdo rje gzugs sna tshogs pas so// 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag por 'gyur ba thams cad dbab pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang bcing ba dang las thams cad la sbyar ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis so//
217b4: lha thams cad dbab pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba dang thams cad las nges par sbyar ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje lha'i bdag pos so// klu thams cad gdon pa dang / 'dul ba dang dbang du bya ba dang las thams cad la nges
217b5: par sbyar bar bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje 'bar ba'i rdo rjes// gnod sbyin la sogs pa thams cad dgug pa dang dbang du bya ba dang las thams cad la nges par sbyar bar bya ba rang skrag par bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje gdon 'dul bas so//
217b6: dkyil 'khor thams cad rtag pa dang 'jug pa dang brjod pa dang bsgrub pa dang las thams cad la nges par sbyar bar bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje 'khor los so// phyag rgya thams cad dgug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya
217b7: bdang brtan par bya ba dang / bsgrub pa la ni nga po'i rdo rje phyag rgya grub pas so// dam tshig thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang sgrub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje dam tshig mchog gis so// las thams cad
217b8: rab tu bsgrub pa la rnam par ma'i 'jigs par bya ba dang / brtan par bya ba dang grags pa chen po rab tu bsgrags pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje las gyes so// rdo rje thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang

218a1: du bya ba bsgrub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rjes so// sems dpa' chen po thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba sgrub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje sems dpas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
218a2: cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba sgrub pa la ni dang po'i de bzhin gshegs pas so// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje 'dzin pas so//
218a3: zhes kyang gsungs so// dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa'am// sdig pa thams cad byas pa 'am// rang gi snying po ma bsgrubs pa'am// dngos grub thams cad grub par 'gyur bas// ma bsgrubs par thams cad 'grub
218a4: po// don yod pa'i grub pa phyag rgya chen po mchog tu grub pa'o//// de nas dang po'i snying po ma sgrubs pa'i thams cad don yod pa thogs pa med pa las thams cad kyi rgyu skad cig la bsgrub pa rjes su bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom
218a5: ldan 'das rdo rje thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i 'phrin las rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so// don yod pa dang thogs med pa// bdag kyang bde gshegs lhan cig tu// las kyi rab 'byam 'di dag ni// dngos grub skad cig
218a6: gis grub byed// 'di lta ste thams cad shin tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang zhi ba dang bde legs su bya ba dang tshe mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang rdo rje gar gyi sems dpa'i tshul gtsug gtor gyi phyag rgyas so// dkyil
218a7: 'khor thams cad 'tshams dang phyogs dang dam tshig dang dngos grub bcad zhing bsrung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyis 'brang ba chen pos so// nyin gsum pa dang nyin bzhi pa dang slar zlos pa dang rtag pa can dang khyab 'jug gi rims thams
218a8: cad gsal ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi rims nad med pas so// gdung ba thams cad dang gnod byed dang nad dang mya ngan dang sdug bsngal thams cad gzhi ga la la ni rdo rje gar gyi sdug bsngal nye bar zhibs so// dug dang sbyar ba'i dug

218b1: las nya bar thar pa dang dbab pa dang bcing ba dang bza' ba dang bdud rtsir bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi nye ba'i dug gis so// gdon thams cad dbab pa dang bcing ba dang dam tshig 'dzin tu gzhug pa dang rab tu gdul ba dang bsrung ba la ni dzaH
218b2: gar gyi gdon las thar pa'o// thams cad la bcing ba dang thar pa dang dral ba dang ltung ba dang ldang ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi rdo rje chen po'i khro bos so// mkha' 'gro/ mthams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhig pa dang gdon las thar bar
218b3: bdang shi ba bskrad par bya ba dang tshe mngon par 'phel ba dang shin tu bsrung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya'i lan gyis so// sgrib pa thams cad dang sdig pa thams cad dang rmil ma ngan pa dang ltas ngan pa dang bur gzhag pa la ni rdo rje gar
218b4: gyi zhi bas so// thams cad dbab pa dang bskyor ba dang gar byed du gzhug pa dang thams cad bden par smra ba gzhug pa dang / pra sen thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje gar gyis thams cad dbebs pa'i phyag rgyas so// thams cad rgyas
218b5: gdab pa dang bsang ba dang ltung bar bya ba dang bskrad pa dang slar gso ba la ni don yod grub pa'i rdo rje gar gyis mkha' 'gro ma chen mos so// thams cad rengs par bya ba dang rmongs par bya ba dang gnyid log par bya ba dang bsad pa dang
218b6: gza' bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gdug pa'i srin pos so// gzhan gyi dpung thams cad skrag par bya ba dang gzhig par bya ba dang dbang du bya ba dang ltung bar bya ba dang bsad par bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gshed byed gyis so// khro ba
218b7: thams cad gsal ba dang bzhin ras dang bar bya ba dang brtsod pa las rgyal ba dang 'jigs pa las thar pa dang g.yul 'gyed pa las rgyal bar bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung brgyan gyis so// sprin thams
218b8: cad yang dag par gzung shing mi g.yo bar bya ba dang char chen po dbab pa dang rlung dang char ba dang klog dang ser ba bzlog pa dang dro ba dang grang ba bsal ba ni rdo rje gar gyi dbang po'i rdo rjes so// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya

219a1: thams cad shin tu grub pa la ni/ rdo rje gar gyi 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis so// rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad rjes su chags pa dang dgug pa dang dbang du bya ba dang rtse ba dang las thams cad la nges par sbyar ba la ni
219a2: rdo rje gar gyi dngos grub thams cad kyis so// lha thams cad dbab pa dang gru thams cad dbang du bya ba dang gnod sbyin dang 'brang po dang ma mo thams cad la nges par sbyar ba la ni/ rdo rje gang gyi rdo rje m+bu'i mchog gis so// rnam thos
219a3: sras mnan nas dpal drang ba dang / lha'i bu mo thams cad rab tu dbrog pa dang / lha dang lha ma yin gyi bud med thams cad dang rtse ba dang 'jig rten gsum ma lus pa las rgyal ba dang 'dod pa'i dbang phyug thams cad las rgyal
219a4: padang dbang phyug chen po thams cad dbrog pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi skyes bu byed pa chen pos so// mchod pa thams cad sgrub pa dang thams cad rdo rje dbya ba dang bdud la sogs pa thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / phyag rgya thams cad
219a5: bcing ba dang dngos grub kyi mchog la sogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi rgyu myur du grub par bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi don yod cing / thogs pa med pa myur ba'i las sna tshogs kyi dngos grub
219a6: dam pas so// // de nas phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud ni/ nyin re dang po lan cig ni/ phyag rgya thams cad rab bsgrub byed/ snying mchog lan cig bzlas nas ni// phyag rgya chen po rab grub bya// de'i rjes
219a7: lanye snying po// las rnams kun la nges sbyar bas// don yod grub pas las rnams ni// kun la shin tu grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya thams cad rab byin rlob// phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni// dkyil 'khor dag kyang ma mthong ba// ma
219a8: bshad pa la'ang rab 'grub 'gyur// rtog 'dir 'jig pa yod min te// 'khor lo med la brgya byin la// gang phyir bdag la byin rlob pas// rang sras rgyu ni 'gyur ba yin// sdig pa chen po byed pa 'di// bsam pa shes

219b1: nas sbyin par bya// 'di dag bcings tsam nyid dag byed// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi cho ga rgyas pa'i rtog pa'o//
219b2: de nas ston pa rdo rjes 'dzin/ 'byin pa byed pa bde ba che// bde chen can du brtan phyir dang // sems can thams cad rnam dag phyir// khams kun dang mnyam zad pa med// kun gyi bdag nyid la zhugs te// mnyam pa'i dngos
219b3: grub mchog spros nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs byung ngo // mtha' yas pa yi zhing thams cad// 'jig rten kun gyi khams bcas pas// de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// til gyi gang bu bzhin myur gang // 'jag
219b4: rten khams ni thams cad du// sems can kun mdun yang dag bzhugs// sems can thams cad rnam dag phyir// rang gi las kyis dag par 'gyur// de tshe sems can khams rnams ni// rang bzhin gyis ni gsod ka'i phyir
219b5: rang gi las ni sbyong don du// btang snyoms chen po mdzad pa yin// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// sems dpa' chen po bde ba che// byang chub chen por thugs brtan pas// skad cig gis ni yang dag bskul// sems can la
219b6: pan bsod nams can// byang chub sems ni brtan pa dag/ sems can khams ni rgyud 'gyur bas// shin tu btang snyoms ma mdzad cig/ de nas sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// thugs
219b7: rje'i bdag nyid can gyis thabs// byang chub sems mchog khyod spros shig/ de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// de tshe kun nas byin gyis brlabs// bde ba chen po rdo rje cha// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa yin// khams gsuM
219b8: 'khor ba'i rgya khyon gyis// 'khor lo chen po gdong nas byung // de'i khams gsum gnas pa yis// sems can thams cad yang dag bsgrubs// sangs rgyas kun sogs dngos grub la// de tshe dag pa grub par 'gyur//

220a1: de nas sangs rgyas thams cad ni// 'dus nas gsol ba 'debs mdzad pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rin po che// sangs rgyas kun mchog bshad du gsol// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung
220a2: thugs la yang dag gnas// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje la// yang dag smos te 'di gsungs so//// oM ny+tsa khaM/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ni// bdud bcom la sogs mdzad nas na/
220a3: byang chub snying por byin gyis brlabs// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// dkyil 'khor de ni mchog gsungs pa// sems can kun la bde don phyir// rtog pa kun gyi bde ba che// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen
220a4: po dam pa ste// dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol mchog/ rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag bri// 'khor lo lte bar sangs rgyas nyid// 'dzum pa'i tshems ni mi snang ba/ sur te sa ma la s+t+waM/ oM sid d+hamAM zhes brjod dgod/ mdun du
220a5: bdud las rnam rgyal bar// mdad pa'i sangs rgyas yang dag zi// g.yas su byang chub sems dpa' yi// nor chen pos ni dbang bskur ba// rgyab du byang chub sems dpa' dang // mnyam du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/
220a6: g.yon du log par rnam dregs pa// sdig pa bsdus pa kun 'byin pa'o// de nas 'di rnams kyi snying po ni// badz+ra sa twa badz+ra radan/ badz+ra d+ham/ badz+ra karma/ de nas phyag rgya rnams te/ satwa badz+ri badz+ra rad ne/ badz+ra pad mi/ bi sha bar+tha
220a7: 'tshams kyi char ni rdo rje dang / rin chen sdong bu nor bu bri'o// 'tshams rnams su yang lha mo ste// lcags kyu la sogs sgo rnams su'o// de bzhin snga ma tsa lta bar// 'khor lo de ni brtags par bya// mchod pa'i thal mo snying kar
220a8: bcings// g.yon du de bzhin bskor bar bya// me tog dang bcas phyag rgya 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig rim// me tog bcas te snying kar bcing // bsam pa g.yos pas gdung bar bya// mgon la mgo bos phyag byas

220b1: la/ bskor ba lan gsum byas nas ni// zhugs nas me tog dor bar bya// shin tu gsang ba yang dag dgug/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba dang // dbang du bya ba dang dgug pa dang bsgrub par bya
220b2: ba'i snying po ni 'di yin te/ oM a ka ro mu kha ma sarba d+harma tAM A d+ya rud panan twAd/ de nas cho ga ci bzhin du/ ston la me tog sil ma dor// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub phyir// 'gro ba'i mgon la de nyid brjod// de yis
220b3: kun nas sangs rgyas ni// thams cad 'dus pa nyid du 'gyur// thams cad mi dmigs sbyor ba yis// dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzod// dkyil 'khor der zhugs pa la ni// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//
220b4: dga' ba la sogs mtshan ma mchog/ sna tshogs la ni 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas de bzhin cho ga ni// rgyas pab slob ma mchog tu gzhug/ mchod pa'i thal mos 'khor lo che// mchod pa byas nas slar dbyung bya// sgrub pa byas
220b5: nas dngos grub kyang // cho ga ci bzhin rab bshad bya// ras la bcom ldan bdud la sogs// rnam par rgyal ba brnyes par bri// bsgrub 'di lan gcig tsam gyis ni// de 'dra'i sgrub pa grub par 'gyur ro// sku gzugs
220b6: stsogs mdun yang dag par// ye shes khu tshur yongs bzung la// rdo rje'i tshig gis cho ga bzhin// bzlas brjod stong phrag rgya bya'o// mdor na 'bum ni rdzogs pa na// ci 'dod dngos grub thams cad dang // tshe mchog 'di
220b7: la sangs rgyas nyid// thob 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud ni/ phyag rgya gar du gcig bcings nas// bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsgoms na// phyag rgya
220b8: chen po dngos grub che// brtan pa myur du thob par 'gyur// de nas dam tshig bsgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ snying ker rdo rje gzugs bzhag ste/ sa ma ya b+h+rUM zhes brjod la// bzlas brjod 'bum gyis bsgrubs nas ni// dngos

221a1: grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// de nas las kyi phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub pa'i rgyud ni// bdud las rgyal ba'i mchog bcings te// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// mtshungs med sems can don
221a2: byas nas/ las kyi phyag rgya rtag tu 'grub// ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do//// de nas ma bsgrubs dngos
221a3: grib mchog/ las rnams rab 'byam dam pa ste// sdig pa kun sel sna tshogs pa// go rims bzhin du rab bshad bya// 'di lta ste nad thams cad dang mya ngan dang gnod pa dang gnod byed dang dug dang sbyar ba'i drag dang
221a4: gshed byed dang // g.yengs byed dang ro langs dang sngags dang sman dang bgegs dang log 'dren dang sdig pa dang rmi lam ngan pa dang dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang rims dang gdon dang mkha' 'gro ma dang nye bar 'tshe ba
221a5: dang 'go ba'i nang dang nyes pa dang nyon mongs pa dang lus dang ngag dang sems kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par bshig pa la ni// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal 'phrog par byed pas so//
221a6: tshe dang lang tshe dang gzugs dang kha dog dang gzi byin chen po dang mdangs dang stobs dang spro ba dang brtson 'grus dang dpal dang bskal pa bzang po dang bsod nams dang ming dang snyan pa dang grags pa dang dran pa
221a7: dang blo gres dang brtan pa dang rtog pa dang stobs dang ting nge 'dzin dang phung po dang 'du byed dang sku dang gsung dang thugs 'phel ba la ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen thos so// de bzhin gshegs/
221a8: pa thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang shes rab dang ye shes dang stobs dang thabs dang rdo rje dang sgrub pa dang gzungs dang sa dang spyod pa dang so so yang dag

221b1: par rig pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang chos dang las dang sna tshogs pa'i bya ba dang sems can gyi don dang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'i don dang sku dang gsung dang thugs dang rdo rje chen po grub pa la ni/ de bzhin
221b2: gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad kyis so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i cho ga spyad pa rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi don
221b3: dnga'apho ba dang skye ba'i sa dang gzhon nu'i rol pa ston pa dang mngon par 'byung ba dang dka' ba spyad pa ston pa dang byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang bdud thams cad 'dul ba dang / byang chub chen por mngon par byang
221b4: chub pa dang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mu stegs thams cad tshar gcod pa dang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang lha las babs pa dang 'dus pa chen po'i byin gyis rlabs pa dang gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba
221b5: d ang 'dul ba la rab tu gzhag pa dang ngan 'gro thams cad las 'don pa dang mdo sde thams cad ston par mdzad pa dang rtogs pa thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa dang rtogs pa thams cad stsol ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa
221b6: thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs la dmigs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul sprul pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs kyi rdo rjes so// ci ltar phyag rgya 'di dag gis// byang chub sems la mngon rten pa/
221b7: de ltar byang chub spyor sngogs kyis// byang chub dam pa thob mi 'gyur// don yod bsod nams dam pa yi// las kyi rab 'byam sgrub byed pa// cho ga ma grub pa rnams grub// sangs rgyas chos ni rab ster byed// rnam pa kun tu
221b8: dang ldan pa'i// sems can kun la sbyin par bya// dkyil 'khor dag tum zhugs pa// skad cig gis ni sbyor bar byed// dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// byang

222a1: chub rdo rje byin gyis brlab pa'i rdo rje rtog pa rgyas pa'o// // de nas sna tshogs las chen po// khyab bdag rdo rje 'dzin chen po// gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i mchog/ sems can kun la rjes
222a2: ston mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bskyed pas gang phyir nyes byas kyis gdug pa'o// rang gi rang sems spyod pa yis// zhi bas sems can kun gyi don// gdul ba rab tu bsgrub mi nus// sangs rgyas
222a3: kun gyis bsgrub bya ba// zhi ba'i 'gro lding thams cad yin// gang tshe bde gshegs sems can don// dam pa mdzad par mi spyod pa// de tshe nyid kyi dngos po kun// gtso bos rdo rje gsol ba btab// sems can thams cad
222a4: 'dul mdzad pa// bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab// uSh+Ta sa ma ya kro d+ha ni sum b+ha dz+wa la badz+ra hU~M/ de nas sngags 'di gsungs tsam gyis// phyag na rdo rje rang nyid gtso// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// slar byung
222a5: nas ni mdun na gnas// khro tshan rgyal po'i sku yis ni// sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung gis legs bzhugs// 'bar ba'i phreng 'od kyis gsol pa// sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhan 'dra ba// g.yon pa'i rdo rje snyems pa che// drag
222a6: gsor bas spyod mdzad cing // 'bar ba'i rdo rje tshor 'bar ba// rnam par 'bro bas sreg pa 'dra// 'bar ba chen po gsod pa ni// bskal ba'i me'i phung po 'dra// dang po'i rdo rje khrog nyer bcas// rdo rje mchog 'dzin pas gas
222a7: de la rdo rje chen po ma dang nyi ma ltar 'bar bzhes bya ba'i snying po 'di yin te n+tu/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sdig bkun gyi byung shing zad// 'jig rten khams kyi 'jig rten gsum// thams cad g.yos shi
222a8: 'tshul bar 'gyur// can lasogs lha rnams no// gal ba med cing rmongs par 'gyur// rdo rje 'ab ba khrugs pa kun// de bzhin 'jig pasazur byung // na thos dang ni rang rgyas rnams// phya na 'dasapa

222b1: par 'gro// lhal sogs pa'i sring gsum kun// de tshe kun tu rmongs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis// sangs rgyas byang chub yang bstan mdzad// sems dpa' kun gyi thabs chen po// dam pa
222b2: yang ni thugs su chud// de nas rdo rje 'bar ba'i mchog/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal// zhal ras khro dang bcas pa yin// g.yon brkyang bas ni lags par bzhugs//
222b3: spyan 'bar 'jigs su rung ba ste// dbus sgra gyen du brdzes shing g.yo// kun nas 'khyil cing 'bar ba che// rdo rje gsang ba'i rnal 'byor che// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyi lus can rnams// phyung nas kun tu 'gro ba rnams//
222b4: thams cad du ni 'bar ba 'khrug/ rlung bskyod skal pa'i me lta bur// 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun tu 'khrugs// 'jig rten khams ni ma lus na// sangs rgyas thams cad sras bcas pa// yang dag bzhugs pa legs bskul
222b5: te// 'jig rten thams cad yongs su bskor// bkug nas sems can kun don dang // bstan pa thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir// 'jig rten gsum bdag de rnams dang // rgyu dang mi rgyu'i sems med byas// de nas rdo rje
222b6: 'dzin rgyal pos// kun mchogs yi dbang phyug ni// de rnams la na thugs rje yis// 'chi bskur gso brtan por gzungs// oM u tiSh+Tha ma hA d+hi ba ta badz+ra ni/ shIgrA ma ud tha pa ya hUM/ chub dang mi rgyu ba thams cad
222b7: bskang 'o// de nas sa gsum bslang ban// thams cad duni shi bag so// sangs rgyas dpa' thos pakral gyur cing// rdo rje can gyis kyang rjes 'artul// de nas rdo rje 'dzin khrobs// 'ab ba rdo rje gsar byed cing /
222b8: dam tshig la gnas zhes// rna chags pa la bka' rab ba sgo// de rnams kyis gsol pa/ 'di su zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni zhib la/ gnod sbyin gzugs can gang lags gsungs// khyed cing mchog kyi rdzam

223a1: zhus pa bden pa'i tshig tu gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni sangs rgyas rnam grol ba// gdod skyes rdo rje gnod sbyin che// dkon mchog gsum dang de bzhin du// de la skyabs su 'gro/
223a2: bar gyis// 'jig rten gsum pos 'di thos nas// tshogs bdag tshogs kyi dbang phyug bcas// bskal pa'i me dpung lta bu yi// 'bar ba'i mtshon gyis 'thab par brtsams// de rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag gis
223a3: ni sangs rgyas rigs// rdo rje gnod sbyin shes ma yin// bdag cag 'jig rten gsum po cig/ gnod sbyin bsgobs ci zhig bya// de nas rdo rje 'dzin khros nas// khro gnyer dpral bar bsdus che gnas// de nas khro
223a4: gnyer thams cad ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rjes su spyod// g.yon pa snyems pa rgya bcas pas// smin ma spyan bsdus pas rgod cing // nam mkha' khyab pa'i dbyangs kyis ni// drag du khros bcas pa smras so// de la
223a5: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i nye ba'i snying po sems can ma lus pa las rgyal ba ni 'di yin te/ hi/ de nas snying po 'di phyung bas/ des rgyal bcu gcig bcings pa dang // dam tshig brtan pa 'dzin du bcug/ rdo rje
223a6: ming gis dbang bskur nas// lag na rdo rje 'dzin mchog byas// rdo rje ming ni byin nas su// 'jig rten gsum po'i ting 'dzin gzhag/ de nas rdo rje chen po mchog/ mgon po yis ni gsol ba btab pa// sems
223a7: catsan kun la rjes ston pas// rtog pa 'di ni bshad du gsol// rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pa yi// dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol tu// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo yang dag bri// de'i dbus su bzhag bya ba// sngon po 'bar
223a8: ba'i gzugs bzang ba// zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs// zhal ni khro dang bcas pas bzhad// sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung gis legs bzhugs// bsnyems bcas shas cher 'ab rab la// 'od zer 'bar ba

223b1: 'odo 'khrug pa'i// rdo rje gsor bar mdzad la brtson// de'i ngos ni thams cad du// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i gzugs// rdo rje mtshon cha madrang chen dang // ral gri zhags pa mtshan 'dzin ma// mtshams su mthu
223b2: dang kha T+wAM ga/ 'khor lo ba dan sna tshogs 'dzin// rdo rje rigs ni sna tshogs pa// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo yongs su bskor// dkyil 'khor dgod par bya ba ni// thig bdun gyis ni yang dag du// dang po
223b3: rdorje phyag rgya bdag/ gnyis pa sngags kyi lha mo ste// gsum par rdo rje rgyal po ni// rdo rje lha mo yang dag bskor// rdo rje chen po sgeg mo che// bzhi par glu mkhan ma la sogs// rgyal rigs gsol ka zan
223b4: rnams kyi// khro bo rnams ni lnga pa la// drug par rdo rje pho nya mchog/ gnod sbyin srin po king kar/ dbang phyug dam pa drag po stsogs// gtum po chen po 'dul bar mdzad// phyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbyibs rnams
223b5: su// mdor na ming po gsum la sogs// lha la sogs pa'i tshogs thams cad// legs par bri ba 'am gzhag par bya// 'tshams su lha mor rab bshad pa// de rnams kyi ni sgo dbus su'ang // rdo rje lcags kyu sgrogs
223b6: khro bcas// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni// go rim dag ni ci bzhin dang // cho ga rgyas pa ci bzhin bya// khros pas rdo rjes gsor ba dang // khro gnyer 'dzum dang bcas pas 'dud// de nas khro zhing slob dpon che//
223b7: rdorje can mchog rab zhugs la// rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis bsdigs mdzub// hUM mdzad rab tu sbyar bar bya// snyems dang bcas pas rgyas gdab nyid// de bzhin khro bas 'dul ba la// rdo rje 'chang chen dgyes pa yis/
223b8: gdug pa nyid la rab tu dgyes// de nas me tog grangs nas ni// khros pas bdag po che la gtor// rdo rje 'bar ba'i sngags kyu ches// yang dag par ni dkrug par bya// oM ma hA badz+ra dz+wa la yAn lA rga ya hings

224a1: badz+ra ku la pra ba sha ya hUM/ sarba mu traM ga nAn b+han d+ha na tra ta sarba sa ma yaM sA d+ha ya phaT sarba du shAn daha ba tsa b+hasmi ku ru ma hA kro d+ha a ga ni badz+ra ni hUM phaT/ a a a a/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i
224a2: rgyal po brtan pa che byon 'gyur// rdo rje rigs la sogs pa kun// dngos grub thams cad gsol bar mdzad// de nas hUM la sogs pa'i sgra'i// mtshan ma rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// gal te slob
224a3: ma la sogs la// snying gar dbab pa phra ba skye// de nas rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi// phyag rgyas slob ma gzhug par bya// bcug nas dang po'i sems dpa' yi// rang gi snying po brjod par bya// hUM hUM badz+ra pra ha ra ni
224a4: phaT/ hUM badz+ra shu la ya gri Ni dri ta/ ma ta sa hUM badz+ra ko she tshin d+hats+tsha oM badz+ra a ma la pA she ma Ta// rdo rje 'gugs pa dang rdo rje mdung dang rdo rje ral gri dang / rdo rje zhags pa ste rdo rje khro bo'i bsrung ba'o// de nas 'di
224a5: rnams kyi phyag gya rdo rje don yod pa'i thogs pa med pa/ shin tu grub pa stobs dang pha rol gnon pa rnams sems can mngon par rgyas gdab par nus pa rnams bskul bar bya'o// oM badz+ra g+hu h+ye sid d+ha
224a6: par ma yo gi shwa ri ti/ hUM badz+ra tsar+b+ha d+hokha T+wAM ga ma hA badz+ra ka ba la ya ma kA te ru ru lu ru lu ni hUM badz+rA na ra ya ni dzi/ hUM badz+ra ba Ta ke dzi/ rdo rje khro bo'imakha' 'grom lan cig bzlas te dgod pa'am bri bar bya'o//
224a7: bcom ldan 'das de kho na nyid kyi snying pos bzhugs su gsol na// dngos grub thams cad la don yod pa'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas dam tshig brjod par bya ste sems can mngal bde phyir dang /
224a8: bstan pa thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir// gdug pa 'dul las bsod nams ni// 'gyur zhes rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rjehU~M mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i 'dzum mo sbyar bar

224b1: bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad dang / bdud thams cad dang 'jig rten gsum po thams cad yang dag par 'dul ba nyid du byin gyis brlob par mdzad do// de nas dbang bskur ba rgyas pa la sogs
224b2: bde bzhin du byas la/ rdo rje khro ba'i las bzhi pa bslab par bya ste/ phyag rgya rnams kyis sems can rnams rgyas gdab pa dang / phyag rgya gzhig pa dang gsad pa dang slar 'tshe ba bya'o// gang la phyag rgya sbyar ba ni 'chi ba
224b3: 'gyur na de ni gdug pa yin par shes par bya'o// de nas 'tshe bar byed pa'i phyag rgyas 'tsho bar byas la// shin tu bsrung ba rab tu sbyar ba byas na shin tu bsrung ba yin pa'i phyir/ gdug pa rnams slar yang gnod par mi byed
224b4: do// de nas brtsams te slob ma bzang // rdo rje tshogs ni kun gyis kyang // mi tshugs pa dang mi sod par// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// de nas 'dir sgrub bshad byaste// ci bzhin sku ni dge 'dun du// rdo rje gsor ni
224b5: dang por ni// bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o// 'bum tshad nas ni sems dpa' che// rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam mchog/ rdo rje khro bo rgyal po mchog/ rgas dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur// gdug pa rnams ni rjes 'dul
224b6: zhing // sangs rgyas kun la rab mchod par// 'jig rten gsum ni lags snang zhing // cis kyang 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// de nas de kho na nyid kyi snying po sgrub pa ni// 'greng ngam yang na 'dug pa'am// 'gro'am nyal
224b7: bar byed pa ni// ci lta de ltar 'bum bzlas na// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// 'di yis 'dod pa'i dbang phyug kun// 'dod pa tsam gyis 'gro 'ong lding // dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub// rgas dang 'chi ba med
224b8: par 'gyur// 'gro ba rnams kyi mchod pa dang // rang gi nye ru rnams kyis bsten// gdug pa thams cad rjes 'dul zhing // gang la 'jigs pa med par rgyu// zhes bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos gsungs so//

225a1: de nas phyag rgya'i dam pa sgrub pa ni/ ci bzhin dus su phyag rgya ba cing // bdag nyid nges par bsregs nas ni/ srid nyid du'o chen po'i// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de nas dam tshig bsgrub pa ni//
225a2: bdag ni thams cad bsar byanas// brjod cing phyagan rdo rje yis// dmatshig phyag rgya bcings nas ni// bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin 'grub 'gyur/ de la ma bsgrub pa ni// rnam pa bzhir ni byed cing // khams cad dab ba'i phyir
225a3: bsan// rdo rje las nyid theb par 'gyur// rngub pachen pa chag rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas dang sa grub sgrub pa ni// rdo rje khro mchog rgyal po la// las kyi rgyud ni dam pa sa// go rims bzhin du bshad paraH// 'di sa ste thams cad
225a4: batheg pa dang bskrad pa dang gzhig pa dang rengs par bya ba dang gnyid log par bya ba dang rgyas gdab pa dang / rmongs pa dang gzhig pa dang bcings pa dang / gzir ba dang dral ba dang brdeg pa dang 'bar ba dang bsgyel ba dang btso ba dang
225a5: gcad pa dang dgug pa dang phye mar bya ba dang gtor ba dang rnam par gnom pa dang rims dang dug dang gdon gyis zin du gzhug pa dang / sbyor ba bya ba dang bsad par bya ba la ni rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis so// thams cad 'dug par bya ba dang
225a6: n ges par dkod pa dang gar byed du gzhug pa dang glu len du gzhug pa dang brgyal du gzhug pa dang brtser gzhug pa dang ha ha zhes rgod du gzhug pa dang 'khor ba dang drang ba dang 'od du gzhug pa dang nub par bya ba dang dbyung ba dang 'phang
225a7: p a dang nye bar gdegs par bya ba dang bsgyur ba dang nga ro 'don par bya ba dang ngur gzhug pa dang rang nyid brdeg par bya ba dang 'ching bar bya ba dang skra 'bal bar bya ba dang zhe 'gras par bya ba dang gos bshu ba dang khro ba 'bar bar bya ba la ni khro
225a8: bo'i gdan gyis phyag rgyas so// thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang dbab pa dang bri se na bsgrub pa dang bden par smra bar bya ba dang sgyu ma ston pa dang lan ston pa dang dus tshigs kyi 'khor lo yongs su bzlog pa dang rus ma yin/

225b1: par shing las me tog dang 'bras bu smin par byed par ston pa dang 'bru thams cad yang dag par ston par bya ba dang rims dang sbyar dug dang dug dang mkha' gro ma las thar bar bya ba dang g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad las thar bar bya ba
225b2: dang gzhan gyi dpung gzhom pa dang phyogs dang mtshams dang dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang shin tu bsrung ba dang yongs su skyob par bya ba dang thar bar bya ba dang bslang ba dang dbang du bya ba la ni khro bo chen po sna tshogs grub pas so//
225b3: lha la sogs pa thams cad ltung bar bya ba dang klu gdon pa dang gnod sbyin rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang srin po skrag pa dang mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i gdon thams cad la pa dang bdud kyi dpung thams cad gnom pa dang ma mo rnams
225b4: g dul ba dang gdug pa'i tshogs rnam par gtor ba dang gdug pa rnams tshar gcad pa dang 'dum pa dang 'jigs pa med pa yang dag par bskyed pa dang nor bu bzang po dbang du bya ba dang nor sprin las nor thams cad dbrog pa dang
225b5: r nam thos sras mnan nas dpal drang pa dang lha'i bu mo gzhon nu ma thams cad dang rtse 'jo bya ba dang brgya byin mnan nas bde sogs ma dbrog pa dang skem byed tshar gcad pa dang tshangs pa ltung bar bya ba dang khyab 'jug 'dul ba dang
225b6: d bang phyug chen po las rnam par rgyal ba dang 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mnan nas dga' ba mo dbrog pa dang rdo rje bsgrub pa dang byang chub chen po bsgrub pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes pa bya ba dang dgug pa dang
225b7: gzug pa dang dam tshig gis bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje khro bo chen po rgyal po dam pa'i dngos grub gyis so nas kyang gsungs so// lan cig bzlas pas mchog grub pa// thog ma'i rtsa snying bzang lan cig/
225b8: de'i 'og tu khro gnyer gyis// bsgrub bya thams cad dgug pa yin// dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje me dang nyi ma ltar rab tu 'bar ba'i rtog pa'i cho ga'i rgyas pa'o//// de nas ting 'dzin tham

226a1: cad ni// rnam dag mchog gi chos nyid las// spyan ras gzigs dbang chen po ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i rtsi chen yin// gdug pa thams cad 'dul don du// rang rigs rin po che skye na// sangs rgyas kun gyi khrob ches
226a2: thabs med pas ni thabs yin no// 'dod chags la sogs kun bsags pas// ma dag sems can khams rnams ni// de rnams la ni rab spyod par// skyes bu mchog ni rnam par mkhyen// mchog tu mi 'dul ba nyid kyis///
226a3: sangs rgyas kyang ni mnga' mi mdzad// 'jig rten kun na 'jig rten mchog/ rang snying bzang po la snyoms zhugs// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis
226a4: r nam par dag pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te gang la gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug thams cad nyid thugs su chud par
226a5: gyur pa'o// snyems pas pad ma g.yon pa ni// gzung ste 'dab ma 'byed mdzad pas// ci nus pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// rang bzhin gyis ni gzigs par mdzad// ci ltar pad ma dmar po 'di// tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos pa// gnas
226a6: kyi nyes pa sna tshogs pa'i// khams gsum pa ni de bzhin dag/ 'di la gzigs pa la sogs pas// rgyal ba rnams ni dbang por gyur// de yis rdo rje sems dpa' ni// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gyur// de bas sgom
226a7: ri'i ste / gang rloms pas bsgoms pa ni/ rje cha ba ched pani/ da ma chen po cha bar 'gyur// se rlungs ri yi dang po ni/ rtul po ched mangs mnyam // snyems pa g.yon pa'i dmachog gi// bas pa mchog rnam pa da zigs/ den da ma/ nan po mchog dzin pa/ sa rgya 'dogs gru 'i/ na ni rung di shog
226a8: gros chos 'dub dang/ zhugs par du bris bya/ kyi 'khor chen po'i tshul gyi ni// de la pad+ma ge ba der// gro thams cad nam sbyo ba'i// tshum gyi 'dus bar ma dad pa ni/ ngad ma'i gis mchog ston pa'i phyi/ la ba rnams kyis gsol ba btag/ den thams cad dus mdzad cing // shi tudaka ba chos 'dzin pa// rdo rje tshes sti rang rgyal po///

226b1: 'jig rten dbang pos bka' stsal pa// phyi ni dkyil 'khor chen po la// pad ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri// de'i dbus su spyan 'dzum pa// 'jig rten dbang phyug dgod par bya// gser sbyangs la bu'i pad
