226b2: mni// g.yon snyems tshul gyis gzigs mdzad pa// rgyal mtshan kun gyis rnam par spras// sangs rgyas sku mchog spyi bor bzhugs// de yi ngos ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas suni brgyad po bri// rang gi ting
226b3: 'dzin pad mche'i// ting nge 'dzin la rnam par gzigs// 'jig rten dbang po'i gzugs logs su// sangs rgyas la sogs rigs kyi lha// zhi bsred med bu tshangs pa// 'dod pa'i gzugs ni pad ma can// spyi bor
226b4: zhing mgrin 'degs pa// rta mgrin lcags kyu bcings nas ni// chos kyi tshig gis spyan drangs bya// de nas pad ma'i snying po ni// sarba ta thA ga ta pad mdza/ hUM badz+ra pad ma he pad ma/ pad ma ba ho pad ma ni rA dza/ de nas 'tshams
226b5: rnams sun// hUM pad me tsaN Te shar t+na/ he ma hA bi shra pad ma tsu ra Ne sid+hats+tsha/ maT hrIHpad ma pad mo hU a/ ho pad ma a shwa/ kra ma kra ma d+hu dza/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni// cho ga rgyas pa byas nas ni// pad mtshan
226b6: po ma tog bcas// ma yengs yid kyis phyag bya'o// dkyil 'khor zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin// las byung gzungs 'di brjod par bya// oM bi shod+ha ya/ ma chus ni bud d+ha mahAsatwa/ d+ha t+ya sa masaH/ rAg dis nyatsa ya tsi
226b7: mesarbad+ha me badz+ran ci te ma sa rba d+ha ma mya dzin// gzungs kyi phyag rgyags na nas ni// dgyes par pad ma 'dzin pa grub// de nas 'dzub mo lpags kyur bcing // chos kyi tshig gis legs spyan drang // oM sarbata thA ga ta aH
226b8: lo ki shwa bod ma ha ta/ ya hi shI g+h+ri me mA badz+ra mu tra// a gau sh+ya sa be sa ma ye rab d+ha bi shi ke mi/ dza hU~M bi to/ sho d+ha ya sarba sA d+ha ya ba ma ma/ ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra sto// de nas 'jig rten mgon po mchog/ 'jig rten 'dzin pa

227a1: rang nyid byon// 'jig rten kun mchog 'grub 'gyur ba'i// ting 'dzin chog nges par mdzad// de nas de bzhin slob ma rnams// gzhug pa'i chog rgyas pa rnams// dngos grub thams cad sbyin pa yi/
227a2: shes dag ni bslab par bya// ting 'dzin snying po 'di yi ni// bsgrub pa chen po gdod nas byung // 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug nyid// go rim bzhin du bshad par bya// bud med rnams kyi nang zhugs pa'am//
227a3: gdug pa rnams kyi nang chung ba'am// gang yang rung ba 'dug nas ni// pad ma chen po yongs su bzung // dus dang stobs ni ci bzhin du// nyin re ci nus bsgrub par bya// cho ga 'di yis tshe 'di la// myur du mchog ni
227a4: 'grub par 'gyur// 'dod chags kun gyi bde myur bar// 'dod pa tsam gyis 'gre 'ong lding // 'jig rten kur gyi dbang phyug rgya la// rga dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' nyid//
227a5: phyag na rdo rje nyid dang ni// dngos grub kun gyi mtha' yas mchog/ tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya ba sgrub pa ni// phyag rgya bcings te ting 'dzin gnas// dngos grub chen po nyid thob bo// dam tshig
227a6: dam tshig mchog gis ste// las ni las mchog phyag rgyas so// bsgrub pa chen po cho ga'i rgyud do//// de nas dngos grub ma grub pa'i// ting 'dzin las ni 'dren ma dag/ dang por ting 'dzin grub pa ni/
227a7: go rims bzhin du rab bshad bya// 'di lta ste sgrib pa thams cad dang sdig pa dang rmi lam ngan pa dang lhas ngan pa dang yams dang 'tshe ba dang nad 'go ba dang nyon mongs pa dang dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang 'jig
227a8: pa dang skrag pa dang rtsod pa dang 'thab pa dang byis pa'i gdon dang dmu rgod dang nyon mongs pa dang ngal ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang dbul ba dang rgyas pa dang reg na mi bde ba dang skal pa ngan pa dang / nad med pa ma yin pa dang nor rlag pa rnams la ni/

227b1: pad ma chen po zhi bas so// rlung dang mkhris pa dang khrag dang bad kan dang 'dus pa dang ma zhub pa dang rims dang sbyar ba'i dug dang dug dang mdze dang
227b2: ' bram bu phra mo dang g.yan pa dang rkang shu dang sman dang chu 'di mu rdzing dang mtshan mar rdol dang sha ba krag dang zad byed dang khrag zad pa dang khu ba zad pa dang nad thams cad dang gnod pa dang gnod byed dang gdon dang phra men
227b3: rnams gso ba la ni/ pad ma chen po sman gyi phyag rgyas 'dzin pas so// thams cad rdo rjer byas pa dang chos dang cho ga dang gtsug tor dang gtsug phud dang mtshams dang phyogs dang dkyil 'khor dang sa dang nam mkha' dang rdo rje'i
227b4: g dan dang khang pa chen po dang rdo rje ra ba dang me 'bar ba dang thal ba'i ra ba dang rdo rje dang ri bo don yod pa la sogs pa dang srad bus yongs su bskor ba dang phur bus gdab pa dang zas dang btung ba dang gos dang rgyan dang phyag rgya dang
227b5: bsrung ba la ni pad ma chen po thams cad bsrung bas so// tshwa thams cad dang stobs dang kha dog dang gzi brjid dang mdangs dang lang tshe dang brtson 'grus dang spro ba dang nad med pa dang dpal dang skal pa bzang po dang nor dang 'bru
227b6: dang dbang phyug dang 'byor pa dang dngos grub dang blo dang rnyed pa dang bkra shis pa dang ming dang grags pa dang snyan pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dam pa 'grub pa la ni pad ma chen po mchog grub pas so// dpal mchog dang
227b7: po'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ chos thams cad sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje'i cho ga rgyas pa'o//// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad mi 'gyur nam mkha' tshe// thams cad dbang bskur kun gyi
227b8: don// kun dbang rin chen thams cad 'dzin// ting nge 'dzin gyis byin gyis rlabs// drag po chen po rab sad mdzad// chos rnams la ni rnam gzigs pas// kun don dbang phyug gdod nas byung // nyi zla dang ni gza' skar can//

228a1: nam mkha' nyid du gyur pa yin// de nas rin chen ting 'dzin ni// nges par rdo rje can du brjod// de nas nam mkha' rdo rje nyid// ljang sngon bI dur+ya mnyam mdangs// rdo rje rin chen bsnams dge ba// nam mkha'i
228a2: snying por yang dag gyur// de nas bcom ldan thog ma 'di// mdzod spu kun gyi gnas na bzhugs// ting 'dzin la ni rnam gzigs pas// 'jig rten dbang phyug bdag po nyid// sangs rgyas thams cad sras bcas dang //
228a3: de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog/ rdo rje rin chen de yis ni// kun rig kun gyi dbang skur dang // bsam pa thams cad rdzogs bya'i phyir// kun mchog kun la dbang bskur nas// shis pa brjod pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarba bar+tha
228a4: satwa a ti pa ti tra ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi b+hu ra bubs// de nas bzang pos 'di gsungs shing // legs par shis brjod dbang bskur bas// rdo rje rin chen ched de las// chos kyi gtso bor byung bar gyur// byung nas 'gro ba thams
228a5: 'di ga pa ni dang shu na// na sa sunas// slar yang dkyil 'khor tshul gyis bzhugs// bde gshegs kun gyis byin brlabs pas// rdo rje rin chen bla na med// shin tu dbang phyug chen po'i mchog/ dngos grub gsol
228a6: ba'i rtog pa gsungs// dkyil 'khor chen po phyi rol ni// nam mkha'i 'khor lo nam mkha'i mdog/ nyi ma zla ba skar ma dang // gza' rnams kyis ni brgyan pa bri// de dbus nam mkha' snying po ni// bdag nyid thams cad
228a7: dgyes pa gzhag/ dag pa'i bai dUrar+ya mdog 'dra// 'od zer 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrug/ g.yon pa rin chen thugs kar stong // g.yas pas nor chen rab stsol ba// de'i ngos su sems dpa' mchog/ bzhi po gzungs
228a8: bcas dam pa yin// dbang bskur ba dang gter nyid dang // nor bu chen po bla med dang // 'byor pa dpal ni phun sum tshogs// rang gi mtshan mas mchod pas ni// de la de dag gi snying po 'di yin te// badz+ra u0f7fAdz+ra badz+ra rang

228b1: nahUM/ badz+ra d+harma baM/ badz+ra ka ra ma ho/ de nas gzungs rnams kyi snying po bshad de// oM pra ti badz+ri Ni phaT/ oM badz+re sri ti hi tri/ oM tsan d+ha ma ni to// oM badz+ra ma hA ma he ha ma/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni// cho ga rgyas pa ci bzhin
228b2: bya// nor bu'i khu tshur gyis bzhugs la// mkha' skyes la ni mgos phyag bya// gzhugs nas nam mkha' mkhas pa yi// dam tshig dam pa brjod par bya// khyed ni nam mkha' las byung ba'i// thams cad kyi ni lnga pa yin//
228b3: oM sid d+ha hU~M d+hu/ sid d+ha b+hu ba/ sid d+haswa/ sid d+ha ma hA badz+ra rad na/ bA ShA Ta Ta traM// 'di ni bzlas pa tsam gyis ni// mkha' snying dngos grub thams cad dang // phran tshogs kun la shin tu ni// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med/ ces
228b4: bcom ldan 'das rin chen bla na med pas gsungs so// de nas nor bu khu tshur gyi lcags kyus dgug par bya'o// oM b+hu rA ya dI dzA b+hu ba pra bi sha hUM sA/ grih+NA baM ba ba Ta Ta sid d+ha to traM// de nas bcom ldan myur du ni/
228b5: byon nas dngos grub thams cad ni// 'byor pa shin tu g.yo ba la// don ni rab tu 'grub par 'gyur// de nas slob mas phyag rgya ni// me tog bcas pa mchog gis gzhug/ bcug nas de nyid mchog bsnying po// bden pa lan
228b6: cig brjod du gzhug/ de nas 'byor pa'i mchog brtag pa// dpal gyi phun tshogs mchod pa che// 'jig rten mchog gi dngos grub rnams// bde bar gshegs pa de bzhin 'thob// de nas de phyir bsgrub pa bshad//
228b7: rdo rje rin chen rgyal mchog gis// dpag med zlos pas bsgrub bya zhing // 'di yis skyes mchog 'di nyid la// 'dod chags 'gro dang 'ong bar 'gyur// rin chen kun gyis dbang phyug rgyal// rga dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur//
228b8: dngos grub kyi dam pa thams cad kyang de bzhin no// phyag rgya bsgrub pa ni dga' ba nyid kyis so// dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa ni// dam tshig gi khu tshur gyis so// de bzhin du las bsgrub pa ni dngos grub bla na med

229a1: pa yin no phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa nyid de'i rgyud do// de nas phyi rol las rnams kyi/ rab 'byam rgyu ni dam pa dang // dngos grub chen po kun bsgrubs pa// go rims ci bzhin rab bshang bya// 'di lta ste dbyor pa
229a2: t hams cad dgug pa dang gzhag pa dang bcing ba dang dbang dbya ba dang dbrog pa dang bsag pa dang len pa dang 'dren pa dang 'gugs pa dang gtong ba dang gzhag pa dang 'phen pa dang 'degs pa dang 'bebs pa dang brdeg pa
229a3: d ang sbyang ba dang rnyed pa dang nyo ba dang btsong ba dang kun tu 'greng pa dang nye bar dgod pa dang brtan par bya ba dang rdo rjer bya ba dang 'byor pa thams cad bsgrub pa dang 'byor pa'i thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa la rdo rje rin chen gyi dbang
229a4: bskur bas so// dpal thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang ba du bya ba dang dbrog pa dang bsag pa dang len pa dang 'dren pa dang 'gugs pa dang gtong ba dang gzhig pa dang 'phen pa dang 'degs pa dang 'beb
229a5: p a dang brdeg pa dang sbyar ba dang rnyed pa dang tho ba dang btsong ba dang kun tu 'gyed pa dang nye bar dgod pa dang brtan par bya ba dang rdo rjer bya ba dang 'byor pa thams cad sgrub pa dang 'byor pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa
229a6: lani rdo rje rin chen dpal gyis so// phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba dang dbrog pa dang bsag pa dang len pa dang 'dren pa dang 'gug pa dang gtong ba dang bzhig pa dang 'phen
229a7: p a dang 'degs pa dang 'bebs pa dang brdeg pa dang sbyang ba dang rnyed pa dang nyo ba dang btsong ba dang kun tu 'gyed pa dang nye bar dgod pa dang brtan par bya ba dang rdo rjer bya ba dang 'byor pa thams cad bsgrub pa dang 'byor pa thams cad kyi
229a8: mchog sgrub pa la ni/ rdo rje rin chen phun sum tshogs pas so// mchod pa thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba dang dbrog pa dang bsag pa dang len pa dang 'dren pa dang dgugs pa dang gtong ba dang

229b1: g zhig pa dang 'phan pa dang 'degs pa dang 'bebs pa dang brdeg pa dang sbyang ba dang rnyed pa dang nyo ba dang btsong ba dang kun tu dgod pa dang nye bar dgod pa dang brtan par bya ba dang rdo rjer bya ba dang 'byor pa thams cad sgrub pa
229b2: dang 'byor pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa la ni rdo rje rin chen gyi mchod pa bsgrub pas so zhes kyang gsungs so// sems can thams cad bde don tu// rdo rje sems dpa' nor che ba// rang gi rgya mchog lan gcig ba sgrub/
229b3: yi ge traM ni sbyar bar bya// dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa rdo rje rin chen gyi rtog pa'i tshi ga rgyas pa'o//// de nas rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin// 'jig rten gsum po
229b4: khams gsum pa// 'jig rten gsum bdag thams cad la// 'jig rten gsum mchog 'dul mdzad pa// cho ga bzhin du bsgoms gyur cing // sems can don phyir cho gas bzhugs// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug
229b5: rnams// rtag tu rnam par gnas pa yin// mi mnyam pa yis sten gyur nas// dug nyid du ni nye bar 'gro// bdud rtsi nyid kyis bsten gyur na// bdud rtsi nyid du'ang 'gyur ba yin// 'dod chags tshangs pa mchog sbyin pa/
229b6: zhe sdang drag po'i ting 'dzin gyis// gti mug khyab 'jug brtan mdzad nas// 'jig rten gsum po byin gyis brlabs// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// rtag tu gnas pas srid gsum gnas// chos
229b7: bsten nas gsum mchog ste// chos mini bston pas ngan song gsum// 'dod chags sbrang rtsir byed par bshad// zhe sdang rgyal bar byed par bshad// gti mug reg ni sgrub byed ces// kun tu gsang ba'i ming yin no//
229b8: nga ni 'jig rten gcig pu nyid// 'jig rten gsum du rab tu bshad// nga ni 'dod pa gcig pu nyid// tshangs pa drag po g.yung drung yin// de nas gsum pa 'di yi mchog/ sbyang phyir rdo rje sbyang 'dzin pa// gzugs ni gsum

230a1: pa 'di dag nyid// bdag nyid kho na byung ba yin// gang phyir 'jig rten 'di dag ni// rtag tu yang ni 'di skad smra// tshangs sogs kyis 'dul yang dag pa'i// sangs rgyas byang chub snod ma yin// de rnams sbyang phyir
230a2: bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje 'chang chen rang nyid ni// gzugs ni gsum po 'di mdzad nas// phyis ni sangs rgyas nyid mi 'gyur// de nas tshangs pa lha sogs lha// 'jig rten gsum mchog dbang phyug che// dkyil 'khor der ni
230a3: gsang snying po// rang gi rang grub phyir rab phul// oM b+hur bu ba sra// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sgo srungs bzhis ni rab bsrungs pa// kha khyer gyis ni legs bskor ba// phyi'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de'i nang ma nyid dang ni// dkyil
230a4: 'khor gzhu yi dbyibs can la// sbrang rtsir byed dang rgyal byed nyid// bsgrub pa thams cad bsgrub pa ni// go rims dag ni ci bzhin du// legs par bri'am gzhag par bya// pus mo gnyis kyis bzhugs la der// rtsegs mdam
230a5: tshig kyis mtshan pas// zhugs te dam tshig bcings nas ni// yang dag par ni dgug par bya// oM b+hu ra bu ba swa swa sti nA ma swA hA// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa yis// thams cad thams cad kyis bskor ba// thams cad grub phyir
230a6: 'ongs pa la// de snyed pa yi gtor ma sbyin// slob dpon rab tu zhugs pa yis// slob ma thams cad gzhug par bya// de nyid gsang ba brjod nas ni// dam tshig mchog ni sbyin par bya// gal te khyod kyis rtse gsum gcig/ snying po
230a7: snod min la smras sam// ci skad smras pa'i chos rnams ni// gal te 'dir ni ma spyad dam// snying stobs rdul dang mun pa nyid// tshangs pa drag po g.yung drung ste// ming po gsum po 'di nyid ni// nam yang brnyas par mi bya'o//
230a8: gang zhig 'di rnams sgom pa slob// yang dang yang du zhugs nas ni// dkyil 'khor mchod pa byed pa dang // dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// rang gi phyag rgya bslabs nas ni// de la gar gyi mchod pa dang // 'dod yon

230b1: dmapa lnga rnams kyis// rtag tu dkyil 'khor mchod paH// 'jig rten gsum 'byin pa'i rgyung pa/// de nas sbyin pa rdo rje 'dzin// sems sa na kun du ston mdzad pa// 'jig rten gsum byung don grubs// 8/
230b2: yang sring mo rnams 'byin mdzad// kun tu chags dang zhe sdang rmongs// brtan par byed pa'i rgyu yin no// dga' dang phrag dog bud med ni// rab tu grags pa'i dngos grub ster// gang zhig 'jig rten kun tu bshad// chog
230b3: kun gyis mchod lha mo rnams// zhi dang 'jigs ma de bzhin gser// grub pa dang ni zhi bar bshad// phyi rol sems can phan phyir dang // rtogs don khong du chud bya'i phyir// de rnams kyi ni snying po dang // dkyil 'khor de bzhin
230b4: dam tshig bshad// hi hUM shrI shwa/ dkyil 'khor bzang po sgo bzhi pa// srad bu gsum gyis dkyil 'khor bya// 'tshams kyi thig ni ka ba che// bzhi po dag ni rim pa bzhin// de yi dbus su dkyil 'khor ni// bzhi po dag ni de
230b5: bzhin bya// rang gi snying po bzhi po ni// rang gi sgor ni phyogs par gzhag/ skal bzang lag na ral gri mtshon// sring mo phub can zhib mo// phag mo lag na gter nyid de// grub pa mo ni snyems dang bcas// de nas dang po'i dkyil
230b6: 'khor du// kun nas de bzhin zhugs nas ni// sring mo rnams kyi rang gi rgyas// go rim dag ni ci bzhin du// zhugs nas de bzhin cho ga bzhin// spos la sogs pas mchod pa bya// de nyid gsang ba rab bsgrub pas// kun nas
230b7: dgug pa dag tu bya// oM sum b+ha ga ra tiSh+Tha ma ya hI bu/ rak+Sha sa ma tiSh+Tha ma ya hI b+hur ba/ b+ha ra ha a mir+yA ta ma ya swA hA// sid d+haka sid d+hi sa ma ya hi I mA d+hi mu tA b+hi/ hI hUM shI b+ho// de nas lus ni thams cad kyis// de bzhin du
230b8: ni legs bzhugs la// de nas phyag rgya bcings bstan te// gsang ba mchog 'di brjod par bya// gal te gsang nyid ma bsrungs na// gang zhig sems can don zhugs dang // gang yang dkyil 'khor sgrub byed pa// de rnams

231a1: khyed kyis bsad par 'gyur// chos dang ldan pa bdud rtsi nyid// de rnams khyed kyis bsad par 'gyur// chos dang ldan la bdud rtsi nyid// chos min pas ni dug pas lhag/ ci snyed pa dang dus ci bzhin// yul
231a2: rnams nye bar bsten pa dang // phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa yis// ci bde bar ni rtag tu mchod// sring mo bzhi'i rgyud do//// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sa'i dbang phyug kun gyis mchog/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug
231a3: che// sgrub pa dang ni rab sgrub nyid// 'dod chags stsogs dug gzhig phyir dang // kun nas bdud rtsi nyid bya'i phyir// zhe sdang las byung klu yi ni// dkyil 'khor dam pa 'byung bar 'gyur// de la snying po'i 'di yin te// phud zur
231a4: bzhi ba la sgo bzhi pa// srad bu thams cad yang dag bri// sgo khyud klu yi gdengs ka mchog/ mtshams kyi rtse mchog mjug ma ma drang // de'i dbus su klu rgyal ni// mtha' yas gdengs ka bcas pa ni// klu'i rigs ni brgyad po
231a5: rag/ shes rab can gyis kun tu bri// de nas khros nas zhugs nas ni// klu 'dzin pa'i shugs kyis ni// zhugs nas dkyil 'khor de nyid du// sbrul gyis gdengs kas dgug par bya// oM hrI a nI dza la ba be ga bri d+hi b+hin d+har she
231a6: shA ya ti pramasarba nA ga ku lA nAn ya puHsa ma ya pra be sha ya phuHsarbA na sa d+ha ya phuHta ta sa sarba nA ga bu tra ka phuH/ de ltar byas na legs par bzhugs shing dga' bar 'gyur ro// de nas slob dpon gyis dug med par bas
231a7: par bya'o// de nas brtsams te dug thams cad zos kyang bdud rtsir 'gyur ro// nor rgyas brtse bar byed do// dug thams cad sbyar ba dang gzhig nus par 'gyur ro// de nas mna'i snying po sbyin par bya ba dang / 'dod chags zhe sdang
231a8: gti mug rnams// 'jig rten na ni 'di gsum dug/ gal te bden pa las 'das na// 'di dag gis ni rtag gsod 'gyur// khyod kyis glog la brnyas mi bya// ser ba bzlog par mi bya zhing // gal te dngos grub pa

231b1: dga' ma/ ci nas sbal ni bsad mitha// klu'i dkyil 'khor ro//// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba'i mnag/ sems can kun la bde ba'i phyir// gdon byed rgyal 'khor byung ba yin/
231b2: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// nyes byas kyis ni dug nyid 'gyur// gdon dang rims dang sdig pa dang // dmyal bar yang ni 'gyur ba yin// de nas gdug pa'i snying po ni// haM/ zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi par// gdon
231b3: dkyil 'khor kun tu bri// de dbus dang por gdon la sogs// cho ga rgyas pa gdon par bya// de nas bshad pa bzhin zhugs nas// rgod cing myung bar dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje 'dzin bzhugs nas ni// khros pas rkang pa g.yon
231b4: pas mate// de nas gdon dang rims sdig pa// dmyal ba thams cad rtag tu ni// sdig pa chen po byed pa yang // rdo rjes rab tu 'jig par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// sdug bsngal
231b5: thams cad las 'don pa'i rgyud do// // de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yis// sems can kun don rab bsgrub phyir// dkyil 'khor thams cad gsung ba yin// de la snying por
231b6: 'di yin// oM AHT+TaSh+T+r-i NA~M/ de nas 'di ni gsangs tsam gyis// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa ni// gzugs kun gyi ni kun mchog gi/ dbang phyug dam pa mdzad pa yin// gas ba chen po lnga las ni// ga
231b7: 'dul bar ma gyur pa// de tshe sna tshogs cher mdzad pa// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dam pa yin// de na ga kyi dzin ga tsa// mchog sna tshogs rnam par rgyal// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yi// dkyil
231b8: 'khor chen po bris nas ni// de'i dbus su chog bzhin// rdo rje sems dpa' ba bzhag la// rdo rje ma mo tshogs dkyil 'khor// da'i ngos ni thams cad du// kun mchog bdag po'i sku rnams so// rdo u0f7fmchog bcas ma

232a1: ma ni/ rang gi rigs kyis bskong ba gzhag/ rgyal badzad srang med bu'i// gzugs 'dzin 'khor lo bsdams pa bri// khyab bdag rdo rje can rdorje/ gtum dbang rdo rje mdung bsdams pa// rdo rje par byud pad ma can//
232a2: rdo rje 'dzin pa tshangs gzugs ldan// nam mkha' snying po 'dod pa'i gzugs// rdo rje dang bcas me tog mtshon// dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'tshams rnams su// rigs kyi lha ma tho bar bya// rdo rje dpal mo dkar mo dang /
232a3: rdo rje sngol ma mkha' rdo rje// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po 'di rnams kyi snying po 'di bshad par bya ste/ oM badz+ra nA rA yan tshan da pra ti ha na badz+ra tsag tAn to// b+ha ga bAn badz+ra ta thA ga ta/ dza hUM baM to badz+ra d+ha ra te/ badz+ra ta
232a4: ga ta trUM/ badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA yo ge ni ga Ne shwa ra/ ma ta badz+ra ku lo gra ba ne ho// b+ha ga bAn badz+ra tsan De shwa rA ya/ ta ha ta ta hrIHbadz+ra pad mo b+ha ba to// b+ha ga bAn badz+ra lo ki shwa re ma tA pra me sad+d+ha/ oM b+hu bu ba swa/ sasti nA ma sAr+tha/ te badz+ra
232a5: su mA yAMH/ sa ka ma mi sa d+ha la to// b+ha gdun badz+ra A kA sha gar+b+ha/ bab tatatre/ badz+ra a ka gar+b+ha a she sha mu ti/ na mo len swA d+he na/ b+ha ga ba ti pra dA pa ra ma~Mk+Sha ma te/ tshen dbadz+rar ni can dran rten sa rten tha ba kan/
232a6: shwata swa bi da ye sahA/ badz+ra bar mi/ i bad go me tAti d+hitral ka ba da ya shwa ra badz+rarba d+ham gnas mas/ badz+ra d+ha na ma muH/ tad yaH/ matal ma yol la la la badz+rag mug pa sahA/ brdzas ma lanam yin
232a7: sad d+he na b+ha ga ba te/ pra d+ha bo d+hi bud d+ha d+ha ra/ badz+ra d+harma pra yo ga na ten sa twe na sid d+ha ma/ oM te re tud tA re tu re sAt+ma/ badz+ra d+ha mata/ oM karma badz+ran sid d+ha sid d+ha bi shud d+hA sa d+hu ba ta/ gan na nas pa gas na /
232a8: bai pra ya pa ri pu ra ni swA hA// phyi'i dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su// rdo rje 'dzin par daphyogs gnas// lha dbang dang ni ma mo nyid// 'jig rten skyong rnams dgod par bya// tshogs kyi dbang phyug rdo rje yi// rol moche bcu rung ///

232b1: byed pa// phyi'i dkyil 'khor kha khyer dang // sgo dang 'tshams gsu'ang de bri'o// sgo rnams kun tu 'jug pa ni// rang gi phyag rgya rab tu gzhug/ dkyil 'khor dam pa lnga par ni// dang po'i sbyor bas 'jug par bya'o// de nas
232b2: dbus su 'dug nas ni// dang po lcags kyu che de nyid// snying po 'di ni brjod byed cing // 'gugs pa 'di ni brjod par bya// oM ma hA su ka badz+ra satwa sid+d+hi hUM/ sarba ta thA ga tan/ sa ma ya A kar sha ya dza badz+ra kA la dI paM/ dam ya
232b3: tro dra be sha ya hUM/ sarba le kai ra re pra be shra sa ma ya ban d+ha na be/ ya ma sarba ra dan dI baM ma hA ma na rA dza naM/ b+ha shaM ku ru to// trA aHtwA twA tri// de nas gsang ba chen po yi// snying po bzang po 'di brjod pas// rdo rje 'chang chen rgyal po ni/
232b4: 'khor lo thams cad dang bcas par// bkug cing rab tu bcug pa dang // bden pas bcings te dbang du byas// dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog thams cad// dngos grub kun gyis 'grub par 'gyur// de nas go rims ci bzhin
232b5: du// dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa dang // dngos grub de rnams nyid kyang ni// thams cad kyang ni bsgrub par bya// bde ba thams cad mi 'gyur gnas// bde ba chen po zhes brjod do// rdo rje 'di ni bsgrub la sogs// 'di
232b6: ni tshe 'dir 'grub par 'gyur// de ltar sna tshogs pa'i don sbyang ba'i don gyi cho ga 'gro ba dpag tu med pa 'dul ba/ mtha' med cing sna tshogs pa mnyam pa med pa'i phul du byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs
232b7: thams cad 'dzin pa'i bde ba'i mchog byed pa rgyal ba thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa srid pa'i bde ba mchog byed pa gsungs pa yin no// dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi mi
232b8: rtsa ba'i rgyud kun gyi mchog dbang phyug dam pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas gsang ba ras bris kyi tshogs gsungs pa ni/ sangs rgyas kun gyigs pa che// dam tshig mchog ni sgrub pa dang // bde ba chen po'i gzhal yas khang // dngos

233a1: grub kun gyis lus byas pa// de bzhin gshegs mchog chen po yi// rin chen rgyal po stsogs kyis brgyan// bde ba chen po chags pa yi// glu dang rol mo rjes chags pa// bla med dga' ba chen po yi//
233a2: mchod pa kun gyis rab tu mchod// dga' ba chen po dpal gyi gnas// rang gi bzhugs gnas mchog de la// rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po mchog/ mi 'gyur mchog ni yang dag bzhugs// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag
233a3: rang nyid// rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog/ kun tu bzang po 'khor ba dang // byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ rdo rje snyams pa bdag po'i bdag/ kun mchog chag
233a4: pa chen po yi// dngos grub dbang phyug rjes grub pa// glu dang rol mo thog mtha' med// mchog ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ hUM/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// rdo rje thams cad 'dzin pa ni// gsang ba lnga
233a5: yi de nyid che// phyag rgya'i lha mo byung bar gyur// rtag tu chags dang dngos grub che// rnam rgyal dbang phyug lhag pa'i lha// phyag rgya dam pa bzhi pa ste// sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs pa'i sku// de nas de rnams kyi snying po
233a6: 'di yin te/ kun mchog so sor rtog pa dang // dngos grub kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/ kun mchog rnam rgyal mthong ba'am// thams cad dbang phyug mchod pa che// dngos grub rnams dang phun tshogs dang // dga' ba dag
233a7: dang bdag po rnams// rdo rje lha mo thog mtha' med// rdo rje sems dpa'i sku'i mchog ces bya'o// de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i mi rnams ni dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod dga' ba'i dam tshig gi 'dod pa'i rdo rje ma dang / dga'
233a8: ba chen po dpal don yod la chags pa'i dam tshig gi rdo rje kI li kI li dang / dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod la chags pa'i dam tshig rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje ma dang / dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod la chags

233b1: pa'i dam tshig rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'o// 'di rnams gsang ba'i mtshan dag ni// mkhas pas gang zhig dad pas brjod// de ni phyag rgya thams cad kyi// dngos grub kun bdag bdag por 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan
233b2: 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu gsang ba gsungs pa yin// de nas 'di sgrub bshad bya ba// dngos grub shin tu rtag pa ste// sdig pa che la dga' ba dang // sgrub pa gang zhig ma grub kyang // rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa
233b3: bzhin/ de dag kyang ni myur 'grub 'gyur// nyin re 'am ni zla re 'am// de bzhin lo ni re re la// ci mngon mngon 'dod bsgrub par bya// ci rnyed pa dang ci bde bas// ras la bcom ldan bri bar bya// kun bdag dam tshig dbang phyug
233b4: ste// gang zhig bris par gyur na ni// mchog tu rtag pa'i thar pa thob// bzhad pa dang bcas zla ba'i 'od// sna tshogs pad ma'i 'od 'bar ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur stsogs// sna tshogs rgyan dang na bzar ldan// sama?
233b5: dpa'i dkyil mo dkrung gis bzhugs// rdo rje snyems pa'i mchog 'chang ba// g.yon pa dril bu mchog snyems pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu brtag/ de'i logs na bzhugs pa rnams// de'i 'od kyis dkyil 'khor brten/
233b6: rab tu dga' dang bde ba'i sku// gsang ba chen po dgod par bya// dang po pad ma ltar dkar dmar// gzhan ni ba la sha ltar dkar// gzhan ni ud pa la 'dab ltar sngo// rdo rje skams ma ser po 'dzin// dang po dang ni gnyis pa
233b7: dag/ g.yas kyi logs la brten pa ste// gsum pa dang ni bzhi pa dag/ g.yon gyi logs su bzhugs pa yin// rdo rje kI li ki li ma// dbus kyi rang lha dgyes par spro// de'i logs la rdo rje che'i// mda' ni gsor bal
233b8: brtson pa// snyems pa'i phyag gis yongs 'khyud pa'i// chu srin rgyal mtshan sgreng dang bcas// de'i logs na bzhad dang bcas// mchod pas bdag po la lta la// sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur mtshan// thams cad spyan

234a1: gyis phyag rgya gzigs// rang la bdag ni thugs gtad pa// zung du lta zhing bzhugs pa'o// ras ris 'di ni mthong ba yis// rtag pa'i bsod nams thob par 'gyur// mchod pa dang ni brtags pa yis/
234a2: mchog tu dga' ba'i thar pa thob// ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de ltar mchog tu dga' ba rab tu 'dod pa ni// mchog tu dga' ba dag pa dam pa'i dngos grub 'grub// gsal zhing rnam par rgyas/
234a3: ba yi// rgyal ba'i ras ris chen po 'di// thams cad gzigs pa rnams mchod pa// chen po yi ni dpal 'dir rol// 'khor lo de ni brtags byas nas// mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// rnam par dben pa'i khang par
234a4: 'am// yang na sgyid mos tshal stsogs su// de bzhin gshegs mchog chen po yi// ras ris rgyal po stsogs kyis brgyan// dril bu dang bcas yid dga' ba'i// bla re phul bas mchog gyur pa'i// rdo rje glu yi mchod stsogs
234a5: dang // klu dang rol mos rnam 'phral pa// me tog spos stsogs rab sbyor ba// mar me'i sbyor bas yang dag mchod// khang pa sum rtsegs dkyil 'khor du// mchog gi gsang bsgrub par bya// yang na bdag nyid kho na mchog
234a6: rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sgom bya// de nas 'khor lor ma zhugs kyang // rang nyid kyis ni rtag zhugs nas// rdo rje kun 'chang slob dpon ni// dngos grub kun la 'grub par 'gyur// rang nyid khrus byas dri zhim bsgos//
234a7: ci snyed rgyan dang gos dang ldan// sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag bklubs// phreng bcas kha ni dri zhim pa// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' yis// me tog spos dang dri snod bcas// rdo rje glu ni 'di dag gis// gar byed
234a8: grong khyer 'jug par bya// de la mchog tu gsang ba'i dpal dam tshig gsum 'jug la mchog tu gsang ba'i glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin te/ dngos grub kun gyi bde ba nyams dga' ba'i// thar pa'i

234b1: grong du bcom ldan bde chen 'jug/ mchog tu bde ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyis// dza hU~M ba to/ rab tu grub par mdzad// rab tu zhugs te g.yon pa yis// rdo rje'i mig gis mgon la 'dra// g.yon pa snyems pa cung zad
234b2: bshad// stod cing mdzes pa'i mig btsums pa// de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa dpal dam tshig gsum gyi phyag 'tshal ba'i me tog gi sil ma dor ba'i mchog tu gsang ba rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa'i mchog tu grub pa 'di yin
234b3: te// mchog tu bde ba'i sems ni rol par ldan// sgeg pa'i phyag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'dud/ dzaHhUM baM teHhi he he hi/ mgon po snyim pa'i me tog bzhes su gsol// de nas me tog sil ma dor// rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang
234b4: bskur bas// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dang // ldan pa'i don gsal sbyin par bya// de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa mchog
234b5: tu 'grub pa 'di yin te/ oM/ sangs rgyas kun ldan rin chen mchog gis brgyan// lha'i cod pan dang bcas khyod la 'dud// rdo rje 'chang bdag rin chen dbang bskur bas// rdo rje sems dpa' sa ma ya s+t+waM haM// de nyid kyis ni rnga
234b6: rjegazung // chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya// dam tshig gis ni phyag rgyad grob// byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzlas// rdo rje la sogs thob gzung bas// rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa 'dra// rdo rje thams cad 'dzin rgyal po// rdo rje
234b7: can gyis byir brlabs 'gyur// zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyis bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgrub pa gcig pu'i chog mchog tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung
234b8: so// de nas 'dir bsgrub bshad bya ba// dngos grub shin tu rtag pa yang // gang gis sgrub po dam pa dang // sdig chen byed pa rnams kyang ni// rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa bzhin// ma grub rnams kyang grub par 'gyur// lugs

235a1: ma'am na brdungs pa'am// 'dus byas pa'am bris pa'am// dang po'i sems dpa' bzhugs gsol nas// de'i mdun du chog bzhin// rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang shing // dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya//
235a2: thams cad dgug dang mchod pa che// bdag byin brlabs stsogs bsgrub rnams so// de la ci ltar mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad dgug pa'i rgyud ni 'di yin te/ rang lhag lnga'i
235a3: sbyor ba las// thams cad dgug pa'i sbyor ba yis// yan lag mchog gi rol bcas pas// gar bya zhing ni dgug par bya// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig bri
235a4: glu'i mchod pa ni 'di yin te/ dza mchog dang po rdo rje 'chang ba rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba rab rtogs rab tu dga' ba khyod bdag sangs rgyas so sor rtogs/ hUM mchog rdo rje las ni mchog tu mi 'gyur zad med srid pa rab bsgrub pa de dang
235a5: yid bde dam tshig bdag la dngos grub mdzod// ba mchog bdag gi sku 'dzin rnal 'byor thams cad rnam rgyal bsgreng ba rab mchog dag pa bde bar 'gyur ba'i pad ma'i rgyal po kye/ ho rab mchog ni mchog gi dngos grub dam
235a6: pa thams cad dbang phyug dam par bdag gyur cig/ rtag par bdag 'phel nam mkha'i snying po khyod// hu lu hu lu'i sgrub pas dbab par mdzod// dam tshig chen pos yang dag dgug pa khyod// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi
235a7: dam tshig ste// rab tu dga' ba mchog bdag po// de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam pa tshig gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i cho ga ci ltar yin/ rang lha'i rnal 'byor ci bzhin du// mchod pa kun
235a8: mchog sku rnams kyi// mchod de sngags pas klu rnams kyi// rol mo'i rnam 'phrul gyis rjes mchod// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub kyi mchod pa chen po'i cho ga'i mchog tu gsang ba'i dam

235b1: tshig gi rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa ni 'di yin te/ thams cad rjes su chags pa bde ba dam pa'i thugs// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni rab tu dga' ba yin// bde ba chen po gsal mthong ba dag la brtan gyur cig/ myur du so sor mkhyen
235b2: nas rab tu 'dud pa bsgrubs// de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal// dam tshig gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgrub pa chen po ci ltar yin// rang lha'i sbyor ba ci bzhin du// phyag rgya kun gyis byin brlab
235b3: de nyid chen po'i mchog gis ni// rang nyid bsgrubs te snying po bzla// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub byin gyis brlabs pa'i gsang ba chen po'i dam pa'i dam tshig gi/ rdo rje glu'i mchod pa mchog
235b4: tu grub pa 'di yin te/ oM nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir// thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin// rdo rje sems dpar bdag grub mdzod// kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste// dbang phyug
235b5: chen po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal// mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod// nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa khyod// 'dod chags kyis ni rjes chags pa// 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che// bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub
235b6: mdzod// shin tu dag pa kun gyis mchog/ gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// byang chub sems dpar bdag grub mdzod// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po lhag
235b7: pa'i lha// grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pas// rdo rje snyems bdag bdag mdzod cig/ dpal mchog dang po'i bcom ldan khyod// gang gis don dang glu yis bstod// de ni dngos grub kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po nyid grub
235b8: 'gyur// zhes bya ba mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi mchog tu bsang ba'i glu chen po mchog tu grub pa// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so// dngos grub cho ga 'di yis ni// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag rtogs// kun mchog

236a1: dngos grub chen po yi// dbang phyug nyid ni rab bsgrub pa'o// kun nas 'od zer ston sogs dang // so sor ston pa'i rmad byung rnams// rdo rje'i tshig gis rang lha las// ngo mtshar gyur rnams mthong bar 'gyur// rtog
236a2: pa kun gyi sna tshogs che// dngos grub dbang phyug bde rnams kyis// myur du rang gis byin brlabs pas// rdo rje slob dpon gyis 'thob bo// ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog dang pos gsungs so// de la mchog
236a3: tu gsang ba'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi lha thams cad kyi bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud ce ltar yin// rang lha rnal 'byor ci bzhin du// lha kun bdag nyid sku rnams kyis// rang lha'i rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis// rang
236a4: lhag lha nyid bsgrub par bya// de nas mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi kun mchog dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug chen po nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu mi 'gyur
236a5: bdam pa bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rjes su grub pa ni 'di yin te// rang lha'i rnal 'byor ce bzhin du// rdo rje kun mchog sku rnams kyis
236a6: gla dang rol mo'i cho ga ni// rdo rje nyid kyi rjes chags 'gyur// rang lha'i sbyor ba ci bzhin du// dbyangs kyi rtsabs rnams pas// klu dang rol ma tshig ni// dril bu nyid kyis rjes su brjod// rang lha'i sbyor bce bzhin du// sna tshogs
236a7: phyag rgya'i bdag po mchog/ glu dang rol mo'i cho ga ni// dam tshig gis ni rjes bsgrub bya// 'di yis rtog pa thams cad la// rdo rje 'bebs pas rabasad pas// rang gi lha'i dam tshig ni// thams cad bzhi 'gyur 'grub par 'gyur//
236a8: mchog du gsang ba dam pa'i dpal// dam tshig gsum gyi glu chen po dang // rol mo'i tshig mchog du gsang ba mchog tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas rdo rjes gnas ci bzhin// ci snyed pa

236b1: dang ce bdebs// me tog spos kyis mchod nas ni// khang pa 'am sbed mos tshal sogs su// bdag nyid ci 'dod rab bsgrubs nas// ci snyed rgyan dang gos dang ldan// sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag klubs// me tog phreng bcas
236b2: kha dri zhem// lugs ma'am ni rdungs pa 'am// 'dus pa'am nir mor bris// dang po'i 'khor lo de mdun du// cho ga bzhin du bzhugs gsol nas// rang lha'i rnal 'byor ci bzhin du// rdo rje dril bu rab sad pas// thams cad
236b3: dgug dang mchod pa che// bdag byin brlab sogs 'grub par bya// sngon du lan cig bsgrub byas nas// de nas de rjes ci 'dod par// ci 'dod pa dang ci sgrub// thams cad bza' zhing thams cad byed// langs pa 'am ne
236b4: 'dug pa'am// rab tu rgod dam smra ba 'am// ci bzhin de bzhin de dang der// ci 'dod par ni de bzhin gzhag/ gsang ba mchog gi 'khor lo ni// me tog sogs kyis mchod nas ni// ci bzhin du ni rjes grub bya// 'di
236b5: ni'adod pa kun dbang phyug/ 'gro dang 'od dang 'dod na 'phur// dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug 'grub/ rga shi med pa'i gtso bor 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub chen po// phyag rgya kun gyi dbang phyug bdag
236b6: rdo rje kun 'dzin rgyal po ni// rdo rje mtshon cha thams cad 'dzin// mi thub pa dang me sod cing // thams cad byed cing kun gyi rten// sems can kun gyi rgyal po che// tshar gcod rjes su bzung bar nus// kun mchog rjes su chags
236b7: pa che// 'dod pa 'grub pa bde ba'i mchog/ kun las rnam rgyal grub 'gyur te// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yin// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po'i go'aphangs gnas// rgyal po rdo rje
236b8: kun 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas thams cad rab 'grub 'gyur// de ltar mchog tu rjes chags dga' ba pad ma'i rab che// mchog tu gsang ba grub pa'i bla na med pa'i dngos grub stsol// mchog gi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas

237a1: gang zhig rjes su bsten pa ste// mchog gi dngos grub dbang phyug chen po nyid des nyams myong ba// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dpal mchog dang po las gsang ba chen po dam
237a2: pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum dang dngos grub thams cad dgug pa dang // mchod pa chen po dang / bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// gsang ba mchog ni dgyes pa dang // sangs rgyas
237a3: kun gyi rjes bstan pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi gnas// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje snyems
237a4: tshul bdag po'i bdag/ 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// lhag pa'i lha ni cig pu nyid// ces bya ba grub par 'gyur ro// de ltar mchog tu rjes chags dga' ba pad ma rab che// mchog tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i dngos grub
237a5: stsol// mchog gi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba gang zhig rjes su bsten pa ste// mchog gi dngos grub bde ba chen po nyid des nyams myong ba// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dpal mchog dang po
237a6: las// dga' ba chen po'i dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i dam tshig rnal 'byor thams cad kyi dbang phyug de gzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rang gi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor mchog tu bsang ba yongs su
237a7: rdzogs s+ho// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dam tshig chen po'i slob ma'i cho ga rgyas pa rjes su bzung ba bshad par bya'o// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//
237a8: de la dang po kho nar re shig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i sngags 'di lan cig brjod pas skyed du bcug ste// oM sarba yog cing taM u pa ta ya mi// 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin

237b1: gshegs pa thams cad dang mi bral zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang bdud thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du yang rtogs par bya'o zhes bya ba yang
237b2: gsungs so// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// mchog tu bskyed par byas nas ni// snying kar rdo rje rab gzhag nas// su ra ta sa ma ya stom to// snying pos rdo rje ci bde ba sgrub// 'di yis rdo rje skul ba na// 'dod pa kun las 'grub
237b3: par 'gyur// de nyid skul bas myur du ni// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// kun mchog dngos grub chen po'i phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// zhes bya ba'i mchog bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so///
237b4: gar byas spyi bor thal mo sbyar// gos kyis gdong ni g.yogs pa rnams// ci 'dod dngos grub 'dod pa yis// slob ma thams cad gzhug par bya// ci 'dod dngos grub sems dpa' yis// slob ma me tog 'dor du gzhug
237b5: phyag rgya gang la de babs pa'o// de de'i lha mo bsgrub par bya// de nas gdod g.yogs dgrol byas la// rnam pa kun gyi yon blangs nas// sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur gyis// dam tshig gsum ni gsal bar sbyin/
237b6: de la rdo rje chen po'i mna'i chus dbang bskur to// 'di skar brjod par bya'o// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na sreg par bya// dmachog bsrungs na dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub// rdo rje
237b7: dril babrag tu ni gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smras// skye bo 'dus pa'i nang na gnas// dad pa med pas bzhad rgad spyod// zhes bya bas mna' bskrag go// de la sangs rgyas kyi rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga ni 'di yin te//
237b8: rdo rje chu yis dbang bsar nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog dbang babrang ba'i gnas su bzhag ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA sa ma ya a ti pa ti s+t+wa~M// ad+hiShany+tsa mi man+ta badz+ra d+har zhes bya ba'i sngag 'das

238a1: rdo rje lag tu sbyin par bya'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// rdo rje 'chang gis rdo rje ste// rdo rje 'chang gi brtul zhugs che// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// byang chub mchog gi sem
238a2: chen po// yongs su mi srang rtag tu bsgrubs// shin tu gsang ba de 'di yin te/ oM badz+ra kar ma bA d+hi d+hi shrI badz+ra nA ma sid d+ha sa ma ya s+t+ra b+hu bub sa/ gang la rdo rje'i ming btags pa de la kye'i sgra dang por snang bar bya'o// de'i ming de ya
238a3: ci srid byang chub snying po'i mthar thug pa'i bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang ming du 'gyur ro// de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum sbyin pa ni 'di yin te/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sem
238a4: dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba lnga'i de kho na nyid bshad par byas nas
238a5: rdo rje sbyin par bya'o// 'di bcom ldan 'das srid pa'i bdag po dam pa kun gyi mchog dbang phyug gi dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid chos kyi mchog gi bka' yang dag pa stsol bar mdzad pa ni// srid pa rang bzhin nyid kyis dag
238a6: rang bzhin gyis ni srid bral byas// rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog/ srid pa mchog ni mdzad pa yin// mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid 'bebs pa ni dril bu'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod par bya ba'am/
238a7: lha bsgrubs dkrol bar bya'o// de nas chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rab tu sad pa'i phab pa rnams kyis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa yin no// rdo rje thams cad 'bebs par byed pa dang rab tu sgrub par byed pa dang /
238a8: dbang du byed pa dang rab tu dad par byed pa zhes bya bar bsgrub par 'gyur ro// de nas srid pa dag pa'i thabs kyis mchog rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po dam tshig la rtag tu rten par bya'o zhes bya ba'o// de la 'di ning khyod kyi srid

238b1: bde shin tu gyur ba ni// sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir// shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs// dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu bskyed// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la// ci 'dod par ni bsten bzhin du// rang gi lha'i sbyor ba yis// dag/
238b2: dang gzhan la mchod par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i theg pa chen po yang chen po dam tshig gi sbyor ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig go/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa kun
238b3: gyis kyang // 'da' ba ru ni mi mdzad pas// phyag rgya dam tshig zhes ni bsgrags// yid kyi sku ni brtan phyir ro// zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di brjod par bya ste// ci srid
238b4: 'khor ba'i gnas su ni// mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe// ci srid mtshungs med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// gsang ba'i dam pa dam tshig thabs// bsod nams byin gyis brlabs bsgrubs pa//
238b5: rtag tu dngos grub kun dbang phyug/ sems can don ni byed pa yin// dam tshig 'dis ni mchog sgrub cing // ci bde bar ni sgrub byed pa// nyes pa spyad kyang sdig kun gyis// rnam pa kun tu gnod mi 'gyur// 'dod pa chen po grub
238b6: par 'gyur// kun bdag dam tshig dbang phyug dang // thams cad rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa'o// las kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyis// ma lus bsgrubs pas 'grub par 'gyur// bdag gzhan thams cad
238b7: rgyas btab pas// yang na bsgrub bya kun la yang // don yod mchog tu grub pa dang // rnal 'byor thams cad rjes grub byed// dpal ldan sdug bsngal kun 'phrog byed// dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o// zhes bya ba mchog
238b8: tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rdo rje la sogs thob 'dzin pas// dngos grub kun gyi bde ba kun/ phab pas rdo rje slob ma yis// dkyil 'khor du ni nyams su myong // de nas thams cad

239a1: bzengs stod pas// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid dngos// rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur bas// de bzhin gshegs ni lung bstan bya// de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lung bstan pa'i rdo rje sems
239a2: dba'i tshig 'di yin te// sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag rgya ma// gzengs stod pa yis gang lung bstan// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba'o// oM 'dri nangs khyod lung bstan ste// rdo rje sems dpa'ade
239a3: bzhin gshegs// srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir// srid pa'i ngan 'gro las khyed ston// he badz+ra na maHta thA ga ta sid d+ha sa ma ya staM b+hur bu bas/ gang la gzengs stong pa 'di dang phyag rgya chen por lung bstan pa mchog tu gsang
239a4: b a'i tsho gas byas pa de la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje 'chang dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
239a5: rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon rnams dang mgrin cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par mdzad do// 'di lta ste gzengs bstod pa 'di nyid kyi phyag rgya chen po dang mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i
239a6: dngos grub kyis byin gyis brlabs pa 'di dang sngags kyi stobs la dad pa bya'o// de nas ci lta ba bzhin du zhugs pa rnams la// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa la sogs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba sbyin par bya'o///
239a7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'chang dang bcas pa/ ci snyed pa byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad rang gi dam tshig la rjes su chags pas 'dir dgug pa dang
239a8: tu gzhug pa dang dbang du bya ba dang bsgrub pa dang rjes su sgrub pa rnams kyis rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad brtan par gyur pa nyid kyis/ 'di bstan par 'gyur ba chos kyi dbyings thams cad kun tu khyab pa nyid kyis/ kun tu

239b1: zhugs pa/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi rgya che ba nyid kyis 'dir rab tu bzhugs shing / legs par rab tu bzhugs pa gang yin pa de dang de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig la rag las pa'i
239b2: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la lhag par dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di yin no// zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs nas/ de bzhin
239b3: gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon gyis dam tshig gi mgrin gcig tu khyed rnams la dbugs dbyung ba mdzad pa yin te dang bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i
239b4: dbugs dbyung ba 'di yin te// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// mthong ba dang ni zhugs pas kyang // sdig pa kun las nges grol zhing // khyed rnams der nyid legs par gnas// bde chen thob pa 'di las ni// slar
239b5: 'chi ba ni yod min te// mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pas// cis kyang mi 'jigs rol par gyis// srid pa'i sdug bsngal ldog pa ni// srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir// ston pa mchog tu gyur pa khyod// srid pa shin tu grub pa yin/
239b6: dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di// khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs// dam pa rtag pa'i bka' yin no// gang zhig skyed pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas nyid du ngogs med pa'i// byang chub
239b7: sems ni gtang mi bya// phyag rgya rdo rje gang yin pa// dam pa'i chos ni mi smod cing // nam yang btang bar mi bya'o// mi shes pa'am rmongs pa yis// des ni smad par mi bya'o// rang gi bdag nyid yongs spangs nas/
239b8: dka' thub rnams kyis gdung mi bya// ci bde bar ni bde bar gzung // 'di ni ma byon rdzogs sangs rgyas// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya rnams// nam yang yongs su spang mi bya// slob dpon smad par mi bya ste// 'di ni sangs

240a1: rgyas kun dang 'angadra// sangs rgyas kun mtshungs tha ma yis// slob dpon la ni gang smad pa// des ni sangs rgyas kun spad pas// rtag tu sdug bsngal thob 'gyur ste// rims dang drug dang sbyang drug dang // ma3/
240a2: 'gro rnams kyis gtses pa dang // gdon dang log 'dren gtum po yis// gsang nas sems can dmyal bar ltung // de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// rdo rje slob dpon blo gros che// dge ba rab tu mi spyoms pa// nam
240a3: yang smad par mi bya'o// bla ma la ni gus bcas yon// rjes mthun khyod kyis sbyin par bya// des ni rims stsogs gnod pa rnams// phyir zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rang gi dam tshig slob dpon ni// sbyin min bu dang chub
240a4: ma dang // rang srog gis rtag bsten byas na// longs spyod g.yo ba smos ci dgos// gang gis bskal pa bye bar ni// grangs med par mi rnyed dka' ba'i// sangs rgyas nyid kyang brtson ldan la// tshe 'di nyid la ste ra bar byed// rtag tu
240a5: rang gi dam tshig bsrung // rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod// rtag tu bla ma la yang 'bul// 'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra// de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la// rtag tu sbyin pa nyid du 'gyur// de byin bsod nams
240a6: tshogs yin te// tshogs las dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur// de phyir 'di ni legs gnas pas// deng khyod skye ba 'bras bur bcas// rang byung dam tshig lha dang mnyam// deng khyod gyur par the tsom med// sangs rgyas
240a7: rdo rje 'dzin bcas par// kun gyi deng khyod dbang bskur bas// khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che// rgyal po'i bdag por bstan pa yin// de ni bdud las rnam rgyal te// grong khyer mchog tu rab tu zhugs// khyed rnams
240a8: kyi ni sangs rgyas nyid// de 'dir thob par the tsom med// ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje 'chang dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan

240b1: 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu bden pas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon dang / slong
240b2: ma'i tshogs rnams kyis dbugs dbyung ba ni 'di yin te// phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgya yis// byang chub sems dang lhan cig bskyed// sangs rgyas nyid kyang rtog bya ste// zhes bya'o// de'i rgyu gang yin zhe na/ gang phyir khyed rnams
240b3: kyi bdag nyid thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa tsam gyis mthu nyid kyis phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba yin no// phyir mi ldog pa nyid kyi phyir nges pa'i phung po la rnam par gnas
240b4: pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par rjes su rtogs par bya'o zhes bya'o// de nas thams cad kyi dpal dam tshig
240b5: gi slob dpon gyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dbugs dbyung ba 'di yin te// rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag sbyor ba// rnal 'byor kun dang rjes sbyor ldan// sangs rgyas nyid du rtogs bya ste// mkhas pas mchog tu rtag pa'o zhes byong
240b6: de'i rgyu gang yin zhe na gang gi phyir khyed rnams kyi bdag nyid thams cad 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig yongs su bzung ba gdon mi za ba nyid kyi phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par
240b7: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa nyid du rtogs par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal// rang gi dam tshig gi rjes su sgrub pas mchog gi dngos grub rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid
240b8: du de dag rtogs par bya'o// de'i phyir gnas skabs thams cad du yang ci nus pas sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba thams cad kyi skabs mi 'byed pa khyed rnams kyis rang gi bdag nyid thams cad kho na rjes su bsrung zhing bsad

241a1: bar mi bya'o// ci snyed pa'i longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i dam tshig gi sbyor bas yang dag par mchod la/ bde bar/
241a2: bzung ba dang yang dag par 'phel bar bya'o// bdag nyid la ci lta ba bzhin du mngon par brtson pa de bzhin du gzhan rnams la na tshod skyed pa yin no// lta ba log pa dang phyi rol mu stegs pa dang nyan thos pa thams cad dang
241a3: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bas lus 'di shin du gsang ba yin no// ngag ni shin tu mi smrabs so// sems ni shin tu 'gog pas so// gang gis kyang khyed kyi lus ngag yid kyis rdo rje rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
241a4: gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dpal rang gis dam tshig gi bla na med pa'i dngos grub mchog tu rtag par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba yang gsungs so// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad kyis// cis kyang mi 'jigs rol par gyis//
241a5: dmatshig 'di ni 'da' dka' ste// sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs shig/ ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas mchog tu bden pa gsungs so byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thug/
241a6: la dgongs pa yin no// de ltar yid ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis// rang gi dam tshig mi zad bde ter snyenan gyis// de ni 'gro la myur ba de rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rab tu mnyam zhing rtag tu nyid du rtogs par gyis// de nas ro dang bza' dang
241a7: spyo pa gar dang glu// rol mo'i mchod sogs kyis ni mgon mchod pa// rdo rje bla ma chen pos de phul nas// rang dang gzhan dag ci 'dod mchod par bya// myos byed byos bral btung ba ni// ci 'dod par ni bsten pa yis// klu dang
241a8: rol po'i tshi ga stsogs// ci bzhin rjes 'gro'i bzlas pa bya// rang gas tshogs blangs pa yi// glu dang rol mo gar rnams kyis// sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa dang // rdo rje sems dpa'i rol mo stsogs// bud med

241b1: rtsog pa dang ldan pa'am// rang gi slob ma dang bcas pa// ci 'dod pa yi longs spyod kyis// mchod pa byas pas myur du 'grub// zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la gsang ba'i tshe
241b2: ga'i glu'i khyad par ni 'di yin te// hUM bcom ldan 'das mchog dang po'i rdo rje sems dpa'i'o// a// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi'o// hi dpal 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i'o// oM pad pa'i snying po'i'o// ha nam
241b3: mkha'i snying po ste// byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rgyal po nam mkha'i snying po yin no// zhes bya ba gsungs so// rang gsang snying po'i glu dag ni// yi ge lnga pos bya ba ste// rang gsang tshogs blangs pa 'di// mchog tu gshegs pa kun/
241b4: kyi yid// de nas mchog tu gsang ba rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni// rdo rje dril bu mnyam sogs bcas// rnam par dben par rol po dkrol// rang gsang tshogs glu blangs pa// gsang ba'i rol mos rab tu bsgrub// de nas mchog tu
241b5: shin tu gsang ba'i rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa ni// 'dzin pa dang bcas gzung ba tshe'i// gar ni rab tu byas nas kyang // dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'i gar byas nas// yongs su bskor bas rang mchod bya// de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya
241b6: sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha'i// rtog pa thams cad rnam 'phrul pa// gtam rgyud phyag mtshan phyag rgya yis// gang zhig gar de rol mo yin// gser rab yang na dngul dang ni// de bzhin shing
241b7: las byas pa yi// rang gi lha'i gdong rnams kyis// grub pa'i phyag rgyas gar rnams bya// dkyil 'khor gang dang gang bsten pa// phyag rgya sna tshogs mchod pa yis// slob ma'i tshogs ni de dang de// bzla zhing thams cad mchog
241b8: tu gzhug/ sna tshogs cho ga 'di yis ni// sdig pa kun las rna ba grol 'gyur// bsod na pas kun kyang 'phel 'gyur te// rtag tu srung bar gyur pa yid// ribs dang gdon dang dug dang nad// sbyar drug pakha' 'gro'i 'tshe

242a1: ba dang / bdud dang gsod par byed pa rnams// 'dis ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// dngos grub dag ni phun tshogs 'gyur// dga' ba de bzhin bdag po rnams// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi// rnal
242a2: 'byor dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bya ba shin tu gsang ba'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas balhag pa'i lha thams cad re re'i mchog gsang ba 'jug
242a3: pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa mngon par brjod nas// rdo rje slob dpon gyis byas pa'am de las gzhan ci 'dod pa'i glu dang rol mo rnams kyis rtog pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i mchog tu grub pa
242a4: zhes bya ba ste/ de re shig thog ma kho nar bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po'i rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i glu'i mchod pa ni// thams cad rjes su chags pa bde ba dam pa'i thugs// rdo rje sems
242a5: dpa' khyod ni rab dga' dam tshig ste// bde ba chen po brtan zhing mtho ba gsal gyur cig/ so sor rtogs nas mngon du phyogs shing lhur bsgrubs shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dmachig
242a6: gi 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa sdus pas na// rdo rje rin chen bla na med// rdo rje chos ni glu blangs pas// rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i rdo rje
242a7: glu'i mchod pa ni/ hUM rdo rje mda' gzhu dang bcas khyod la 'dud// rdo rje chags pa'i dam tshig dpal khyod 'dud// kha T+wAM 'jig dus rdo rje khyod la 'dung// rdo rje dril bu bskyod pa'i dpal khyod la 'dung// de nas pad ma'i rigs thams cad kyi mchog tu
242a8: gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni/ la lar skye bo ma drangs pa'i srog 'phrog byed pa shin tu drag po'i sku/ la lar 'gro ba mtha' yas 'dul phyir shin tu rno ba'i 'khor lo 'dzin pa'i sku// la lar pad ma'i gdan gyi shin tu

242b1: zhi ba'i sku ste 'gyur pa med pa ste/ la lang shin tu 'bar ba'i 'dod pa'i dam tshig pad ma'i rgyal po bdag bsgrubs shig/ de nas nor bu'i rigs thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa
242b2: ni/ dbang skur thams cad dbang phyug dam pa las// yang dag bsgrubs shing mi zad gter gyis mchog/ kun mchog rgyal mtshan rnam rgyal bsgreng pa las/ rdo rje ran chen dpal bdag legs mchod gyur// de nas ming po
242b3: gsum gyi ni thur bu ba swa/ de nas sring mo bzhi rnams kyi// tri hUM shrI b+h+yo/ de nas klu'i rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ni/ phu phu/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje'i sdig pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje grwa
242b4: mchod pa ni/ sarba ma ga man Da la mi daM badz+ra d+ha rA kra ma be mar d+ha bi ki ra b+ha na dza ud sA d+ha ya/ nA sha ya ha na da ta pa tsa b+ha smi ku ru kro d+ha hUM kA ra man tri na/ de nas thams cad kyi mchog dbang phyug dam pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i mchog
242b5: tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni/ la lar dri med zla ba'i dkyil 'khor stong gi 'od kyis sku ni rnam par mdzes// la lar 'jigs dus nyi ma 'char ka bye ba'i 'od zer tshogs ni 'jigs cher 'bar// la lar mdangs dang
242b6: 'od zer dang ldan bde zhing zhi ba'i rgyal ba'i sku 'dzin pa// la lar shin tu mdzes pa'i gzugs 'chang mchog gi mda' dang bcas pa'i gzhu 'dzin pa/ la lar gdul bya rnam par spyad phyir brtson pa'i rdo rje sems khyod mkha' bzhin
242b7: bzhugs// pa lus 'dul ba mkhas pa'i bde ba dam pa nyid phyir bdag la grub gyur cig/ de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga dam pa'i gsang ba'i mchog dpal dam tshig gsum gyi 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa ni
242b8: 'di yin te/ dngos grub kun gyi bde ba nyams dga' ba'i// thar pa'i grong khyer bcom ldan pa de chen 'jug/ mchog tu bde ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyis// dza hUM baM ho/ rab tu grub par mdzod// de nas shin tu mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga

243a1: mchog tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i dam pa dpal dam tshig bla na med pa'i mchog tu shin tu gsang ba'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa mchog tu shin tu grub pa zhes bya ba mngon par brjod nas/ shin tu mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje glu'i
243a2: mchod pa'i glu dang gar gyi cho gas ci lta ba bzhin du rjes su bsgrubs nas/ so sor rjes su bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu shin tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rtog pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs
243a3: pa'i dam tshig chen po'i mchod pa mchog tu shin tu grub pa'i yin no zhes bya ba yang gsungs so// sna tshogs cho ga 'di yis ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa yin// kun mchog sna tshogs chen po yi// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab tu
243a4: grub// zhes bya ba shin tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de ltar dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gtam rgyud sna tshogs can// mchog tu gsang ba'i rol mo bla na med pa'i dngos grub
243a5: nyams dang ldan pa ste// gang gis sna tshogs pa'i rgyal mtshan mthon po dang ldan kun du rjes bsten pa// mchog gi dngos grub bde ba chen po nyid ni de yis yang dag nyams su myong // don yod mchog tu bsod nams ldan// cho ga mchog
243a6: tu rtag pa ste// kun mchog gsang ba chen po ni// dngos grub thams cad myur sgrub byed// gang zhig grong khyer mchog dgyes par// zhugs te sgrub par byed rnams ni// shin tu mchog gi 'dod pa yis// dngos grub dbang phyug bde des
243a7: thog// gang gis dngos grub ma thob dang // bsod nams phun tshogs byed pa rnams// dkyil 'khor mchog tu rab zhugs na// bsgrub po 'dir ni rab grub 'gyur// gal te rdo rje sems dpa' mchog/ snying po stsogs kyis ma grub
243a8: dang // nye ba'i snying pos bsgrub byas kyang // ma grub 'dir zhugs grub par 'gyur// dpal mchog dang po'i rtsa rgyud du// de bzhin myur du grub pa yin// ci lta dang po'i khyim bzhugs nas// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor grub pa ltar// dkyil

243b1: 'khor thams cad grub pa yis// de ltar thams cad grub pa min// ci ltar mchog tu gsang ba yi// khang bzangs dam pa mthong ba yis// dam tshig rnams la nyams pa dang // sgrib pa kun gyis bsgribs pa dang // bdud sgrogs
243b2: gdon gyis reg pa yang // rtag pa'i thar pa thob par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa 'am// yang na dkyil 'khor ma grub pa// slar yang mchog tu rab zhugs na// de dag myur du grub par 'gyur// sgrub min yang 'dir
243b3: cung zad med// dngos grub las dang bde de bzhin// dngos grub thams cad bzhi 'gyur du// rtog pa kun las bsgrub par bya// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dpal mchog dang po las de
243b4: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga shin tu gsang ba rdzogs s+ho// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gsum gyi dam tshig mchog gi gsar ba'i
243b5: cho ga'i mchog ni 'di yin te// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// dam tshig chen po gsum 'di yin// byang chub sems dpa' mchog 'dzin pa'i// ras la dkon mchog gsum bri bya// go cha dang bcas rdo rje mchog
243b6: go cha stsogs kyis legs par brgyan// rdo rje mtshon cha brjod pa dang // pad ma rin chen mchod pa'o// 'khor lo de ni rtags nas su// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'o// ci rigs par ni bsgrub byas nas// sum 'gyur du ni
243b7: 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po zhes bya ba'i snying po mchog gi dngos grub ma lus pa ste ra ba 'di yin te// oM b+hu kha~M// khyim 'am yang na nags tshal lam// snga ma bzhin du brgyan nas
243b8: ni/ mtshon cha mchog gi cho ga yis// thams cad byas nas 'di brjod bya// de nyid kyis na bcom ldan 'das// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// lha ngan rnams la phan pa'i phyir// 'di dag mya ngan 'das pa snyom//

244a1: ma lus 'dul ba la brtson pas// brtan zhing nges pa'i cho ga bgos// shin tu srid pa la gnas mchog/ go cha la sogs bgos pa yin// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun zhes// dkon mchog gsum du gyur pa
244a2: yin// srid pa shin tu bsgrub pa yi// rnam par dag pa'i dpa' mdzad mchog/ zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje'o// de nas mchog du gsang ba'i chos nyid kyi dril bu ni/
244a3: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// nam mkha' dang mnyam sbyor ba yis// kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal ba zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// de nas dam tshig
244a4: chen po gsum gyi sdom pa zhes bya ba ni// longs spyod kun la longs spyod pa// rang lha bdag nyid kyis bsten na// dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i mchog/ bdag gis bya zhes brjod cing mchod// zhes bya ba ni de bzhin
244a5: gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'o// thabs kyi cho ga 'di yis ni// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyang // bza' min bza' ba bza' byas na// rtag pa'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// zhes bya ba ni de bzhin
244a6: gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig chen po gsum mo// de ltar brjod nas snying po byin la phyag rgya bcing ba slob du bcug nas ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa bsgrub par bya'o// de nas rdor 'dzin slob
244a7: dpon gyis// rdo rje mchod pas mchod nas ni// ci 'dod pa'i mchod pa yis// slob ma thams cad mchog tu gzhug/ longs spyod kun la longs spyod kyang // dkon mchog gsum po la phul ba// 'dod pas bdag
244a8: dang gzhan rnams la// mchod pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// dpal mchog dang po las mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga'o/// de nas rdo rje chen po khro bo'i rgyal po'i mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga ni/

244b1: ras la bcom ldan bri bya ste// rdo rje'i rigs kun bdag po ni// rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar// cho ga ci bzhin mchog tu'o// de'i pad 'dab cig bzhugs pa// de'i 'od kyis 'khor lor rten// gsang ba'i rdo rje rnal 'byor
244b2: che'i// mkha' 'gro ma rnams logs la bri// dang por dmar dang dkar po dang // gzhan ni thal ba ltar dkar ba// gsum po dkar dang lta ba skye// bzhi pa gser ltar dri med pa'o// rdo rje gtum po'i dbang phyug grub// rdo rje Shan+d+ha
244b3: bsgreng dang bcas// rdo rje 'dod pa me ltar 'bar// de yi logs la mtshan ma gtod// rdo rje khyab 'jug ma rdo rje'i// 'khor lo gtod pa de bzhin gzhan// rdo rje dril bu ba dan ma// de'i logs na g.yon snyems ma// cung zad mcha
244b4: gtsigs pa yis// khro dang bcas pas zhal bzhad pa// rang bdag la ni thugs gtad cing // sku ni zur gyi phyogs pa bzhugs// de nas 'dir ni snying po ni/ hUM/ de nas nye ba'i snying po ni// rdo rje dril stsogs lhan cig tu// rnam dben
244b5: rol mo brdungs pa las// ti yi glu dang rol mo ni// brdung zhing zur bzhi rab tu bsgrub// zhes bya ba ni 'dir bzlas pa'i cho ga'o// 'khor lo der ni bstan byas nas// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// mtshon cha mchog gi
244b6: cho ga yis// cho ga thams cad rgyas pa'o// de nas de kho na nyid dang chos dang dam tshig gi cho ga sbyin pa ni// rtag tu chags pa las byung khro// rdo rje me yis phung po sku// 'bar ba'i rdo rje khro bo che// rab 'bar ba'i tshogs kyi sku// rdo
244b7: rje 'bar ba'i rnal 'byor che// mkha' 'gro ma rnams kun tu 'bar// zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'o// de nas chos ni/ thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// nam mkha' dang mnyam rnal 'byor pas//
244b8: thams cad mur ba nyid du bsgrub// nam mkha' kun mchog sbyor ba yis// thams cad nam mkha' zhes brjod cing // rdo rje phyag rgyas rgyas btab pas// 'jig rten gsum yang za bar byed// ces bya ba ni/ rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi

245a1: mkha' 'gro ma'i mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig go/ cho ga 'di yis thams cad du// mnyam par gzhag pas bsgrub par bya// kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi// las kyi tshogs rnams mi zad pa'o// zhes bya'o// de nas/
245a2: tsi lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i tsho gas rang gi phyag rgya rnams kyis gar gyi mchod pa byas nas 'grub par 'gyur ro// dpal mchog dang po las rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi cho ga'o// de nas mchog tu phra ba dang / shin tu bzang ba'i
245a3: rdo rje yi// grub chen gsang ba'i rnal 'byor gyi// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo bshad// grong khyer skyed mos tshal stsogs ni// ci lta bar bzhin rgyas byas nas// rdo rje 'dzin kur slob dpon gyis// ci bzhin du ni bsgrubs pa yi//
245a4: yid 'ong bzhi dang lhan cig tu// rang gi phyag rgyas me tog gtor// ci lta ba bzhin grong khyer 'jug/ g.yon pa'i kha ni gyen du gtod// rdo rje drag po gzhad chen po// sgra sgrogs mchog gi phyag rgya yis// 'jug te mgo la phyag
245a5: 'tshal bya// de la phyag ni 'di yin te/ oM zhes bya ba brjod byas la// shin tu dga' ba'i dbus rlung gis// ru lu ru lu l-I drug ldan par ma'i ru lu ru lu l-I ste/ 'di ni rdo rje drag po'i phyag 'tshal ba'i sgra sgrogs pa'i mchod ces bya ba 'dir/
245a6: rdo rje phyag gi phyag rgya ste// phyag rgya thams cad dang gzhan rmongs pa dang thogs pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang las thams cad la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas mchog
245a7: tu shin tu gsang ba 'di gsungs so// de nas yid 'ong dam bcas pas// me tog sil ma dor nas ni// rdo rje pad ma'i dbang bskur gyis// dam tshig gsum ni gsal bar sbyin// de la rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ni 'di
245a8: yin te// pad ma'i thod pa las bya ste// de yang rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pas na// rdo rje pad ma zhes bya ba'o// de nas 'dir phyag rgya bcing ba ni// sor mo thams cad phan tshun sbyar// kun mchog rtse mo dang bcas pa// mthe bo

245b1: rdo rjes dka' ba ni// rdo rje pad ma zhes 'grub po// rdo rje pad ma'i phyag rgya 'dis// rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba'i sbyor ba dang / rdo rje pad ma'i rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur bar bya'o// 'dis dbang bskur ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs
245b2: p a rnams kyis shin dugadrug pa dang drag po dang rab tu gtum pa dang ma rungs pa'i sems can thal bar brlag nas thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba khams gsum ma lus pa'i stobs chen po dang ldan pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs
245b3: thams cad ces bya bar byin gyis brlob par 'gyur ba dang // mchog tu brtag pa'i bsrung bar yang 'gyur ro zhes mchog tu shin tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nyid kyis ni rdo rje bzung // chos
245b4: kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya// dam tshig gi ni phyag rgya cher// byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla// rdo rje la sogs thob pa bzung // rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa 'dra// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug grub// rdo rje can gyis byin brlabs
245b5: 'gyur// bud med rnams kyang 'bebs gyur nas// ston pa'i rdo rje phab pa yis// rdo rje dang bcas phyag mtshan 'dzin// rnal 'byor ma rnams rab tu 'gyur// de la thog mar re shig rdo rje nyi ma che ltar 'bar ba chen po thal ba de rab tu
245b6: zlog pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i khro bo'i rgyal po'i bdag po mchog dang po yang dag 'bebs par byed pa ste// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po'i thabs kyis 'khong du
245b7: ' dzin pa'i khro bo'i me 'bar ba'i rdo rje rdo rje dang bcas pa'i kha T+wAM ga'i rgyal mtshan dang nges par sbyor ba bdan dang bcas pa'i dril bu 'chang ba rdo rje snyems pa'i bdag po shin tu khro ba 'bebs pas sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i smin 'tsham
245b8: kyi khro gnyer shin tu 'jigs shing 'jigs par byed pa'i spyan ser po dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i 'jigs pa chen pos 'jigs par byed pa'i spyan gyis lta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis stong phrag satu

246a1: bzlas pas 'grub par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su chags pa dang dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang dbang du bya ba dang 'bebs par nus pa'o// thams cad nam mkhar sbyor ba'i ting nge
246a2: 'dzin dang / lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis khams gsum ma lus pa'i rdo rje bdud rtsi la sogs pa'i bdud thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gdug pa dang drag po dang rab tu gtum pa dang ma rungs
246a3: pa'i sems can rnams dang mkha' 'gro ma drag po thams cad dang gang zhig nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams te/ de dag kyang thal bar rlog par 'gyur na// dgra bo la sogs pa gzhan rnams lha mos kyang ci dgos//
246a4: don yod cing thogs pa med pa dang dngos grub thams cad dang las kyi tshogs rnams la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i thabs shin tu drag po 'di'i man ngag gi bzlas pa
246a5: ni/ sna'i dbugs phra ba nyid kyis bden pa'i rdo rje tshig gis grub pa'i yid kyis 'dod pas las thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi tshogs rnams la dam pa'i mchog tu grub pa'o// hUM de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
246a6: ma'i lha chen po rnams kyis bshad par bya ste/ de la thog mar re shig rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i lha mo chen mo rdo rje gzhu dang mda' stong pa'i spyan g.yon pa ste/ rdo rje spyan gyi lta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis thams cad bsku
246a7: par mdzad pa dang sgeg pa dang bcas shing g.yo ba'i spyan gyis zur gyis gzigs pa'i phyag rgyas gab btsam gyis thams cad la rgyas khebs par mdzad pa dang don yod pa thogs pa me dngos po thams cad las kyi tshogs rnams la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o//
246a8: de nas bcom ldan 'das yum 'di'i rdo rje phra ma'i g.yon pa'i khro bo'i bzlas pa ni/ yid kyis 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang / las kyi tshogs rnams la mchog tu grub pa'o// hrIHgnyis pa ni rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba'i

246b1: dam tshig gi lan zhes bya ba'i lha mo ste// dbus su rang gi lhag pa'i lha stod pa'i zhal 'dzum pa'i spyan cung zhig 'dzums shing // dga' ba chen po rdo rje spyan gyi lta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa dang tsum pa dang 'khyud
246b2: pa la sogs pa'i reg pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa tsam gyis thams cad la rgyas 'debs par mdzad pa dang / phyag rgya thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa dang thams cad kyis gsod par mdzad pa dang don yod cing thogs pa med
246b3: bar dngos grub thams cad dang / las kyi tshogs rnams la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das yum 'di'i bya rog gi mgrin pa'i dbyangs kyis rdo rje ngag gi khro bo'i bzlas pa ni yid kyis 'dod pa'i
246b4: dngos grub thams cad dang / las kyis tshogs rnams la mchog tu grub pa'o// hA/ gsum pa ni rdo rje chen po'i 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba thal bar rlog pa zhes bya ba'i lha mo chen mo ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje chen po dang kha T+wAM ga'i
246b5: rgyal mtshan 'chang ba sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i bzhad pas smin 'tshams kyi khro gnyer gyi khro bo'i spyan ste/ rdo rje chen po'i khro bo kI li ki la khro bo'i spyan gyi lta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa'o// badz+ra zhes bya ba dang ru lu
246b6: ru lu ru luM tI zhes bya ba tsam gyis bdud thams cad 'joms pa dang / don yod cing thogs pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang / las kyi tshogs rnams la dgongs shing mchog du grub pa'o// hi/ bzhi pa ni rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i
246b7: me 'bar ba thal bar rlog pa'i 'chi ba slong ba zhes bya ba g.yon snyems pa g.yas pas rang gi spyi bor rdo rje dril bu bskyod par mdzad pa sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i spyan shin tu gdangs pa ste/ rdo rje rgyal po drin gyi spyan gyis lta ba'i byab
246b8: rgyas thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa thal lcag la sogs dang gzhang gang dang rdeg pa dang phyag rgyas rgyas btab pas 'ching ba thams cad slong bar mdzad pa/ don yod cing thogs pa med pa dngos grub thams cad dang las

247a1: ba// kyi tshogs la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das yum 'di'i drol bu'i dbyangs kyi rdo rje khro ba'i bzlas pa ni yid kyi 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang las kyi tshogs thams cad la mchog tu grub pal/
247a2: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i khams ltar grangs med cing // rdo rje nyi ma las byung ba// nam mkha' kun gyi gnas skabs kyi// dkyil 'khor 'di la rabazhugs pa//
247a3: rdo rje mchog gi rnal 'byor gyi// dbang phyug ma lus kun nas 'babs// de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor pa ston pa des rnal 'byor pa rang gi logs dag tu dgod pa yin te// bla tshes dkyil 'khor rnam pa yis// dkyil 'khor gyis ni dgod
247a4: par bya// dgod nas thams cad kun mchog gi/ dngos grub dam pa bsgrub par bya// thams cad dgug dang mchod pa che// bdag byin brlab stsogs grub pa yis// shin tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de// brtag pa dang ni bsgrubs nas
247a5: kyang // rdo rje 'dzin kun slob dpon gyis// rdo rje slob ma rnams gzhug bya// de la re shig thog ma kho nar slob dpon gyis bcug ste/ tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du dam tshig gsum gyis byin gyis rlabs kyis rdo rje rnal khyod ma rnams logs
247a6: cig du gzhag nas// skyes pa rnams kyang gzhug cing byang chub kyi sems kyis rdo rje chen po'i khro ba'i dam tshig dang dam tshig sdom pa dag len du gzhug par bya'o// khye'u dang bu mo rnams rab tu gzhag la tshogs dang bcas pa'i rang
247a7: nyid kyis zhugs te bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sbab thams cad bya'o// de nas 'dir slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// mchog tu bskyed pa byas nas ni// gar byas spyi bor thal sbyar mched// slab ma
247a8: thams cad gzhug par bya// ci 'dod pa'i dngos grub skyed// slob ma me tog dor du gzhug/ rnal 'byor ma ni gang la babs// de dang de'i lha mo 'grub// de nas gdod g.yogs dkrol nas ni// rnam pa kun tu yon blangs nas// rdo rje

247b1: pad ma'i dbang bskur gyis// dam tshig gsum ni gsal bar sbyin// 'dir man pa sgag pa dang dbang bskur ba ni de nyid do// de la 'dir dam tshig gsum sbyin pa ni 'di yin te// mi byed pa dang so sor rtogs// gdug pa thams cad
247b2: gnon pa dang // sangs rgyas kun dngos rdo rje ste// byang chub sems ni che zhing brtan// mtshon cha de ni rgyal kun gyis// kun tu bzang po'i lag tu sbyin// bstan pa thams cad grub pa'i phyir// de phyir phyag na rdo rje yin// de nas rdo rje nyi ma me ltar
247b3: 'bar ba'i mchog tu gsang ba ni// rtag tu chags pa las byung khro// rdo rje sems dpa' gdul bya'i phyir// rdo rje nyi ma ma ltar 'bar// mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa yin// de nas mchog tu gas ba'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi mkha'
247b4: 'gro la rnams kyi gsang ba mchog gi da khon nyid ni/ rdo rje nyi ma 'chang bas byung // de bzhin gshegs pa'i grib ma 'di// sprul te ma lus bdud la sogs// gdug pa'i khrag ni gsol bar spyod// ces bya ba ni gsang ba mchog gi de lo
247b5: na nyid do// de nas 'dir mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid 'bebs pa'i dril bu'i// shin tu gdug cing drag po dang // bdag po drag pa'i bu rnams dang / shin du gnyid ni log pas dag/ rdo rje mchog ni 'dzin pas gsungs// zhes bya ba
247b6: nibacom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid 'bebs pa'i rdo rje kha T+wAM ga'i rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyis dril bu thams cad 'bebs pa dang / rab tu grub par byed pa dang // thams cad ltung bar byed pa dang /
247b7: slong bar byed pa'o// de nas rnal 'byor mchog gi dam tshig ni// khrag chen ga bur dang bcas pa// tsan dan dmar ngang sbyar ba ni// tshogs kyi nang du rab zhugs nas// rdo rje dang bcas rdo rje 'dzin// srin lags me rtse mo yis//
247b8: nam mkha' thams cad sbyor mchog ldan// zla ba'i btud pa bzhin myangs na// rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing // ci 'dod pa ni bston bzhin du// nam mkha' kun mchog sbyor ba yis// dngos grub

248a1: thams cad thob par 'gyur// nam mkha' kun mchog sbyor ba yis// nam mkha' thams cad ces brjod cing // rdo rje'i phyag rgyas btab pa yi// 'jig rten gsum yang bza' bar bya// dngos grub las dang de
248a2: bzhin bde// 'di la cung zad mi 'grub med// las kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyis// dngos grub ma lus sgrub par 'gyur// don yod mchog tu grub pa dang // gdug pa thams cad gnon par byed// sdug bsngal kun 'phrog dpal
248a3: dang ldan// rnal 'byor 'di ni las kun byed// ces bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas ro dang bza' dang spyod pa gar dang glu// rol mo'i mchod pa sogs kyis mgon la mchod
248a4: phul ba de yis rdo rje bla ma che// dad pas bdag dang gzhan rnams mchod par bya// myos bcas myos byed btung ba ni// ci 'dod par ni bsten pa yis// rdo rje nyi ma mi 'bar sogs// ci bzhin rjes 'gro'i bzlas pa bzla// rang
248a5: gsang tsho gas brangs pa yi// glu dang rol mo gar rnams dang // sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa dang // khams gsum rnam rgyal la sogs pa// bud med tshogs dang bcas pa yi// mchod pa rgya chen thams cad dang // ci 'dod
248a6: pa yi longs spyod kyis// mchod pa byas na rab tu bsgrub// ces bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa la sogs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba
248a7: sbyin par bya ste// 'gro ba kun gyi khams rnams kyi// phra rab rdul dang mnyam pa nyid// rtog pa'i rgyal po grub pa ste// sangs rgyas la sogs mchog grub pa'o// gang zhig blo ni dpag med pa'i// khyad par du ni dmigs mi//
248a8: 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pas bde ba ni// dam pa thams cad bsdus pa'o// zad pa thams cad zad 'gyur dang // 'phel ba thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur// gang zhig mthong bas mi snar 'gyur// gang nas yang ni 'jigs

248b1: med byed// drag po dbang po nye dbang zla// nyi ma mkha' 'gro tshogs dkyil 'khor// khros nas yi ge hU~M tsam gyis// ma lus pa ni thal bar byed// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor// mchog tu zhugs te mthong nas ni//
248b2: sdig pa kun las rnam grol te// khyed rnams dang ni rab tu gnas// slar khyod 'chi ba yod min te// khyad par du ni ngan 'gro med// gzhan gyis mi thub mi sod cing // cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis// shin tu srid pa'i dngos
