270b1: sungs so// de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje bsnyems ma'i phyag rgyas thams cad bsgrub pa'o// rdo rje mtshon chams thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba dang rjes su chags pa'o// rdo rje kI li kI las rab tu dga'
270b2: ba'i reg bya dang / dngos grub thams cad bde bar grub pa'o// rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas 'thab mo thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'o// rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mas bdag po chen po nyid do// dus kyi mchod pas mchod
270b3: par 'gyur ba nyid do// rdo rje gso bas thams cad 'dul ba'o// rdo rje dor rabs thams cad gsod pa dang / thams cad 'phrog pa'o// g.yon pa bsnyems shing g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi las rnams kyis sgyu ma dang
270b4: 'phrul thams cad dang / so sor ston pa dang / rmugs pa dang / rengs pa dang / gnyid log tu gzhug pa dang / bskor ba dang / bskrad pa dang / 'bru dang ltung ba 'pho ba dang / dbang du byed pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad
270b5: bslab par byed pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje thal mo las byung ba'o// rdo rje sku mchog gis dngos grub thams cad do// 'dzub mo gnyis kyis lcags kyus dngos grub thams cad do// rdo rje gnod sbyin
270b6: byas bdug thams cad la sogs pa'i gdug pa 'dul ba'i de nyid kyis mthe bo'i rdo rjes bkab pas thams cad rnyed pa'o// de nyid kyis mthe bo gnyis bcug pa'i gtsug tor rdo rjes thams cad bsrung ba'i mthe bo rdo rje nang du bcu
270b7: pa de nyid kyis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad rjes su chags pa dang dgug pa dang / dbang du byed pa sgrub pa'o// mthe'u chung rdo rje sen mo gnyis kyi rtse mo gnyis 'dzub mo gnyis kyis legs par
270b8: gzung bas mtho ba ni dpal dgug pa dang dbang du byed pa'o// rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi rgyal mo de nyid kyis nor thams cad dang dpal dbrog pa'o// de nyid kyi dbus ma gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis kyi rtsem

271a1: yongs su bcing bas bdud la sogs pa'i gdon las grol ba dang / dbang du byas nas las thams cad la sbyor ba'o// rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes yul thams cad kyi mchog bsgrub pa'o// de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya
271a2: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje las byung ba'o// sems dpa' mnan nas rdo rje lha mo rol du gzhug pa'o// de yang rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje chen pos rgyas btab pas so// rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes so// de bzhin gshegs pa
271a3: thams cad kyi tshogs pa dang bral ba'i 'khor los so// 'dzub mo dang / dbus ma dang / srin lag gi 'khor lo sgreng bar byas la mthe bo dang / mthe'u chung mnyam la dral bar bya ste rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje bsgrub pa de kho na nyid kyis
271a4: rgyas btab cing bsgrub par 'gyur ro// bci bas 'dod pa thams cad rab tu bsgrub par byed pa'o// 'dzub mo lcags kyus 'dod pa thams cad kyi bde ba dgug pa'o// 'dzub mos phrag dog la sogs pa'i 'dod pa thams cad
271a5: kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi ba'o// rtags bstod pas rab tu dga' ba 'bebs shing de nas bsgrub pa'o// sku gnas g.yo bas bud med dang skyes padag gis rab tu dga' ba la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'dod pa thams cad kyi bden pa
271a6: chen po shin tu mtha' yas pa'o// kha sbyor bcing bas ci srid 'tsho ba'i bar du 'dus pa dang bral ba yang ngo // rtags kyi sen mo g.yon pa'i mthil brud pas shin tu brtan pa'i 'dod pa la chags pa nyid du 'gyur ro// gzhan gyi 'dod
271a7: pa dang mi lta zhing gzhan la mi 'gro bar shin tu bde ba dang yid bde ba ster ba'i bud med thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// skyes gnas kyi sen mo brud pas skyes bu rnams so// de nas thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi gsang ba'i phyag
271a8: rgya bcu ste// de la lus thams cad kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje kha tshur gnyis kyis 'khyud lam mchu so rnams kyis bzung ste/ rmongs pas bde ba steng du gzhug bsgrub pas rab tu dga' ba'i dngos grub kyis rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu

271b1: 'grub par 'gyur ro// mchog dang po'i dngos grub kyis su ra ta s+t+waM zhes bcom ldan 'das la brjod cing de kho na nyid bskul ba grub par 'gyur ro// rab tu dga' ba'i ye shes kyis thams cad bsgrub pa'o// lag pa g.yon pa'i bu tshug par
271b2: reg na thams cad bsgrub pa'o// bde ba chen po rdo rje las blang ba'i rdo rje chen po'i ltabs thams cad grub pa'o// smin bgyen du bteg pas ltung ba slong ba'o// nga gi ma mchu nang du myang bas skal ba bzang po chen po bsgrub pa'o//
271b3: rang gi lce bskyod pas rang nyid kyi bden pa thams cad dang de kho na nyid gsal zhing mi slu bar smra ba'o// rang gi lus la 'bebs pas gzugs thams cad yongs su bsgyur ba ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' 'am sangs rgyas su yang 'gyur ba
271b4: yin no// rang gi bdag nyid rdo rje bsgoms pas nam mkha' la 'gro ba'o// de nas dang po las thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje thal mo kha T+wAMgs so// dngos grub thams cad rdo rje khu tshur dag gis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
271b5: khu tshur dag gis dngos grub thams cad do// thams cad gsod pa ni khro bo'i khu tshur dag gis so// thams cad sbyar ba'i pad ma'i khu tshur dag gis so// nor thams cad dbrog pa ni nor bu'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad
271b6: 'bebs pa ni thams cad 'bebs pa'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad gar byed du gzhug pa ni kha T+wAM ga gtor ba'i khu tshur dag gis so// thams cad smad gzhug pa ni 'dzub mo mnyam pa'i lce'i khu tshur dag gis so// thams/
271b7: cad bstod pa ni brtan pa'i 'u tshur dag gis so// thams cad gzhug cing don yod par bsgrub par ni rdo rje lugs kyu'i khu tshur gyis so/// de nas rdo rje kha chung gnyis kyis ci 'dod pa'i lag pa'i sor ma'i phyag rgya bcu ste/
271b8: don yod cing thogs pa med par skad cig mas myur du grub par byed pa 'di lta ste/ pi bang dang / gling bu dang / rdza rnga dang / mu kuN Da dang / cha lang dang / rnga bo che dang / rnga zlum dang / rnga pa Da ta dang / 'gun dza dang / ti mi la ste/ 'di

272a1: rnams kyis rgyas btab na thams cad du rjes su chags pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / 'bebs pa dang / rims dang / drug dang / smar dug dang / gdon las grol ba dang / gsod pa dang 'thab mo las rnam par rgyal/
272a2: ba dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob pa yin no zhes bya ba gsungs so// 'dod chags chen pos rnam dag phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yin/ phyag rgya'i rtog pa rab tu brtags// rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog/ de nyid
272a3: dad pa'i rjes 'brangs la// rtogs pa tsam gyis skad cig gis// don yod kun grub bde bar gsol/ zhes bya'o// dpal mchog dang po las mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud rdzogs so//
272a4: de nas mchog tu mkhas shing mtha' las 'das pa tshad med cing gzhal du med pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i mchog gi dngos grub chen po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu dam
272a5: pa grub pa zhes bya ba rdo rje gar las byung ba'i tshogs thams cad kyi phyag rgya stong bshad par bya'o// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// phyag rgya chen po mnyam bzhag nas// sgeg bcas 'dzum la sogs
272a6: bkrol ba yis// las kyi phyag rgya chen po brgya// thams cad gar gyis bsgrub par bya// bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i lcags kyus khyad par du las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ste brgya phrag dang po mchog tu bsgrubs te rdo rje dam tshig lha mo
272a7: rnams kyis phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni// kha sbyor nang du gsal ba ste// mchog dang po'i gsang chen gyis// las kyi phyag rgya rgya gzhan yin zhes bya ba rdo rje lha mo gsang ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje las kyi
272a8: mchod pa che'i// thal mos spyi bor bzung nas ni// las kyi phyag rgya grub pas na// dbang po rnams dang sbyar bar bya// zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje snyems mas gar bya zhing // sgeg

272b1: bcas mthe'u chung sogs bkrol bas// de nyid bcings nas gar bya zhing // khyim 'di ni 'byung ba yin// zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyilas don yod pa'i dam tshig grub pa'i dbang phyug chen po'i mchog gi phyag rgya brgya'o// rdo rje thal
272b2: mo mnyam bzhag nas// thams cad kyi ni bsgrub par bya// mchog dang po'i las chen po'i phyag rgya mchog gzhan yin no zhes bya ba rgyal mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya// mda' lnga bsdus pa bcings nas ni/ las kyi phyag rgya bde brgya/
272b3: rab tu dga' mchog ma bkrol bar// bde ba nyid du mngon par sbyar// zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i 'dod pa ma'i phyag rgya'o// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// ci bzhin phyag rgya mchog sbyor bas// las kyi
272b4: phyag rgya sna tshogs brgya// mchog dang po ni rab tu rtag/ ces bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje lha mo'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje lha mo'i kha T+wAM ga/ lus kun gyi ni gar bya zhing // rdo rje gar mchog glu blang zhing // dang
272b5: bo'i phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba'o// ci ltar gong du rgyas gsungs pa// rol mo mchog gi phyag rgya'i tshogs// rol mo rdung zhing daglu len pa// phyag rgya kun gyis gsal brgya/ zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi
272b6: phyag rgya ste phyag rgya stong mchog tu grub pa'o// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i mkha' ltar grangs med pa'i// phyag rgya'i rgyal mo grub mchog ster// kun mchog
272b7: dngos grub chen po yi// dbang phyug chen po'i mchog grub phyir// nam mkha' kun gyi go skabs kyis// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni rab tu zhugs// dam pa mchog tu grub pa dang // dam pa mchog tu grub par byed// mchog gi
272b8: dam brgyud chen po// dam pa mchog gi dngos grub ster// rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog/ de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brangs la// phyag rgya kun gyi tshul 'di ni// bstan par bya ste gzhan la min// de ltar mchog tu mi

273a1: 'gyur dam pa'i dngos grub bde ba yi// mchog tun ma dag rdo rje ba de grub mtha' yas 'bras bur ldan// dpal mchog dang po'i gsal ba'i de nyid mchog gi rtswa'i tshul lo// mchog tu rtag pa'i rtog pa'i tshul 'di
273a2: yongs su mthar thug pa'o// dpal mchog dang po las dam pa mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud rdzogs so//// de nas sems dpa' chen po kun// rdo rje 'dzin dang bcas pa'i mchog/ rdo rje 'chang
273a3: chen gtso bo ni// mgon la bde gshegs rnams kyis gsol// kun mchog nam mkha' chen po yi// dngos grub dbang phyug rab grub phyir// rtog pa thams cad kun bsdus pa'i// de nyid sems dpa' chen pos
273a4: gsungs// rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la// rtog pa'i don 'di gang brjod pa// gang gis rgyud 'di phyi ma la// dang po'i gnas mchog ci ltar lags// de bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// rab dga' nyid dang bzang ba
273a5: nyid// rdo rje snyems bdag ci ltar lags// sems dang sems dpa' ting 'dzin dang // de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje 'chang chen nyid dang ni// byang chub spyod pa ci ltar lags// bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid// byang chub sangs
273a6: rgyas ci ltar lags// rdo rje gtum po thar byed nyid// phyag na rdo rje ci ltar lags// ci ltar dang po'i rigs byung dang // 'dod pa thar pa ci ltar lags// ci ltar mgon po rnam gsum dang // khyod ni ci ltar thams cad nyid// dang
273a7: po'i snying po ci ltar byung // de ci nye snying ci ltar lags// bde chen rdo rje chen po yi// don yod dam tshig ci ltar lags// dkyil 'khor zhes bya ci skad gsungs// de yin ma smin ci lta bu// thig gdab pa dang brtag pa yis//
273a8: dngos grub ci ltar gsungs pa lags// gsang ba lnga yi de bde ba// ci ltar gyur pa ci lta bu// dkyil 'khor bdag po rnams dang ni// rigs rnams gsal ba ci ltar lags// thams cad dbang bskur de nyid dang // phyag mtshan

273b1: tshogs kyi de nyid dang // thams cad dgug gzhug mchod pa che// bdag byin brlabs sogs sgrub pa tshe// de ni de nyid gsad pa dang // don yod pa ni mchog nyid de// mi 'gyur dam pa grub pa'i phyir// thams cad bdag cag
273b2: rnams la gsungs// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi mad gsungs so// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// rtog pa kun gyi bdag po ni// the tsom tshogs rnams gsan nas su/
273b3: de'i lan ni gsungs pa yin// de la rtog pa'i don gyi rgyud ci ltar yin zhe na// rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams las// sems can don ni yongs rtags pas// des na rtogs par gsungs pa ste// rtog pa yongs su
273b4: dag phyir ro// de nas rgyud phyi ma ci ltar yin zhe na// rgyud ni rgyun zhes bya bar bshad// phyi ma sngar dang yang dag byung // de nyid gsang ba'i gsang ba dang // phyi ma dang bcas rgyud du 'dod// de la dang po gnas shes bya ba'i
273b5: rgyud ci ltar yin zhe na// nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas// rdo rje kun mchog rab bzhin mchog/ bde ba chen po dga' ba che// grong khyer der ni mi 'gyur mchog/ ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
273b6: dpas rtog pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba 'di gsungs so// de la thog ma tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' ci ltar yin zhe na// nam mkha'i skye ba mtshan ldan phyir// thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/
273b7: sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar brjod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de gang yin zhe na// kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi// dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi
273b8: rgyal// rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog/ de la bcom ldan 'das dga' ba chen po nyid ci ltar yin zhe na// nyes pa med cing shin tu rtag/ 'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa// de nyid 'di yis gsang ba 'di/

274a1: 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che// de la ci kun tu bzang po nyid ci ltar yin zhe na// shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog/ gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// byang chub sems
274a2: dpa'i cho ga mchog/ de la rdo rje bsnyems bya'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das ci ltar yin zhe na// kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi// dbang phyug chen po phyag rgya'i mchog/ rdo rje dbang phyug cher bstod pas// rdo rje bsnyems
274a3: pa'i bdag po bdag ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o// mchog dang po'i de nyid 'di// rdo rje sems dpa' gang yang brjod// dngos grub kun gyi 'byor pa rnams// de la thams cad grub par 'gyur//
274a4: zhes bya ba mchog gi de kho na nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas de'i 'og tu las kyi bya bas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mchog nyid du bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
274a5: dpas gsungs so// de la bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sems can ci ltar yin zhe na// bsam gyis mi khyab rgya che ba// zab dngos kun de mi 'gyur ba// thams cad khyab cing dri ma med// byang chub sems ni bdag
274a6: brtan pa// de nas 'di'i las kyi khyad par ni// sems nyid brtan pa nyid sems pas// ting 'dzin de la mnyam par gnag/ rnam shes las ni rdo rje kun// rdo rje las ni 'dzin 'gyur te// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin
274a7: ces yin nen// sems dpa'i byin pa rlabs sbyor ba ni// bdag la byin parlabs mchog bsgrub pa// nyin re sgrub par byed na des// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob 'gyur// de la bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po 'i spyod la cig
274a8: yin zhe na// snying stobs rdul dang mun pas kyang // gang phyir sems can don grub pas// da phyir de ni kun tu bzang // byang chub spyod pa'i rjes 'jug pa'o// de la ci star bcom ldan 'das bdud nyid dang 'dul bas rgyal ba

274b1: ltar yin zhe na// sems nyid kho na bdud nyid de// sems nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rang sems gdul bar bya ba'i phyir// bdag ni bdud nyid gyur pa yin// de la ci ltar bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang
274b2: chub dang sangs rgyas yin zhe na// rang sems so sor rtog pa'i phyir// byang chub sems mchog rdo rje nyid// de phyir de nyid sangs rgyas nyid// bdag byin brlabs mchog grub phyir ro// de ci ltar bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje yin/
274b3: zhe na/ mi byed so sor rtogs pa dang // gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon// sangs rgyas kun dngos rdo rje ste// byang chub sems ni brtan pa bdag/ kun tu bzang po'i lag tu ni// mtshon cha de ni rgyal bas byin// brtan pa thams
274b4: cad grub pa'i phyir// des na phyag na rdo rje des// de lta ci ltar dang po'i rigs las byung bas shes pa'i rgyud yin zhe na// shes rab pha rol byin pa yum// yab ni thabs la mkhas pa ste// rdo rje sems dpa' gdul bya'i phyir/
274b5: rigs rnams rab tu byung ba'o// de la ci ltar bcom ldan 'das 'dod dang thar pa yin zhe na// bcom ldan 'das ni chags pa che// dngos grub thams cad rjes chags phyir dngos grub thams cad mi 'gyur ba de// bde ba chen po zhes
274b6: brjod pa'o// de la ci ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gsum yin zhe na/ bdag ni dus gsum mtha' yas phyir// de ni srid gsum gdul bya'i phyir// gsum mchog 'jig rten gsum kun phyir// 'jig rten gsum nga khams
274b7: gsum pa/ de la ci ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad nyid zhe na// de nyid brtan pa thams cad pade// bsod nams kun mchog che ba'i phyir// g.yo ba sems kyis 'dus byas phyir// sgyu ma thams cad nga yin no// zhes bya ba dang
274b8: gi las kyi bya ba'i de kho na nyid rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la ci ltar dang po'i glu byung ba shes pa yin zhe na/ srid pa shin tu grub pa yi// dbang phyug chen po mchog grub phyir// gzi can sems can don mdzad phyir// skal

275a1: pa thog mar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// de nas de gang yin zhe na/ 'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das rab tu dag ba mi 'gyur mchog/ gsang ba'i phyir ni snying por brjod// yi ge hA ni mi 'gyur mchog/ de nas nyi ba'i snying po yi// de kho na nyid shes pa ni// de nyid gsang zhing gsang ba dang // snying po rab tu
275a2: 'arjod par bya// snying po rjes su sgru ba par byug// ba'i snying pog du brjod// de ba ci ltang bde ba chen po dza don yod padam tshig gi bshad pa'i rgyud yin ne na/ sa cu bkun gyi mi 'gyur bde// de ba chen po zhes brjod do// rdo degi don yod kug/ dang tshig 'da' ba dka' ba'o// zhes bya 'i mchog gi dam pa'i rgyu maldan
275a3: ga rdorje sems dpas gsungs so// de ba ci kyi co byi na shes pa yin nen/ lta gnas dang 'or yo dang / tsiH dargod nga gro ba dang / 'od dang cas pa rgod pa gang/ de su'i 'or lom chog gis sbrul// denas rnam par shes pa ni/ sems stsogs lha rnams kyi/ 'khor lo mngon sum mthong ba yis//
275a4: na/ pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba// byir na bris na'ang de bzhin no// de nas thig gdab chog ni// shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bris// phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs la// shar dang nub dang byang dang lhor// thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad// rdo thig gis yongs bskor ba// babargyad kyis nyer mdzes shing // sgo ba ni
275a5: rtababs pa khyer dang // dbang byed la sogs brgyad// de dag po don shes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' ji lta bu zhe na// nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir// thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog rdo rje sems dpa' che ra bzhin// bal mchog dang po zhes byar brjod/ den bcom ldan 'das de gang zhe na// namachog dngos grub chen pa yi// dbang //
275a6: rtsu rkyen rtog pa // don dzin pakun rgyal// bdu ga mi byung mchog/ byasacom ldan das rdo 'dzi pas gsus so// de nas spyan das gzigs dbang gis// pad ma dAg dang mtshus pa// thams cad dag pa than med// rnaM rje mas dpa
275a7: rang bdag nyid// stan ngas gzigs kyi dang drug nyid de nas pad ma'i rigs kyi de'on nyid ni// rdoni chos nir bgrub byir// sems can thams cad rnam dag byir// padam chen po'i rigs dag pa'i// ting 'dzin ye shes kun nas sdus shes bya'o//
275a8: de yin ma pa 'o dang pa yin no/ thams cad nam mkha' bcom ldan 'das/ sems can pasod nams mthong zhing che/ rnam ma pa'i snying bsems dpa'

275b1: dang / de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi ni// dbang bskur ba dang gter dang ni// rdo rje rgyal mtshan mchod pa che// nor bu chen po'i rig grub pa// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'o// zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi de lo
275b2: na nyid chen po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba shes pa ni/ sangs rgyas rin chen rdo rje byed// rdo rje rin chen rdo rje la// spyan ras gzigs la rdo rje sku// nor bu nor/
275b3: bu'adzin pa'o// de nas mchog dang po'i phyag mtshan gyi de kho na nyid do// kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi// dbang phyug chen po'i mtshon cha che// gsang ba lnga yi de nyid che// rdo rje rtse lnga zhes brjod do// de nas rigs thams cad
275b4: kyi phyag mtshan gyi de kho na nyid shes pa ni// sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas nyid// sna tshogs bya ba rdo rje can// 'jig rten dbang phyug rdo rje chos// nor bu nor bu bsags pa'o// zhes bya ba dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi phyag
275b5: mtshan gyi de kho na nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la ci ltar thams cad dgug pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ rtog pa thams cad gsang chen gyis// rdo rje lcags kyu dril bcas pas// bkug ste
275b6: nas rjes bsgrub pa// dril bu nyid kyi bya ba yin// ci ltar mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga yin zhe na// rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyis// rab tu dga' bas mchod nas ni// glu dang rol mo rnam 'phrul bas// mchod de slar
275b7: yang rnal 'byor mchod// de la ci ltar dngos grub thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid yin zhe na// rtog pa kun gyi gsad chen gyis// phyag rgya kun gyis legs byin brlabs// dam tshig chen
275b8: po 'di nyid kyis// rang nyid bsgrubs nas snying po bzlas// thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po bdag/ ces bya ba mchog

276a1: dang po'i skyes bu'o// de ci ltar rang lhag pa'i lha thams cad kyi bsgrub pa chen po'i rgyud yin zhe na/ brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba dang // rtog pa kun las bsgrub bya gang // rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas// de dag thams cad
276a2: bsgrub par bya// de nas thams cad rjes su bsgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ rdo rje dril bu 'dzin gyur nas// rdo rje dril bu rab sad cing // rtog pa thams cad rjes bsgrub pas// mchog dang la sogs 'grub par 'gyur// de la ci ltar 'bad
276a3: pa med pa thams cad bsgrub pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ bsgrub bya ci 'dod bsgrubs nas ni// phyi nas ci ltar 'dod pa yis// ci 'dod spyod pa la spyod cing // thams cad byed cing thams cad bza'// langs pa 'am ni 'dug pa'am//
276a4: gang dang de ru 'chag pa'am// dgod pa dang ni smra ba'am// gang der ci bzhin de bzhin no// dbang po gang dang gang la ma gyur// de dang de yi ngo bor bya// mnyam par gzhag nas rnal 'byor gyis// rang gi lhag pa'i lha
276a5: sbyor bya// de nyid rnal 'byor 'di yis ni// thams cad nyid ni bsgrub par bya// sangs rgyas kun dngos thams cad ni// rtag tu mthong zhing grub par 'gyur// dam tshig chen po de nyid ni// mkhas pa gang zhig dad pas
276a6: klog/ de ni sdig kun dang bral bas// dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug 'gyur// zhes bya ba dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid do// de ltar dpal mchog dang po'i cho ga ma nyams mchog gi bla ma gsal// mchog tu gsang
276a7: ba bsgrub pa'i cho ga bde mchog myur du grub phyir gsol// rdo rje mchog 'dzin dang bcas bde gshegs sras bcas rnams kyis byin brlabs pa// bde chen dam pa rdo rje 'dzin pa dga' chen mchog gis de gsungs
276a8: so// dpal mchog dang po las mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga/ de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// mkha' ltar thug med kun tu 'gro// sangs rgyas kun gyis bstod nas ni// rtog pa'i mthar thug don gsungs so// bdag gi snying

276b1: po dang bde mchog chen po'o// bde chen mchog gi mchog dang rjes su chags pa che// kun mchog sems dpa' rnams kyi rtag tu 'byung gnas ni// kun mchog 'byor pa'i dang dru 'di ni gso ba yin// mtha' yas pa
276b2: dang thog med mthar thug med pa ni/ mchod bya chen po thams cad rnams kyi tshul chen po// nam mkha' dang mtshungs mchog gi dngos 'phel gsol// de ni sras kyang mthar thug byed par nus pa min// sems can rnams
276b3: ni dman la zhan cing nyung la dga'// dad pa med cing bslu ba byed la ma sbyangs pa// rtag tu rjes su chags shing chags bral la chags pa// de rnams la ni phan phyir 'di ni mthar thug pa'o// gang gi khyim na 'di gnas
276b4: gang gis rab tu bsgrubs pa 'am// yang na ji bzhin gsungs pa rtag tu 'dir bsgrub byed// so sor nyams su myong ba'i mthu yis thams cad du// bdud kyi las tshogs rnams kyis de ni gnod mi nus// rdo rje 'chang
276b5: stsogs sgra ni gang gis sgrub byed pa// gzugs rnyan las sogs thams cad 'dir ni ci bzhin gsungs// des ni thams cad so sor nyams myong nus par ldan// bdud kyi las tshogs rnams kyis de ni gdon mi nus//
276b6: gang zhig rdo rje las sogs gzugs brnyan la sogs pa// ci ltar 'dod pa 'di dag thams cad bsgrub par byed// rab tu 'dod pas yi ge hUM las bris nas ni// 'dod pa'i dngos grub de yis ster zhing thob par 'gyur//
276b7: rgyal po rnams kyis rnam par sbyangs par mdzad pa ni// gang la don kun dag phyir mdzad par mi 'gyur min// 'dir ni bgegs byed bdud rnams kyang ni yod ma yin// rtogs pas dngos grub 'phel zhing byin gyis
276b8: brlabs pa yin// nga ni bdud nyid mi 'gyur brtan med nyid mi 'gyur// brtan pa nyid phyir nga ni brtan par mdzad pa yin// rtag pa 'di ni mchog chen gang gis sgrub byed pa// de la de ni dngos grub myur du sgrub par byed//

277a1: dngos grub chen po las thams cad du rjes su chags shing shin tu mnyes pa dang // shin tu brtan pa dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / rtag tu rgya che bar 'gyur ba yin no// gang zhig mchog gi rgyal po snying po sgrub bya pa//
277a2: rgyal ba thams cad dgyes shing rgyal ba dgyes par mdzad// de dag grags pa chen po thob nas bde ba'ang thob// de phyir 'di la dad cing gus par bya ba yin// de nas rgyal ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la legs so/
277a3: zhes bya ba byin te// yab mchog sangs rgyas sras ni legs so legs// sras mchog sangs rgyas sras ni legs so legs// rdo rje mchog ni rdo rje 'byung ba legaso legs// dam pa chos kyi bdag nyid legs so legs/
277a4: sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang dag byin brlabs pa// rtag tu mi 'gyur don yod grub pa che// ci ltar dang po'i grub pa de bzhin du// phyi nas kyang ni de bzhin grub par 'gyur// de ltar ngag chen gsungs nas ni// sras dang
277a5: bcas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yi// gsung la rjes su yi rang mdzad// dpal mchog dang po las rtog pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi cho ga rdzogs s+ho//
277a6: thugs dam pa'i snying po thaM yid du/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po ba Na Di ta mkhas pa chen po man tra kA la she dang / sgra skyur gyi lo ts+tsha ba lha btsan po dge slong bla ma zhi ba'i 'od kyi zhal snga nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab
277a7: pa// / lon+do chen po rin chen bzang po yis// dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud 'di bskur ba la// bar bar dpe ma rnyed pas ma 'gyur nas// bdag gis 'bad pas
277a8: dpe btsal rnyed pas bsgyur//

277b1: rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA na ya sha ta pany+dza sha ti ka/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul brgya lnga bcu pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
277b2: bal phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mkhyen pa'i bye brag rnams tha dad pa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che
277b3: thams cad kyis cod pan gyis khams gsum du dbang bcu rdzogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ rnal 'byor can chen po'i dbang phyug/ de bzhin gshegs
277b4: pa thams cad kyi phyag/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa/ sna tshogs kyi bya ba mdzad de/ ma lus pa na sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i 'phrin las mdzad
277b5: thugs rje che ba rnam par snang mdzad chen po// rtog pa khams gsum gyi mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs pa/ sku dang gsung dang / thugs thams cad rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas/
277b6: 'dod pa'i khams thams cad na nor bu rin po che chen po rab tu spras pa dang / ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dril bu brgyus pa rlung gis bskyod pa dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga ma dang / rgyan phreng dang / chun 'chang dang / zla ba lta bus
277b7: mdzes par byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs pa/ shis pa thams cad bstod pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgya dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
277b8: chen po lag na rdo rje dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / 'jam dpal dang / sems skyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / byang chub

278a1: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi stobs thabs cad rab du 'jobs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bya ba phrag brgya dang thabs cig ste/ yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis lhas nas chos ston te/ shes rab
278a2: kyipha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba yang dag par
278a3: ston te/ 'di lta du dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// 'dod chags kyi mtha' rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// rig pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub
278a4: sems dpa'i gnas so// mtshan ma rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// des na 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni lta ste/
278a5: byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// gti mug rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// nga rgyal rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// phrag tog rnam par dag shin de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub
278a6: sems dpa'i gnas so// sdug pa'i 'ching ba'i rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// thams cad la dbang phyug dang / dbang rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// lta ba rnam par
278a7: dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// sred pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// snyems pa
278a8: rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gan so// rgyan rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gan mo// yid tshim par byed pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// snang ba

278b1: rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// lus bde ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni de lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i
278b2: gnas so// sgra rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gan so// dri rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gan so// ro rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// reg rnam par dag pa'i
278b3: gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gan so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos zad ni ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa ste/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// lag na rdo rje su la las chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam
278b4: bar dag pa'i sgo sgrub pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di lan cig thos na yang de byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du sgrib pa thams cad dang / mchod pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang chos kyi sgrib pa dang las kyi sgrib pa chen po gsags kyang sems can dmyal ba las sogs
278b5: bangan song du rnam kyang skye bar mi 'gyur/ sdig pa yang byas ma thag tu sdug bsngal med par byang bar 'gyur ro// su zhig 'dzin pa dang / nyin re zhing klog pa dang // kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa der tshe 'di nyid la chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin
278b6: thobs chos thams cad la dbang skur bar 'gyur ro// chos thams cad pa dga' ba dang / bgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba myong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshe bcug drug gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'al/ rdo rje 'dzin thob par gyur ro// nas bcom ldan
278b7: 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa/ theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad ga rdo 'dzin mtha' dag gis sems can gyi mchog khams gsum malus pa mtha' dag na 'jig rten gsum po thabs cad las rnam par rgyal pa/ sems can gyi khams
278b8: gu la med par 'dul ba/ don thams cad grub pa/ dam tshig chen po pa rdo rje gsang ba'i sems can chen po du mas g.yog byas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi don 'di ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum ni pa lag pa g.yon pa rdo skyid te thog pa'i rdo chen po gsor/

279a1: nas rang gi snying gar stod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di smras so// hUM de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad
279a2: kyis yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhi ba'i chos nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par sgrub pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// rdo rje sra ba nyid kyi phyir rdo rje mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs
279a3: par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o// don cig pa'i phyir don gyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o// ngo bo nyid kyi rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa
279a4: ni byang chub chen po'o// thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o// lag na rdo rje sa la la chos mngon par sgrub pa bzhi po 'di dag nyan pa dang / 'dzin
279a5: pa dang klog pa dang / sgom pa de sdig pa thams cad spyod kyang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du ngan song thams cad las yang dag par 'das par 'gyur ro// myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur
279a6: ro// de nas de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa don gnas 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing bzhin rab tu 'dzum dmyal te chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi snying po 'di smras so// a/
279a7: de nas ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kyang yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par rgyal ba bsdu ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa 'di bshad
279a8: de/ 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid do// zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid kyis gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid do// gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid kyis chos thams cad spros pa med pa nyid do//

279b1: chos thams cad kyi stos pa med pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med pa nyid du rig par bya'o// lag na rdo rje sul la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa des
279b2: 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir khams gsum du bskyes pa'i sems can thams cad gsad kyang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur
279b3: ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje chos nyid 'di'i don rgya cher ston te/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas khro gnyer dang bcas shing smin ma bteg ste/ 'bar bar lta la pad ma'i
279b4: gdong khro zhing dgod de/ mche ba gtsigs nas rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang ba'i tshul du gnas pas gnas nas rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ngo bo nyid dag pa'i chos nyid pas
279b5: yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na zhe sdang thams
279b6: cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// dri ma thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na sems can thams cad rnam par dag par
279b7: 'gyur ro// shes pa thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang /
279b8: sgom pa de 'dod chags dang / dri ma thams cad kyi nang na 'dug kyang pad ma lta bur 'dod chags kyi nyes pa rnams dang / dri ma rnams dang / blo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag/

280a1: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don gnas 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing bzhin rab tu
280a2: 'dzum dmyal te/ pad ma'i 'dab mkha' byed pas 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri mas mi gos pa la lta zhing 'gro ba thams cad kyi phyir pad ma gzugs sna tshogs shes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// hI/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de
280a3: bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang pos yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba las byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ dbang bskur
280a4: basbyin pa ni khams gsum thams cad kyi rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro// nor sbyin pa ni re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos sbyin pa ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// zang zing sbyin pa
280a5: ni lus dang ngag dang sems kyi bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po bzhin rab tu 'dzum ste/ rang gi mgo la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i phreng
280a6: ba 'ching zhing don 'di nyid rgya cher ston te/ dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi dam tshig rin po che zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// tAM de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya thob pa de bzhin
280a7: gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur 'dzin pa de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ de
280a8: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid tu 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni chos thams cad thob

280b1: par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni lus
280b2: dang ngag dang / sems can thams cad rdo rjer dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur ro// su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang 'char ba dang / klog pa dang / lud 'bogs pa dang / sgom pa des dngos
280b3: grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / shes pa thams cad dang / dgos pa thams cad dang / lus dang ngag dang / sems can thams cad rdo rjer rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob nas/ myur du
280b4: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i khu tshur dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin
280b5: khas don gnas 'di rgya cher bstan te/ de bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje sra pa'i phyag rgya dngos grub thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ aHde nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad spros pa
280b6: med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas yang 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// mtshan ma med pa'i
280b7: tshul gyi chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'o// smon pa med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad smon pa med pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o// de nas/
280b8: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa don 'di nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin 'dzum bzhin du ral gri des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bdebs shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po mchog

281a1: 'di smras so// a de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor lo chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// rdo rje
281a2: mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro// don gyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro// chos thams
281a3: cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro// thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag tu
281a4: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba chos nyid kyi don 'di rgya cher ston cing 'dzum dmyal nas rdo rje'i 'khor lo skor zhing rdo rje'i 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
281a5: pal mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i snod kyis mchod pa thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// byang chub kyi sems skyed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga
281a6: rgyas pa'o// sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga
281a7: rgyas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / brjod pa dang / ston pa dang / nyan pa dang / sems pa dang / sgom pa dang / mchod pa byed pa ni de bzhin
281a8: gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod don de'i nga rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing las thams cad don yod pa'i dam tshig

281b1: ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// oM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg pa sems can thams cad la 'dul nus pas yang ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa sems can thams cad 'dul ba shes pa'i snying po zhes bya
281b2: bshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khro ba mnyam pa nyid de // sems can thams cad 'dul ba nyid pas khro ba 'dul ba nyid do// sems can thams cad
281b3: nyid pas khro ba chos nyid do// sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas khro ba rdo rje nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba ni byang chub bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi stobs thams cad
281b4: rab tu 'joms pa don de nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje'i mche ba'i phyag rgya dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyis rdo rje khro bo'i gad mo zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// ha/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
281b5: gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas yang chos thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam
281b6: pa nyid do// thams cad don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don nyid do// thams cad chos nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos nyid do// thams cad las nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyid du rig par bya'o//
281b7: denas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yod pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas don yod pa thams
281b8: cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang sems can thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu

282a1: phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pas/ sems can thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can no// thams cad rdo rje'i snying pos dbang bskur/
282a2: ba nyid pas sems can thams cad ni rdo rje'i snying po'i can no// gang thams cad rab tu 'byung bas sems can thams cad ni chos kyi snying po can no// sems can thams cad kyi bya ba byed pa la sbyor bas sems can thams cad ni
282a3: las kyi snying po can no// de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyis ca co'i sgra chung nas/ chos nyid kyi don rgya cher ston cing snying po phul te/ de nas rdo rje'i dbang phyug chen pos rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo// dI/ de nas ma
282a4: mo thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ tshig mthun par thams cad dgug pa dang / gzung ba dang / gzhig pa dang / sgrub pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo// b+h+yoHde nas sbrang rtsir byed
282a5: pa la sogs pa ming po gsum gyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ tshig mthun par rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo/ sra/ de nas sring mo bzhis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di
282a6: phul lo// hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas mu med la mthar thug cing mu med pa'i chos dang ldan pas yang chos 'di mthar thug par byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa/
282a7: nyid kyi mthar thug pas byin gyis brlab pa rdo rje zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' yas pa nyid do//
282a8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid pas rdo rje thams cad mu med pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa du ma nyid pas chos thams cad du ma nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthar thug pa med pa nyid bas

282b1: chos thams cad mthar thug pa med pa nyid yin no// su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzod dang 'a yag/ klog pa dang / ston pa dang / brjod pa dang / sgom pa de sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
282b2: dpa'i spyod pa zug pa med pa'i mthar phyin te/ sgrib pa thams cad zad nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di don
282b3: yod pa dang // thogs pa med par myur du 'grub par bya ba'i phyir lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin no// sems can chen po legs so legs// bde ba chen po legs so legs// theg pa chen po legs so legs//
282b4: blo gros chen po legs so legs// cho ga 'di ni legs par smras// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin kun gyis// 'bras bu yod pa 'dul ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mdo sde byin gyis brlabs// cho ga'i rgyal po bla na med// gang rnams 'di dag
282b5: 'dzin pa ni// bdud la sogs pa thams cad kyis// de dag mi sod mi tshugs so// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // dngos grub dam pa thams cad kyang // sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa bzhin// ring por mi thogs
282b6: thob par 'gyur// de skad gsungs nas gsang grub phyir// rdo rje can gyis bshad pa la// kun mchog sangs rgyas mkhas bcas pa// thams cad kyi ni mngon par bstod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
282b7: p ar snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid brnyes pa chos thams cad spros pa med pas yang bde ba chen po rdo rje'i don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rdo rje don yod pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid shes
282b8: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mchog dang po thog ma dang / tha ma dang / dbus med pa'i dam pa 'di gsungs so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags chen po dngos grub dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

283a1: bad ba chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bde ba chen po dngos grub dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro//
283a2: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po dngos grub dam pa ni bdud chen po'i stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sem
283a3: dpa' chen po rnams kyi bdud chen po'i stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dngos grub dam pa ni khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po
283a4: r nams kyi khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub dam pa ni 'di rten gyi ma sus pa na mas na gyi khams lus pa med pa yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pa'i rgyu'i phyir 'khor ba la yang chags shing brtson
283a5: 'grus che ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'di rten gyi mas mgus pa na sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa yongs su sgrub pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / mchog shin tu bde ba chen po'i
283a6: dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni// khams mchog 'dug par 'gyur ba'i tshe// de srid mtshungs med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// shes rab pha rol
283a7: phyin thabs dang // ye shes gan su bsgrubs pas ni// chos kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir// 'khor ba yongs su dag par 'gyur// chags la sogs pas 'dul na ni// 'khor ba'i bar du rtag par yang // 'jig rten sdig
283a8: byed de sbyang phyir// 'khor ba'i srid du bdag nyid 'dul// ji ltar pad ma rab dmar yang // tshod kyi nyes pas mi gos pa// de bzhin gnas pa'i nyes pa yis// 'gro phan rnams la mi gos so// 'dod chags chen po rnam

283b1: par dag/ bde ba che zhing nor che la// khams gsum dbang phyug thob pas na// sems can don rnams brtan par byed// lag na rdo rje su la la nang bar langs nas mchog dang po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i
283b2: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin re zhing 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de yid bde ba dang / bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig dngos grub kyi mchog
283b3: kyang tshe 'di la thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mchog kyang 'grub stenya rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi chen po'am de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i
283b4: bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i sngags kyi tshig nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di rnams so// oM byang chub kyi sems rdo rje// oM kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa// oM yid
283b5: bzhin gyi nor bu// oM 'gog pa med pa/ oM skye bzlog pa/ oM rnam par shes pa thams cad/ oM 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid chen po/ oM brtson 'grus kyi cho ga/ oM kun tu 'gro ba/ oM rdo rje sra ba'i sems hUM/ oM de
283b6: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad / oM ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa/ oM chos nyid shes pa rnam par dag pa/ oM de bzhin lam rnam par sbyong ga hUM oM nges par gnod mdzes rdo rje can/ phaT oM 'dod pa la 'dod chags/ oM spong
283b7: pa'i rdo rje can/ oM hUM/ thams cad 'dul ba oM hU~M oM a zhes bya ba'i sgo/ oM shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ a baM hUM oM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog/ oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
283b8: gsung rnam par dag pa/ oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje AH/ oM a/ sdig pa'i bcings pa thams cad chom shig/ ngan song gi rgyud thams cad las thar bar bar gyis shig/ oM dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje

284a1: hU~M Ta ta// sdig pa gzhom pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub dam pa rdo rje 'dzin chen po dang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje 'di
284a2: ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyi rna lam du thos par mi 'gyur ro// 'di ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyis mnyan pa'am/ yi ger bri ba'am/ yi ger 'brir gzhug pa 'am/ klog pa
284a3: 'am// 'chang ba 'am/ bsgom pa 'am/ sti stang du bya ba 'am/ ri mor bya ba 'am/ mchod par mi nus so// gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na yi ge 'bru gcig
284a4: tsam thos na yang sems can de dag ni gzhan na sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin na mtha' dag rdzogs pa lta ci spos/ lag na rdo rje gang la la dag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig gang gA'i klung gi bye
284a5: ma brgyad bcu'i bye ma snyed la bkur sti ma byas pa dang / bla mar ma byas pa dang / sti stang ma byas pa dang / mchod par ma byas pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
284a6: thos par mi nus so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang na spyod pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang gi lus la thogs sam/ glegs bsal bris te spyod pa'i gang zag de phyag bya
284a7: ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro// de skal pa bye ba mang por skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// de la btud sdig can bar chad byed par mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha gzhan rnams kyang de la srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sba ba'i phyir
284a8: rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// ya ba ma spangs pas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// mdor na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'dod pa de

284b1: dang der skye'o// de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phan yon med mod kyi ngas phyogs tsam zhig brjod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
284b2: sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
284b3: gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul brgya lnga bcu pa rdzogs s+ho//
284b4: @#// rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA g+ha ta kA ya bAkatsit+ta gu h+ya a la~M kAr b+hu ho tan tA rA dzA nA ma/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal
284b5: po// bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs kyi pad mo la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes rnal 'byor
284b6: gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes phyag rgya chen po'i dam tshig gi byin gyis brlabs kyi rdo rje'i sku chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ska dang gsung
284b7: dang thugs rdo rje ye shes rin po che chen po'i cod pan gyi rtse mo'i gtsug phud kyis dbang bskur ba brnyes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin chen po dang ldan pa de bzhin
284b8: gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes las sna tshogs pa chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes mchod pa chen po smra ba'i dam tshig gi gsang ba dang /

285a1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor chen po dam tshig gi de kho na nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes gsang ba
285a2: chen po'i snying po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes kyi mnga' bdag chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes kun tu bzang po dang /
285a3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes dpe med cing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nam mkha' lta bu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rigs dang / snying po
285a4: dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang rig pa gnyis su med par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po la dga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
285a5: cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes lhag pa'i lha'i snying po mdzes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes rgyan chen po bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po la nam mkha'i
285a6: khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje ye shes chen po 'ba' zhig thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de'ang 'di lta ste/ sgro mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang / nam mkha'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje
285a7: yum chen mo dang / a bo dza'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang / 'gyur ba med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang / gzhan yang ma lus shing lus
285a8: pa med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra ba dang mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i rdo rje btsun mo stong phrag brgyal 'dig ste/ mda'i mtshon che'i lag/ ces bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / dbang phyug la lta ba'i rim pa'i

285b1: rdo rje btsun mo dang / nye bar zhi ba'i bzhin ras shes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / gyen du lta ba'i bzhin ras zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / zla mtshan rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / brda' sprod pa ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo
285b2: dang / 'bri ba'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / rol pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / 'dod pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / dbang phyug gi bde ba'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / dmigs pa'i sgo
285b3: zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / zang las skyes zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo te/ de dag la sogs pa rdo rje btsun mo rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar to// gzhan yang dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen po
285b4: rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de yang 'di lta ste/ snying skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo dang / gdug pa thams cad 'gug pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo dang / rjes su mnyes pa zhes bya ba'i
285b5: rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo dang / khrag 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i ji rje po nya mo chen mo dang / thams cad 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo la sogs pa'o// gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas pa'i rdo rje sgo srungs ma chen mo
285b6: rnams dang yang thabs gcig ste/ de'ang 'di lta ste/ rdo rje 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srungs ma chen mo dang / dam tshig gsum ldan zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srungs ma chen mo dang / 'jig pa'i yan lag can zhes bya ba'i
285b7: rdo rje sgo bsrungs ma chen mo dang / thog ma pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srungs ma chen mo dang / gdul dkal 'dul zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srungs ma chen mo la sogs pa'o/ ga/ zhan yang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo rnams dang
285b8: yang thabs gcig ste/ de'ang 'di lta ste/ sku gsung thugs thams cad rdo rjes 'ching ba ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo dang / 'jigs pa'i me'i gdong zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo dang / gtsigs shing rnam par//

286a1: 'gyur ba'i gdong zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo dang / 'jig rten gsum 'ching ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo dang / bskal par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i la sogs pa'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo'o// gzhan yang dpe med
286a2: ba'i rdo rje rol pa mo chen po rnams dang yang thabs gcig ste/ de'ang 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje dgyes pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa mo chen mo dang / kun nas 'bebs pa zhes
286a3: ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen po dang / 'jig rten gsum rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo dang / rab dga' ba'i rdo rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo dang / thams cad dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs
286a4: pa'i rdo rje ro pa chen po la sogs pa'o// gzhan yang nam mkha'i khams thams cad rgyas par gang ba'i rdo rje'i yab rnams dang yang thabs gcig ste/ de'ang 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba'i rdo rje'i yab chen
286a5: po dang na mkha' 'gro yi rdo rje dbang phyug dang dri yi dbang phyug dang stug po bkod pa dang thaba'i dang dun bsrab dang skye bo yongs su dor ba dang / legs par sbyangs pa dang 'dod pa'i rdo rje dang / gdung pa bskyed pa dang 'dul bar byed pa
286a6: dang gdug pa thams cad sel bar byed pa dang de kho na nyid kyi mgon po dang gnas pa po dang rtse ba can dang / chos 'chad dang skyong ba po dang slob po dang 'ching ba po dang skor ba po dang de dag la sogs pa rdo rje ya nga rnams so// gzhan
286a7: yang mtha' yas pa'i rdo rje po nya mo 'phrog pa'i rdo rje bran po rdo rje'i tshogs dang thabs cig ste/ de'ang 'dis ste/ rdo rje rlung zhes bya ba dang rdo rje ma dang rdo rje mi 'khrugs pa dang rdo rje chu dang gzhan yang rdo rje rgyam po chen po bzhis
286a8: 'di lta ste/ zhi bar byed pa dang rgyas par byed pa dang dbang du byed pa dang mi shes pa thams cad zad par byed pa ste de dag la sogs pa'o// gzhan yang mchog tu rgya chen po sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rab tu gnas pa'i mchod par

286b1: ldan pa b.rom ldan 'das ston pa brtags pa mchog gi mnga' bdag ste/ kun tu bzang po'i sku yis ni// 'jig rten gsum gyi dkyil 'khor spros// bcom ldan rdor 'dzin legs par bzhugs// gsang ba brgyan gyi sbyor bas
286b2: so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskyed par byed pa'i yum gsang ba'i rdo rje 'dus pathob pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang lhan cig tu dga' ba'i bde ba rjes su byung ste 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bcom
286b3: ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags te/ rdo rje'i glu 'dis mngon par bstod nas zhu ba zhus pa/ sangs rgyas kun dor khyod phyag 'tshal/ rdo rje 'byung ba khyod la 'dud// thugs kyi rin chen mchog khyod 'dud// chos kyi blo gros khyod la
286b4: 'dud// chos rnams kun mchog khyod la 'dud// sna tshogs dgongs pa khyod la 'dud// dam tshig mchog gis mchog khyod 'dud// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal 'dud// grags pa chen po bdag bcag ni// mgon po
286b5: khyod la zhu ba zhu// sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed byed yum// dkyil 'khor gyi ni dkyil 'khor mchog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i yum rnams la 'di skad
286b6: ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum rnams de skad ma smra cig/ 'jig rten thams cad la khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po 'di la ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams dad par mi 'gyur zhing
286b7: rang gi sems yongs su sun 'byin la des ma mthong ba'i chos la ma dad pas rang gi sems yang dag par sun phyur te/ mnar med pa rnams su skyes nas bskal pa stong phrag mang por mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal rjes su
286b8: 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de rgyal la ma na mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal las grol te/ mi rnams su skyes par gyur kyang rnam par 'gyur ba'i bzhin du 'gyur ro// brjod nges pa rnams dang blo gros chung ba rnams dang khyi dang bya rog

287a1: dang byi la dang phag dang stag dang glang po che dang seng ge'i nga ro 'dra ba dag tu 'gyur ro// de dang 'dre bar mi bya zhing blta bar mi bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed pa'i yum de rnams kyis bcom ldan
287a2: 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sems can de rnams kyi mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gis 'di'i ming gzung na yongs su zad
287a3: par 'gyur ro// bsod nams de'i rgyus de'i las kyi sgrib pa zad de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi skal pa can du 'gyur ro// de nas de ngas yid dga' ba skyes nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
287a4: ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi rgyus dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyal po sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir gang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can
287a5: rnams kyis dran pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu bzang po chen po 'od 'phro ba gsal ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// rang gi sku
287a6: rang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dam pa 'di bka' stsal pa/ dkyil 'khor kun gyi yum gyur pa// stong nyid ye shes nyid du bshad// ci zhig nga yis bstan par bya/
287a7: rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs// sems can rnams la phan bzhed pa// gang zhig cung zad bstan par bya// de kun sgyu mas sgyu ma'o// 'gro ba sgyu ma lta bur shes// des na sgyu ma lta bu yis// sgyu ma lta bu'i dkyil
287a8: 'khor bya// nam mkha'i khams kyis khyab pa yi// thams cad yum gyis yang dag 'khrugs// phyi rol yang ni brtag par bya// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yum rnams kyis// dben zhing dga' ba'i gnas su ni// yid kyis legs

287b1: par 'du byas pa// nam mkha' la ni thig gis gdab// thog mar de yi dam pas so// de nas rnal 'byor chen pos thig/ gsar pa'i yum gyi dkyil 'khor ro// mu khyud dag gi rnam bdun du// kun nas yongs su bskor bar bya//
287b2: dbus kyi cha ru dkyil 'khor ni// 'khor lo lta bu bri bar bya// kun nas brgyad gnyis mdzes pa ni// dkyil 'khor bzhi yi dbus su'o// 'khor le'i lte ba'i dbus su ni// padam ze 'bru ldan pa bri// 'tshams dang 'tshams su 'dab
287b3: ma ni// ji ltar ba bzhin snyems bcas pas// srad bu lnga yis yang dag 'khrugs// srad bu bzhi yis nye bar spras// sgo bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// rta babs seng ge ngag gis brgyan// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sogs//
287b4: bla bres steng du bres pa dang / rin chen rdo rjes pad ldan sngon// dpag bsam shing gi lkug pas khyab// bum bzang rin chen ldan pa'i mchog/ rgyan phreng glang po ldan pa ni// phyi rol gnas te legs par bris// tog dang mi rtog rnam
287b5: spangs te// dkyil 'khor rgyal po'i dbus su ni// gsang ba brgyan gyi rdo rje bya// mnyam par gzhag cing spro ba yis// sems kyis bri ba nyid du bya// de nas lha mo zhal bzhim// shes rab pha rol phyin dge ba// phyag bzhi pa la sman
287b6: yangs ma// phyag gnyis kyis ni chos 'chad cing // bzhi pa'i g.yas par rdo rje ste// g.yon pa pad mas rnam par brgyan// dkar dang dmar po cher sngo ba// sngobasangs rin chen mchog mdzes 'od// gtsug na rin chen gtsug tor
287b7: gtsug rgyan cong ban dam pa can// skal pa chen po bong ldan ma// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brubs// gos kyis stod ni legs bsgribs pa// bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor 'dzum bcas shing // sna tshogs gos kyis legs gyon pa/
287b8: dbu ma'i zhal ras gser gyi 'od// zhabs gnyis dbus su 'khor lo ste// mdun na rin chen bdun gnas pa// pad ma mchog ldan ser ge'i khri// zla ba rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gdan// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'phrog/ rgyab tu nyi ma'i

288a1: dkyil 'khor ni// dpa' bo de yis bri bar bya// 'di yi mdun du bri bya ba// dpa' bo mtha' yas pa yi zhal// stong phrag du ma'i phyag ldan ma// mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par rgyan/
288a2: phyag gis rdo rje pad ma 'chang // sna tshogs phyag rgyas phyag gzhan dkrigs// gtsug ldan dar gyi cod pan can// dab rgyan pad ma'i bzhin ras ma// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la bzhugs// de 'od nyi ma lta bu'i 'od// dpa' bo'i rnal
288a3: 'byor ldan pa yi// dpa' bo des ni bri bar bya// rdo rje sems dpang bdag bsgoms te// der ni bsnyems pas 'gro bar bya// dpa' bos lhor bri bya ba// gshin rje'i 'dab ma mdzes pa la// mchog sbyin nam mkha' dge ma yang //
288a4: ran chen khri la legs par bzhugs// bzhin ras sngol spyan dkar ba// 'dzum bcas nor bu'i 'og bag can// mgul rgyan rin chen phreng ba mchog/ rkang gdub gdu bu rin po che// yid bzhin nor bu'i lag pa can// sbyin pa'i pha
288a5: rol phyin dgongs ma// de nas blo ldan rab song ste// nub tu yang ni de bzhin du// dpal dang ldan pas legs par bri// chu las skyes ma yid 'phrog ma// dmar po'i gos 'dzin dag pa ma// gtsug na cod pan gyis spras ma// sbrul rgyan
288a6: sna tshogs lus can ma// dar dang rin chen gyis klubs ma// pad ma 'byed pa'i sbyor ba yi// phyag gi lo 'dab dang ldan pas// zla ba'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs// nyi ma du ma'i snang ba can// ji ltar reg pa bri bar bya// de nas byang du
288a7: byin nas su// song te dpa' bos bri bye ba// mi g.yo bzhin ras grags chen ma// mar gda' bar ba mtshungs pa mo// dkar po'i dir gyis yang dag grubs// gtsug na nor bucod pan bzang // gtsug rgyan sna tshogs dag gis spras//
288a8: rdo rje dril bu'i lag bkram// sna tshogs rgyan dang gos ldan pas// zla ba'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs// 'od kyis bsams pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ de nas mtshams kyi 'dab ma la// me tog bdug pa dri ldan ma// rdo rje snang byed/

288b1: dag pa ma'i// mchod pa sngags rig pa yis bris// gzugs dang sgra dang ro dang reg/ rang gi bdag po'i phyogs su'o// 'dab ma 'dab mar thams cad du// gzhad dang sgeg dang dbyangs chen mo// gar gyi phyag rgya grags chen po/
288b2: sngags pas 'bad bri bar bya// pad ma las skyes 'dab ma la// thams cad du ni 'grub pa bri// sgo rnams dag ni thams cad la// sgo skyong pa'i rnam bzhi dang // phyi rol tu yang lha la sogs// ming ni yang dag bri bar bya// de nas
288b3: khrus byas byugs la lus// me tog bdug sogs kyis gdugs te// sna tshogs gos ni rab gyon la// me tog phreng dang gos gyis brgyan// gtsug phud cod pan dang ldan zhing // mdzes pa'i dar gyis yang dag klubs// rdo rje dril
288b4: bu lag par ldan// sbyor ba bzang po'i rnam bzhag gis// de nas thams cad dgug par bya// rdo rje ma mo dka' thub che// bzlog dang rnam ma'i phyag rgya yis// rdo rje sems dpal bzlas nas su// rdo rje'i sbyor bas gar bya zhing // lan
288b5: gsum du ni g.yas bskor bas// rdo rje ma mo'i dkyil 'khor rnams// dam tshig ldan pa thams cad byon// klu dbyangs kyi ni rgyal pos bskul// rang gi slob ma'i tshogs gar gyis// dregs pa yis ni g.yas dang g.yon/
288b6: bgying ba rang gi gdung bar bya// 'dir gshegs 'dir gshegs sems can don mdzad brtson pa po// ser sna mi mnga' sangs rgyas tshogs mchog mtha' dag dang // bde gshegs dam pa'i yum gyur srid pa'i byed pa po//
288b7: pha rol don mdzad dus la de ring bab pa lags// zhes so// de nas de dag rang nyid kyis// rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul bas byon// mtshan ma dag ni bzang po rnams// dkyil 'khor dag tu lta bar bya// rang ngam gzhan la 'bab
288b8: sogs pa'i// mtshan mji ltar mthong ba ni// de tshangs par ma mo ni// bder gsheg sa thugs kyi dgongs pa byon// de nas mchod yon zhabs bsil cho ga ji bzhin rab brtags te// de tshe babs pa'i sems can bsod nams

289a1: ldan la bri bar bya// gal te de ni mi smra ba na hU~M gi yi ge dang / ldan pa'i glu dbyangs can gyis yongs su bskul ba nyid du bya// de nas shes rab ldan ma bzhug/ slob ma'i gtso bo thal sbyar te// mig la mig dar gyis g.yogs
289a2: la// rab dga' bdag yin yang dag dga'// ma mo thams cad la dmigs te// der ni me tog dor bar bya// me tog gang la lhung gyur pa// ma mo de ni de yis 'grub// de nas go rims ji bzhin du// sgo skyong ba nas brtsams
289a3: nas su// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i bar// slob ma la ni bshad par bya// dam tshig thob par gyur nas su// sdom pa dag ni bzung bar bya// ma mo'i sngags dang phyag rgya ni// mnyam par gzhag pas bstan par bya// gzhan du klob
289a4: dpon blo ngan ni// nges par dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur// des kyang yang dag de 'grub cing // myur du dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur// bgegs dang log par 'dren pa 'am// rims dang gdon dang dug sogs kyis// gdungs te nad kyi rgyun
289a5: tu ni// 'chi ba ru yang 'gyur ba yin// rdo rje slob dpon smad pa na// rtag tu dmyal ba nyid du ni// rab tu rmongs pa'i slob ma 'gro// mkha' las rdo rje ji bzhin no// des na buskye dam tshig ni// khyod kyis rtag tu srung bar byos// ma mo kun
289a6: gyis sdom pa ni// theg pa chen po'i tsho gas gnas// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te// rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi yum rnams kyi dam tshig bka' stsal pa// rin chen sems kyi dam tshig gis//
289a7: rnam pa gsum ni spyad par bya// thog mtha' bar gyi sbyor ba yis// chung 'bring mchog gi dbye ba yis// de 'dra'i dam tshig yang dag pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis bka' stsal to// ji srid sems ni sbyangs kyi bar// 'bad pa yis ni
289a8: bsgom par bya// bud med thams cad mthong ba na// lan gsum du ni bskor nas kyang // spyi bos phyag ni byas nas su// lan gsum bar du gsol ba gdab// bdag gis khyod bu yin te// ji srid byang chub thob par 'gyur// byang

289b1: chu ba yan lag nu ma las// byung ma rang gi 'o mas skyongs// de nas sbyor ldan rab dge ba'i// dbang bskur ba ni sbyin par bya// gser la sogs pa'i bum pa ru// dri yi chus ni yongs bkang la// dar dang ras sogs
289b2: kyis g.yogs te// me tog chun pos mgul brgyan nas// rin chen sman gyi rab bkang ba'i// gcig lhag bcu drug bzang po la// ma mo'i snying po nyid kyis ni// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa yis// sngags shes pas ni dbang /
289b3: bskur do// slob ma zhi ba bzang po yis// thog mar zhub byas nas kyang // zhabs gnyis la ni mgos btud nas// bdag ni che ge mo rdo rje// byang chub sems ni rnams bsgoms pa'o// slob dpon zhabs kyi chu skyes la// dbang
289b4: bskur phyir ni zhu ba bgyid// skal pa chen po bdag la rtsol// slob dpon mchog tu rmad byung ba// dbang bskur rgyal ba thams cad kyis// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa// des ni bdag gis sems can rnams// don gyi dam pa
289b5: bdag gis bgyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi don bgyid pa// brtul zhugs bzang po khyod kyi drin// de nas dbang bskur sbyor ba yis// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang gnas// stob mas ye shes rdo rje yaM// go 'phang la ni bzhag nas
289b6: bum pa bzang po gcig gam ni// yang na bcu drug dag gam ni// lnga'am yang na bcu yis ni// dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bskur ro// dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun du ni// dkyil 'khor pad ma bri bar bya// pad ma 'dab ma brgyad
289b7: ba la// ge sang lte ba ldan par bri// de'i dbus su rdo rje bri// sna tshogs rdo rje 'od zer 'phreng// de'i mdun du 'khor lo bri// chen po rin chen bdun gyis bskor// lho'i phyogs su rin po che// nub tu pad ma nyid yin te// byang du rab gr-i
289b8: chen po'o// 'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs 'od zer can// grwa'i phyogs ni thams cad du// me tog gdug pa dri zhim pa// 'od ldan pa ni skal pa re// dasgo ru bzhi nyid do// phyi rol du'ang mi 'chi kun// gcig nas cig tu rgyal

290a1: sgrogs pa// bde byed gcer bu'i cha lags te// ming thos pa dang ldan pa'o// dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su ni// slob ma bsnyems dang bcas pa gzhag/ chos kyi rang bzhin gtam brjod de// de ring khyod ni rigs
290a2: su skyes// 'khor lo skur ba'i rgyal po che// rtag pa dam pa'i dbang phyug pa// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i dpal// dag pa'i dbang phyug kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje pad ma lag byin te// gnang ba bzang po rab tu sbyin// Ta
290a3: yis bya ba chen po yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi go 'phang gnas// der ni sbyor ba 'ongs nas su// gsang ba'i sdom pa sbyin par bya// 'di ni mchog tu dga' ba ste// yum rnams rab tu rmad byung ba'o// dus su 'dod pa nyid du
290a4: gyis// dam tshig mchog tu gyur pa'o// brtul zhugs bzang pos ci 'byor pas// de nas yon ni phul byas nas// slob dpon gyis ni zhabs la 'dud// ma dang chung ma bu mo dang // sring mo sring mo'i bu mo dang // bu rnams
290a5: dang ni bdag nyid dang // rgyal po longs spyod gter dang ni// nor dang 'bru dang grong shing rta// glang po rta dang ba glang sogs// ma he dang ni ma he mo// gzhan dang gzhan yang ci 'dod pa// bla ma la ni chen pos dbul// bya dang
290a6: me bya rdzas kyi mchog/ thams cad kyang ni dbul bar bya// de nas bcom ldan ma rnams la// rgyan phreng rnams dang gzhad gad dang / sgeg dang rtse 'jod ga' ba dang // rab tu dga' ba'i bde chen dang // bza' btung
290a7: bca' ba la sogs pa'i// rnam pa du ma thams cad kyis// mchod nas gshegs su gsol bar bya// sems can kun gyi don dang ni// bdag gi yang ni ches cher mdzad// bde gshegs gang du gshegs pa dang //
290a8: ma mo thams cad gshegs su gsol// shes rab ldan pas yon phul te// slob ma'i mchog dang bcas pa yis// gar byas lag pa mgor gzhag te/ rim gyis 'gyed dang 'dud par bya// de nas bzang mo rnams

290b1: mnyes te// thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i mchog/ bdag gis skal bzang stsal nas kyang // rang gi sras kyi gnas su gshegs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes
290b2: yum chen mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs s+ho// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i yum bcom ldan 'das ma rnams kyis yang gsang
290b3: 'dus pa las byung ba rang rang gi sgrub pa'i thabs rgyas pa bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces zhus so// shes rab ye shes mchog sgrub pa'i// sems dpa' chen pos gsung du gsol// thabs kyis sems can
290b4: thams cad kun// sangs rgyas byang chub 'bras thob pa// rdo rje ye shes mchog gyur pa// rdo rje'i sku ste rdo rje mchog/ dngos grub kun gyi bde ster ba// rdo rje chen pos gsung du gsol// thugs kyi rin chen ldan pa'i mchog
290b5: gzi brjid rdo rje snang ba can// sems can rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul dang // 'grub pa'i yon tan 'byung gnas gsungs// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che// rnal 'byor chen po dbang phyug che// dpa' bo'i sbyor bas gar gnas pa'i// dpa' bo
290b6: chen pos bshad du gsol// lus kun gyi ni 'bras brnyes pas// sna tshogs mkhyen pa dbang phyug che// sems can rnams kyi yab chen po// sna tshogs dam pa bshad du gsol// zhes bya bas so// de nas bcom ldan rtag
290b7: pa'i rgyal// dam pa'i dbang phyug kun mkhyen pas// gsung mchog nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i// zab mo yi ni chos bka' stsal// 'di ni bsgrub po gang yang med// dngos grub bam ni sgrub thabs kyang // thams cad rnam
290b8: bar rtog las byung // rnam rtog kyang ni dmigs ma yin// bdag med sangs rgyas rnams kyang med// chos rnams med cing chos nyid med// sbyor ba med cing sems can med// de bzhin pa dang ma yang med// byed pa med cing

291a1: skyod pa med// 'bras bu med cing rgyu yod min// longs spyod med cing za bo med// shes med gos pa po'ang med// rnam shes med cing shes bya med// brdzun min bden pa'ang sa yin pa// des na snang ba
291a2: thams cad ni// sgyu ma lta bu nyid las byung // de ltar chos rnams rnam rig pa// grol nas gos par mi 'gyur te// dngos grub chen po 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po// zab mo'i chos ni thos pa na//
291a3: mkhas pa gang zhig dang gyur na// snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs rnams// gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// sbyor ba 'di ni bcom ldan gsungs// thams cad dag par byed pa'i mchog/ gsang ba'i rgyan la legs
291a4: bzhugs na// sems can rnams la bstan pa po// de nas yus rnams kyis 'gyur te// rang byung ba la'u bzhus// grub pa'i sgrub thabs rab sbyor ba// mnga' bdag rnal 'byor rnams kyis gsungs// de nas yang bcom ldan
291a5: 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yus las kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de'i steng
291a6: du ma nyams pa// nam mkha'i mtha' klas khyab pa yis// phyogs kun du ni rab 'phro ba'o// de yi steng du gzi brjid che// dus mtha'i me dang mtshungs 'dra ba// de'i steng dus chen po// gser gyi ri bo dang mtshungs pa/
291a7: de'i steng du chur shes bya// zla ba gang ba khab 'dra// sngags pas cho ga bzhin du bsam// rin chen bzhi pi rang bzhin bzang // stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yi// dpag tshad kyi ni tshad tsam pa// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ tababs
291a8: bzhi yi rtse mo can// ri bo chen po cag brgyad pa// dbus su rdo rje'i ri bo mchog/ de'i steng du rdo rje che// kun tu phyogs pa yongs su bsgom// sngob sangs mar ga ta 'dra ba// sna tshogs 'od kyis yang dag 'khrugs// de yi

291b1: steng du rdo rje te// rtse mo lnga pa rnam par bsam// dkar po shel dang 'dra ba bo// 'od zer lnga yis rnam par spras// de'i steng du rin po che// chu skyes sngon po'i 'dab 'dra ba// sna tshogs 'od zer stong gis phreng // phyogs bcu nam mkha'
291b2: khyab pa'o// de yi gtsug tu pad ma che// nam mkha' khyab pa yi ni mchog/ lo ma stong phrag du pa can// lte ba dang ni ze 'brus dkris// de'i mdun du nyi ma che// 'od zer stong phrag du ma can// de'i steng du zla ba che// dkar po'i 'od
291b3: zer 'ab rabs bkrigs// nam mkha'i khams ni gang ba yi// gze brjid dkar po 'gro ba'o// de'i dbus sum mo thi// dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang // yongs su dag pa mkha' 'dras// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
291b4: pa so// phyag gnyis ma la thugs zhi ba// bsam gtan spyan ldan bsam gtan yid// bsam gtan mchog gi phyag rgya yi// ser mo gzhon nu rab gzhag pa// dkar po'i gos 'dzin mdzes pa mo// dkar po yi ni rgyan gyis brgyan//
291b5: ral pa'i thor tshugs cod pan bzang // gtsug gi nor bu 'od ldan pa// ye shes gdan la mnyam par gzhugs// ba spu rnams kyi rtse bug gnas// rgyal ba rab tu khros pa ste// byang chub pha rol son par mdzad// de'i thugs khar
291b6: rnams bsam pa// yi ge mchog tu mi 'gyur pa// yi ge rnams kyis yang dag dkrigs// thams cad du ni legs 'phro ba'o// sangs rgyas rnams ni mdun gnas pa// rab tu thal mo sbyar ba'o// de bzhin byang chub sems
291b7: dpa' rnams// rigs sngags khro bo'i tshogs kyang ni// chos nyan pa'i tshul du yang // dkyil 'khor du ni gzhag par bya// sgo'i phyogs ni thams cad du// sgo skyong ba ni bzhi rnams so// sbyin po la sogs ci rigs par// bcu drug
291b8: po'ang bzhag par bya// me tog bdug pa mar me che// ji lta ba bzhin gzhag par bya// lha klu de bzhin gnod sbyin dang // drin lha min dmyal las byung // 'di rnams thams cad lhun po la// kun nas yongs su bzhag par bya//

292a1: de nas me tog phreng ldan 'dug/ dri dang me tog yang dag ldan// gos dkar 'dzin pa dpal dang ldan// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyad// shes rab 'phro dang lhan cig tu// rdo rje sems dpa' rjes dran pas//
292a2: bdag dag pas ni dag par bya// shes rab sbyor bas gang gnas pas// sgo'i drung du legs 'khod ma// klu 'di yis ni spyan drang bya// thugs rje mnga' ba chos kyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas yum// rang gi yab kyi tshogs dang sras
292a3: dang bcas te byod// spyon cig skyon cig lha dang srin por bcas mchod pa'i// 'jig rten dbang phyug yang dag byang chub thugs mnga' ba// skyon cig spyon cig zugs je'i bdag nyid 'jig rten gnyen// chos kyi yi ge ba
292a4: bar gshegs pas rjes bskos pa// mkha' ltar yongs dag dri med dpa bca' dran par mdzod// ma mo rnams ni mchog gi glus bskul byon par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma byon par mthong nas// rang gis me tog
292a5: gi snyim pa dang mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dbul bar bya'o// oM bdag gi mchod yon zhabs bsil 'di// ci bde ba yang bzhes su gsol// de nas de dag lhan cig tu// 'dres pa ru ni gyur pa rabs pa// oM sarba ta thA ga
292a6: ta prad dz+nyA dz+nyA na sa ma ye hU~M sa ma ya s+t+wa~M// de nas 'di yis bstan par bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsa la sa ma ye ma tsa la tAM/ de nas 'dis mnyes par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma na san tusti sa ma ye hUM/ e h+ye hi dza e h+ye dzaHde nas
