315a3: gsang ba lta bur btsang bar bya// 'di ni rdo rje mdung mthung ste// srin po thams cad bye mar byed// 'dir ni de bzhin thod pa dang / zhags pa lugs kyu nyid dang yang // sog le dang ni gri thung ni// rdo rje thal mo'i tshogs bya//
315a4: rdo rje thal mo so sor bya// lag pa g.yas pa steng du ni// rin chen lta bur byas la gzung // sor mo thams cad spro bar bya// g.yon pa'ang de bzhin spro bar bya// de dag nye zlar shes par bya// thal mo bsgreng te shes rab dang /
315a5: las kyi rdo rje rtse mo sbyar// 'di ni las rnams thams cad kyi// sna tshogs las mchog sgrub par byed// de bzhin dgug dang zhags pa dang / thod pa rdo rje nyid yin no// de las thal mo thod pa yi// phyag rgya'i
315a6: dbus su bu ga ni// sgron ma can zhes legs bshad de// 'di ni rdo rje ngo mtshar che// zhags pa lcags kyu de bzhin du// slob dpon blo gros ldan pas shes// gzungs rnams dang ni thams cad kyi// sngar
315a7: bshad pa yi phyag rgya nyid// thod pa rdo rje'ang shes par bya// phan tshun gcig la gcig tu ni// thams cad gzungs kyi phyag rgya ru// dkyil 'khor du ni rab tu bsgrags// 'di rnams sbyor ba ji lta bar//
315a8: dkyil 'khor bzhi ni rtag par// rdo rje slob dpon gyis bya ste// phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin no// 'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor gsung // kun bzangs bdag nyid chen po pa// sems can kun mchog

315b1: las kyi mchog/ sangs rdzas mchog gtse mnga' bdag che// zhes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
315b2: nyams par zhugs nas de dag thams cad la yang dang yang dra gzigs te/ sems can gyi khams thams cad brtson 'grus zhen pa sngags pa man pa la ma par gzigs nas de rnams la bka' bsgos
315b3: dbang ba'am mo rnams kyis shod // rang rang ga na sgrub sna tshogs// de nas de rnams pags kyi mnas// rdo rje can la gsol ba ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje dkyil 'ar
315b4: bsgom par bya// de yi steng du rdo rje che/ rdo rje la ni dang po mchog/ nyi ma gser mdog dang mtshungs par// gsang sngags shes pas de bsgom bya// rang gi lus las spros nas su// rang gi rnam par bas pa
315b5: par bya// de nas sngags bdag 'grub par 'gyur// sngags kyi de nyid bdag po cher/ kun tu 'gro ba sna tshogs che// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra ba gzhan// gnyis pa'i de nyid sgom pa ni// dkyil 'khor bdang
315b6: las byung ba// dmar po'i gos la gzi brjid che// 'bar bdag ni ma dang mtshungs// rang las spro bya thams cad du// 'jig rten dbang phyug lta bur 'gyur// dkyil 'khor dbang chen gzhag par bya/ dkyil
315b7: 'khor la ni rar dge ma// dang po'i lha mdzod dang ldan// rang gi lus la nges par khyag// bsdus nas bdag dang 'dra ba'i bdag/ yid bzhin nor za'i snang bar 'gyur// rlung ga dkyil 'khor dbus son par
315b8: 'gro ba'i sgo gtan lha mon// rang las lus ldan thams cad du// ljang khu dang na ldangs ra ma// las kun sgrub pa'i dam pa yis// rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal ldan 'gyur// ma mo bzhi dang yang dag ldan/

316a1: shes rab ye shes dam pa gnas// dkyil 'khor kun gyi dam pa ru// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// kun gyi bdag po dpal dang ldan// kun bzang mnga' bdag chen por 'gyur// bsam
316a2: gtan dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// thams cad nyid ni bsgrub par bya// chos kyi yi ge yang dag sbyar// lha min bdag por bdag 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang pos bka' stsal to// gsang ba brgyan
316a3: gyi bkod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum gyi phyag rgya'i ye shes mchog gi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs s+ho// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
316a4: thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab 'khor dang bcas pa rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po la glu dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'dis gsol ba
316a5: btab pa/ thams cad khyab pa'i ye shes che// mkha' la rlung ltar cher gshegs pa// yab kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bzang // kun mchog dam pas bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du
316a6: b zang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyal po mchog rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ye shes chen po'i phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyi sku
316a7: dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rgyas pa las nges par phyung ngo // dbus su nyi ma chen po ni// hU~M yig sbyor bas bsam par bya// sor mo kun gyi rtse gnas su// sa bon lnga yi yab dgod bya// tshigs kyi
316a8: nad ni thams cad du// yi ge thams cad rnam par bsam// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dgal ni// bzang po thams cad rnam bsam bya// 'khor lo chen po phyag rgya'i tshul// lag pa g.yon par

316b1: bsams par bya// de yi dbus su shes rab che// de bzhin gzhan yang dgod par bya// de nas spro ba de nyid ni// gsang sngags 'di yis sbyar bar bya// oM pra dz+nyA pA ya ma yo yo go hU~M a/ de nas phan tshun sbyar byas nas//
316b2: rdorje rje mor rab tu gnas// rdo rje bsdams par byas nas su// rdo rje bsdams par rnam par bsam// de nas shes rab cha bsgrer ste// rtse mo cung zad bskum par bya// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug snying por 'gyur// snying khar bzhag/
316b3: na snying po 'grub// de nyid sdig pa'i sbyor ba yis// las kyi mchog tu 'gyur ba yin// de nyid snying khar bsdams pa ni/ phyag rgya chen po zhes su grags// thams cad kyis kyang mdor bsdus pa'i// las rnams thams cad
316b4: rab sgrub byed// de bzhin legs par bcang bar bya// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa gnyis// phyi yi rgyab tu bskum par bya// mkha' 'gro'i dbang phyug snying dga' ba'o// shes rab dag ni de bzhin sbyar// dam tshig ces par rab tu
316b5: grags// lhag ma rnam par spro bar bya// las kyi gnas 'khod chen por grags// stag ma rnam par slob bya// las kyi gnas 'a'o chen por grags// shes rab dag ni zum tshul gyis/ dri yo dbang phyug rab dgyes pa'o//
316b6: bzod dang brtson 'grus gdong ba gnyis// lo ma'i tshul du brkyang bar bya// dam tshig sgrub pa steng par bshad// 'di las rtse mo rnam bye bar// las kun byed pa zhes bshad de// re ba thams cad rdzogs par byed// de nyid rtse mor
316b7: snying khar sbyar// bdag nyid chen po'i phyag rgya mchog/ rgyal po mchog lha'i rgyal po ru// 'di yis myur du 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje bsdams pas shes rab mgo/ dril bu dam pa snying po mchog/ bzod dang brtson 'grus
316b8: gdod sbyar ba// dam tshig mnyam pa nyid du gnas// cung zad gdod pa bskum par bya// las byed pa yi mchog tu 'gyur// gdong ba legs par brkyang nas su// steng du shes rab rtse mo gcig/ 'di ni chen por shes bya ste/

317a1: dbang phyug thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ sna tshogs byed pa mchog gi mchog/ 'di yis myur du 'grub par 'gyur// rang gis bsdams las shes rab bsgreng // rdo rje sra ba'i chos dang ldan// gdong pa phye ste rin po che
317a2: 'di ni dam tshig ldan pa'i mchog/ de gnyis de bzhin rnam par gzhag/ sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin dge dag/ rab brkyang gzhi yi sems dpa' yi// las rnams thams cad byed par bshad// de bzhin tshul khrims pha rol
317a3: phyin// 'di ni chen po dam pa'o// bsdams las bzod dang brtson 'grus dag/ legs par brkyang ste bstod pa ni// snying po zla ba ltar bcings pa// dam tshig 'od zer 'phro ba'o// phan tshun gyi ni gdong sbyar ba// 'di ni
317a4: las byed dam pa ste// lhag ma khu tshur ltar byas pa// phyag rgya chen po zhes su 'grub// rdo rje bsdams pa legs par bcing // rtse mo'i rnam par sbyar bar bya// shes rab 'ba' zhig rtse mor bya// lhag ma dag ni de bzhin no/
317a5: lhag ma bsdams te gzhug par bya// snying po chos ni byed pa'i mchog/ khu tshur g.yon pa g.yon du bzung // rdo rje rdo rje can gyi brgyad// g.yas pa'i sbyin pa brkyang nas ni// rna ba'i rtsa bar dgug par bya// 'di ni las byed
317a6: shes bya ste// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// rdo rje bsdams pa kyang nas su// snying khar 'khor lo'i tshul du bya// g.yas pa'i rtse mo lcags kyur bya// sbyin par sbyin pa'i pha rol son// de bzhin bcing ba
317a7: legs bsdam bya// gnyis ka de bzhin lcags kyu ste// de ltar 'og ma bcug nas su// snying khar bzhag pa las rjes 'brang // de nyid dgug par sbyor ba ni// thams cad dgug pa rab tu 'grub// de bzhin sbyin pa
317a8: bskums nas su// yang dang yang du brkyang bar bya// snying khar bskor ba zhes su bshad// de nyid 'og tu bstan pa ni// dam tshig can zhes rab tu grags// rdo rje chos su bshad pa ste/ kha ru g.yo bar byed pa

317b1: mchog/ las las rnam par tshim zhes bya// las kun byed pa'i dam pa ster// lag pa bcings pa las bgrod te// shes rab mdzod du rab tu brtag/ 'di ni dam tshig cher mdzes pa// de phyir de ltar chos
317b2: mdzad do// g.yas pas rab tu bsgrims pa ni// mi snang mdzod de des ni las// rin chen pad ma ldan pa'i gdong // snying khar gzhag pa snying por 'gyur// bsdams nas go char byas nas su// bskor ba dam
317b3: tshig ces su 'dod// 'khyud pa chos ldan zhes su grags// bsnun pa las byed pa ru brjod// bsdames las nyi ma rnam par spro// bskor ba dam tshig mchog yin no// lag pa'i mtha' mchos chen po// kun sdud
317b4: las kun byed pa'o// bsdams las sbyin pa bsgreng bar bya// rtse mo gsum bya gnas mdzes pa'o// de nyid steng du bskor nas su// spros pas chos sgrub byed pa'o// rdo rje ba ru sbyar ba las// dbang bskur dam pa
317b5: sgrub par byed// de nyid steng du spro ba ni// las kun byed pa'i mchog yin no// snying khar legs bzung snying po ste// mdzod spur bzhag pa dam tshig mchog/ khar bzhag pa ni chos shes bya// las rnams thams cad
317b6: rab sgrub pa'o// 'di ni bcom ldan rdo rje can// re ba kun rdzogs mdzad pas gsungs// rdo rje bsdams pa rnam par bcings// pad ma'i rnam pa mchog tu bya// ster byed pa ni mig ltar bya// snying khar zhag pa kun mchog
317b7: 'grub// de nyid mig bzhag las yin no// gzhad pas chos de dam pa'i chos// dam tshig gsang ba'i mig yin te// pad ma'i mdzod la rab tu gnas// thal mo yang dag sbyar ba ni// snying po mchog tu rmad byung ba'o// kha ni
317b8: cung zad phye ba ni// dam tshig mchog gi mchog yin no// snying khar shin tu gsal phye ba// ma lus las ni rab tu sgrub// rdo rje'i nang du pad ma ni// chos ste mchog tu rmad byung ba'o// 'di rnams kyis ni myur 'grub ste/ sngags//

318a1: pas sngags kyis bskul bas so// de bzhin 'ching ba legs bcings te/ snying khar 'khor lo nyid du bya// 'khor lo gsum pa nyid du 'gyur// rtsibs bzhis lags brgyan chos su blta// bskor ba las kyi rdo rje'o// 'di rnams
318a2: ji lta bzhin sbyar na// grub pa'i dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje bsdams pa legs bsgreng ste// shes rab myu gu dag tu bya// sbyin pa rin chen ltar byas pa// sems dpa'i gnas su nges par sbyar/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// las rnams thams
318a3: cad rabasgrub pa'o// snying khar chos kyi dam tshig dang // snying po rig sngags legs par sbyar// de bzhin shes rab gnyis po sgreng // 'og gi 'khrug pa de bzhin no// mthe chung bzang po'i kha sbyar ba// kun god rdo rje ldan par bya// gnas ni bzhi yi sbyor
318a4: ba yis// phyag rgya bzhi ni rab tu 'grub// spyi bor las su bshad pa ste// snying khar snying po brtag par bya// bskor ba yis ni dam tshig ste// ngag gis kun bskul chos yin te// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// bcings nas shes rab da//
318a5: ni bsgred// 'od ldan dag ni rtsa bar sbyar// 'di ni dang por shes par bya// thams cad nas ni thams cad 'gro// bcings las de bzhin shes rab cig/ rtse mo mche ba gdug yid 'phrog/ de bzhin du ni 'di sbyar bas// las rnams thams//
318a6: cad rab sgrub pa'o// gsang ba'i bcing ba legs bcings te// rdo rje nang du de bzhin no// snying khar rnal 'byor pa yis sbyar// ji snyed las kyi mi bzang po// rdo rje rab brkyang mgrin par bzung // kun tu bskor ba rab tu bya/ 'di yis las rnams
318a7: thams cad na/ khyed 'gyur bsrung sogs go 'phang bzang // lag mchog bzhin rnal 'byor// rnal 'byor de nyid 'dra gyur// phyag rgya rtags dang mi rnams ni// lha rnams kun la sbyar bar bya/ 'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor che'i / dbang drug
318a8: dpal rdo rje sems gsungs// de nas de rnams legs tshim nas/ phyag 'tshal nas ni thal sbyar te// zhu ba rdo rje bla na med// dpa' bo rdo rje can la zhus// yongs su rtog pa kun spangs pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams nir gru gas pa dang

318b1: yum ni blan med// ci phyir 'di dag brtag pa lags// 'khor ba las ni legs pa yi// sangs rgyas ji sar 'byung ba lags// grong gi chos ni rten pa las// ji ltar thar pa rab tu 'grub// gang du rnal 'byor pa grol 'gyur/ gangan ci
318b2: ba rab tu gnas// gang gis rnal 'byor pa rab 'grug// gang las rnal 'byor pa zhes bgyi// gsang sngags ji ltar gsang sngags lags// snying po zhes bya'i snying po gang / phyag rgyas gang phyir phyag rgyar 'gyur// rig sngags reg pa
318b3: ltar 'gyur// ji ltar lha rnams dgug pa dang / gzhug pa rnal 'byor pa yis bgyid// rnam par grol rnams bcing ba dang / mnyes dang bskul ba de bzhin du// ji ltar gnyis su med 'gyur zhing // tsum pa 'byung ba nyid dang yang // mthong
318b4: nas rjes su chags pa dang // lag pa'i dgos pa ji snyed pas// phyag rgya ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur// gar dang glu dang cher god pa// sgeg dang smra ba ji ltar lags// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri// gtso bo ro dang reg par 'gyur//
318b5: me tog bdug pa mchog dang dri// mar me gsal ba mchog gang lags// mchod pa thams cad ji ltar 'grub// ji ltar mchod pas 'grub par 'gyur// rgyal bas zhu ba 'di dag gis// phreng ba rdo rje can la zhus zhes so// de nas
318b6: bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos zhu ba thams cad rnam par dpyod pa longs spyod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhu ba rgyas pa 'di dag phyung ngo/
318b7: shes rab yum du legs bshad de// yab ni thabs la mkhas pa'o// 'di ni bsten pa nyid kyis ni// grong las thar pa rab tu 'grub// bag chags sbyor ba dang ldan pas// gnyi ga dag ni gdon yin te// grol dang ma grol
318b8: zhes su bshad// de ni rnal 'byor pa ru rjod// gsang sngags yid du bshad pa te/ snying po yang ni de bzhin no// yid la rnam par bzhag na ni// gsang sngags mkhas pas 'grub par 'gyur// thar pa chos kyi rgya mtsho yin/ lha

319a1: rnams gang la rgyas btab pa'i// phyag rgya 'di yis 'grub 'gyur te// dngos grub bde ba blan med/ rig sngags ye shes ma lus te// rig sngags pha rol phyin par bshad// de shes pa ni 'grub 'gyur te/ grub nas
319a2: bde ba rnam pa gsum// shes rab la ni shes rab ni// gzhug dang dgug pa de bzhin no// gshegs su gsol ba btang bar shes// bcings pa brtan par byed pa'o// mnyes pa yis ni legs tshi ma yin// bskul ba 'phro ba nyid
319a3: dubashad// bsam pa gcig tu gyur pa ni// gnyis su med pa zhes su brtags// ro gcig de nyid bshad pa ni// 'jig rten pa yi lha ru brjod// tsam pa rdo rje rnal 'byor te/ rdo rje ye shes zhes su bshad// shes dang mi shes mnyam
319a4: sbyor bas// rdo rje'i ye shes zhes bshad do// shes dang mi shes mnyam sbyor bas// tsum pan zhes nges par bshad// gnas pas rtags zhes bshad pa ste// rtags ni lus zhes brjod pa yin// de yi 'khyud pa reg par shes/
319a5: chags pa mthong ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa'i 'od rnams lha mo ste// rdo rje pad ma mnyam bgrod pa'o// phyag rgya 'di las phyag rgya ste// lag pa'i dgod pa'i sbyor bas so// gar dang glu sogs rnams kyis ni// lha rnams thams cad
319a6: mnyes par 'gyur// 'di rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas rnams// mchod na dngos grub thams cad ster/ zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to// gsang brgyan gyi bkod pa'i rgyud chen po las gsang brgyan gyi
319a7: bkod pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po yongs su rdzogs s+ho// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
319a8: mchod pa dang / mchod pa'i lan dang phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan dang gar dang gar gyi lan dang glu dang glu'i lan dang sil snyan dang sil snyan gyi lan dang rnam 'gyur dang rnam 'gyur gyi lan dang dbrog pa dang dgug pa'i lan dang

319b1: brda' dang brda' lan dang bri ba dang bri ba'i lan dang blta ba dang blta ba'i lan da mtshig dad mtshig gi lan dang dkyil 'khor dang dkyil 'khor gyi lan dang gsang ba dang gsang ba'i lan dang gsang chen dang gsang chen gyi lan dang // de khor
319b2: nyid dang kho na nyid kyi lan la sogs pa rnams dang / klu'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab par gyur to// sangs rgyas sems can kun gyi don// ye shes kun don thams cad mdzad/ thams cad khyab pa sems can don/ gnyis
319b3: dang gnyis med phyag 'tshal bstod// 'di dag thams cad gsung du gsol// sgrub pa po la phan dgyes pas/ sgrub pa dngos grub dag dga' ba// gang gis dngos grub 'grub 'gyur ba// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang
319b4: pos thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la lta ba rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// me tog bdug pa dri zhim dang // gos bzang rgyan dang bza' ba dang // btung
319b5: dngaro dang sgron ma gsal// mal khri stan dag yid 'ong ba// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad mchod// yid ni bde bar gnas par byed// slob dpon rdo rje can dang ni// khyad par du ni sgrub pos bya// rgod dang sgeg dang de bzhin
319b6: glu// sil snyan gar ni rab dga' ba/ mchod pa'i lan te shin du ni/ sangs rgyas phyag rgyas 'grub par 'gyur// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri// ro dang reg pa yid 'ong ba// 'di ni mchod pa'i la du 'grub// sangs rgyas byang
319b7: chub bde ba che// phyag rgya skyes bu'i rnam pa ste// phyag rgya'i lan ni rang gzugs te// gnyis pa phyag rgya chen po ste// phyag rgya'i lan ni las bzang can// phyag rgya rang gi bdag por shes// phyag rgya'i lan ni sgrub pa po// ji srid
319b8: dbye ba stong phrag ni// dbye ba'i gzhi ru brtag par bya zhes so// gar ni gar gyi sbyor ba yis// gar gyi lan ni gar mkhan ma'o// ji srid dbye ba stong phrag kyang // dbye ba gzhi ru brtag par bya// kun du bzang po la brten nas

320a1: ji srid las kyi rjes 'brang ba'o// las kyi sbyor la yang dag brten// ji srid bzang po'i rjes 'brang ba'o// bla 'og yang dag bskyod pa yis// gar dang steng gi gar bskor ba/ rtog pa'i sbyor bas brtag par bya/
320a2: rtog pa yis ni rab tu gsung // ji lta'i sil snyan rdung spyad ni// rlung ba'i bdag nyid can gyis dkrol// de las byung ba'i sil snyan lan// bsil bas sil snyan nyid du brjod// sngags kyi yi ge'i cho ga sbyar// rdo srid las mchog
320a3: spyod yul ba// de nas sbyor bas 'thon nas su// kun du bzang por 'gro bar bya// sgrogs pas grub ces brjod pa ste// 'dren pa gsum las legs par 'byung // dbyangs rnams rnam drug shes par bya// klu'i phyag rgya zhes su
320a4: 'grub// de nas sbyor bas mthon nas su// ji srid mgo dang snying khar son// mgrin pa sna'i sbyor ba dang // mgul ba g.yo ba nyid kyis so// 'gyur bas rnam par 'gyur ba ste// len dang gtong ba'i cho ga rim// chos rnams thams
320a5: cad blang ba dang // gdon gyi tshogs rnams zlog pa ste// rnam 'gyur las ni slar yang 'dir// sems kyi rnam par rtog pa'o// ji srid las ni rjes sbyor ba// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjes su 'brang // sems dang lus kyi rnam
320a6: bsgyings pas// bdug pa thams cad zlog par bya// lag pa rkang pa'i rim pa kun// rnam 'gyur gyi ni lan yin no// dbrog pa dgug par shes bya ste// gtang bdag ni dbrog pa'i lan// dbrog pa mchog tu shes bya ba// bgegs
320a7: kyis gnas ni rab gnon pa'o// dbrog pa'i lan ni rab bzlog ste// bsdigs pa'i rkang pa'i dgod par shes// brda ni dran pa'i don du ste// phan tshun yongs su brjod pa yis// 'grub dang mi 'grub sbyor ba rnams// slob
320a8: dpon slob ma sogs pas bsgrub// brda lan lha mo rnams kyis ni// bskul dang so sor bskul ba'o// dri ba sgra dang 'dri ba ste// mthong nas 'dri ba 'dri ba'i lan// legs pa'i gzugs mthong blta ba ste// lha yi ye shes

320b1: spyod yul lo// blta ba'i lan ni de las slar// sbyor ba mchog gos sbyor ba'o// lha dang lha mo rnams kyi ni// g.yas g.yon blta ba blta ba ste// ji snyed blta ba'i sbyor ba yis// sgrub par byed pa lan yin no//
320b2: dam tshig sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bka' rtagos byas pa nyid du 'dod// gang phyir thos pa 'dzin pa yi// sgrub po lan du shes par bya// dkyil 'khor lus su bshad pa ste// ye shes lnga yis byin brlab pa'o//
320b3: dkyil 'khor lan ni lha mo rnams/ gcig tu byed pa'i dam pa'o// gsang ba sbas par bshad pa ste// gsang ba'i lan na legs sbas pa'o// gsang chen sems kyi 'du shes te// bde ba'i rnam pa rab rtogs pa'o// so sor
320b4: rtog pa lha mo dang / lha yi bde ba bde chen po// sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad kyis// gsang chen lan du brjod pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to// de nas de rnams slar
320b5: yang 'dus par gyur to// yang bcom ldan 'das la legs par bskul ba// rdo rje sems dpa' bde rab mchog/ shes rab mchog rab grol ba'o// mchod pa'i ye shes legs 'grub pa'i// gsang ba chen
320b6: po gsung du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos slar yang gsang ba chen po mchod pa cher gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
320b7: hAdz+dzaHhwA hA tA tA hA hA/ gag rig ga / gag ga/ ga rig / ra rang / ga rigag/ teta/ hetiti// na / tete/ na te te dz+nyAHte/ dzAHta// daM/ r-i ti rAtIdzAHtA ra ri ti/
320b8: te te hUM/ ri re hUM/ te dzA te te hA zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag po mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' kun gyi rje// glu yi phyag rgya rab gsal

321a1: pa'o// de nas rol mo'i phyag rgya yi// rnal 'byor chen po thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyis gsungs pa// lha dang lha mo rgyal bdag dang // gang gis myur du mtshungs 'gyur ba// oM hI b+h+yo g+h+ra
321a2: d+ha me du s+ho / 9du/ dral rul/ 9 sa su la//
321a3: 1
321a4: du maHduH du duHdu du du dr-i d+ha/ dudu h+ya dud+haH / u0f7f/ d+had+hiH// u0f7f/// d+had+hu/ d+h+wed+d+he dz+ha dz+ha/ dz+yed+ha/ dz+dza/// A yi drubs su dkrol ba dade/ lag pa'i mthil dang d
321a5: ag gis// sil snyan sbyor bas bsil bar bya/ nges par myur du rab tu 'grub/ g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba dang // chad zungs lte ba'i rim pa yis// sgeg cing dpa' bo mi sdug pa// rgod dang drag shul 'jigs
321a6: su rung / snying rje rnga dang ni sogs kyi/ nyams kyi ngo bo logs bslab pa'i// gang gis rnal 'byor can 'grub 'gyur// gar gyi dbang phyug gtso bo che// bcud ni zlab sogs mdzes pa// sha sogs bza'
321a7: ba'i dkyil 'khor dang // tsan dan la sogs byug pa dang // me tog le sogs phreng mdzes dang // bud med bzang mo'i rigs rnams kyis// dam tshig byin brlabs sbyor ba las// rdzas rnams thams cad
321a8: bsgrub par bya// phaT yig hUM dang bcas pa yis shes// bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to// sbyor ldan kun la gnas nas su// g.yas pa yi yang gar sbyor las// rdo rje bsdams pa'i sbyor
321a9: bayis// snying khar de bzhin bsgreng bar bya// yang ni gnyis pa nyid kyang ste// shes rab gang yin rdo rjer bya// skar ma lcags kyu de bzhin 'dir// 'dir ni bsnyems bcas rjes su chags// de las rdo rje'i sbyor ba sbyar// yang

321b1: dang yang du dgrol bar bya// 'di yis las rnams thams cad ni// byed 'gyur 'di la gdon mi za// de nyid snying khar khu tshur te// rdo rje gdong ba skar ma'i kha// rang gi gnas su bzhag pa ste// dbang bskur ba ni gnyis
321b2: pa'o// de nyid bsnyems pas cher bstan te// yang dang yang du yongs su bskyod// de nyid 'od zer rnam pa ru// thams cad du ni spro bar bya// de nyid kha ru bstan pa ni// rdo rje bshad par rnam par bshad// 'di rnams kyis
321b3: ni don rnams kun// mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// de nyid pad ma'i sbyor ba dang // mig gis sbyor ba gnyis pa'o// shes rab skar ma de nas bsgreng // lte bar byas pa 'khor lo can// rdo rje smra ba lce yi rtser// ro rnams
321b4: ma lus 'phrog par byed// 'di dag gis ni las rnams kun// pad ma'i 'od kyis rab tu bya// de bzhin khu tshur legs par sbyar// shes rab kyis ni snying khar bsnun// de las gnyis pa sna tshogs che// snying
321b5: khar yongs su bskor bar bya// skar ma rdo rje'i rnam pa mchog/ gzod dang gzi brjid mche ba mdzes// de nyid dam du bsdams pa ni// 'ching ba'i las ni byed pa'i mchog/ 'di rnams kyis ni thams cad
321b6: glug / phyag rgya dang ni phyag rgyal lan// g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyar ba yis// las kyi dam pa ma lus pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang pos bka' stsal pa to// de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs che/ pad
321b7: ma rin chen rdor mchog 'dzin// gsang ba rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi// dpal chen la ni zhu ba zhus/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor don phyir dang // ma mo rnams kyi don dam ni// yongs su rtog pa thams cad spangs//
321b8: sangs rgyas kun mchog dam pa'i gas // dkyil 'khor thams cad brgyan pa yis// mdzes pas bcom ldan gsung du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de dag gis gsol ba btab pa la

322a1: 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dang po dang ni gnyis pa dang / drug dang lnga dang de bzhin bcu// mdor bsdus nas ni bsgom par bya// rdo rje rin chen chu skyes las// rang gi dkyil 'khor go rim gyis//
322a2: gsang sngags 'dzin pas gnas ltar dgod// dkar dang ser po ches dmar pa// sngon po'i 'od zer srog las byung // mi can mi thog ma rba// 'od zer bzang po myur bar bya// rdo rjen pa 'byor chog la// gnas nas bsgo
322a3: bzlas pa byar// 'di ni dkyil 'khor ming yin te// dkyil 'khor rgyal ba rnams kyi rten// rten pas bsgrub po shin du yang // dus mi ring bangs steng sa 'brug/ 'di ni bcom ldan rdo rje can// kun sbyor dri ma med pa'i
322a4: gago sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che// skye dang 'chi ba 'joms pas gsungs// de nas rgyal ba thams cad dang // sbyor ba'i ma dang yum rnams ni// legs tshig rdo rje sems dpa' ni// bde ba chel legs zhes gsol//
322a5: rdo rje kun gyi bdag po gtso// sangs rgyas dbyangs kyis bstod par byas// rdo rje glu sogs sbyar ba yi// dbang bskur kun gyi mchog ldan gtso// dpal ldan sangs rgyas sangs rgyas bdag po tshul// sangs rgyas nas ni
322a6: rgyal rnams chub mdzad rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas sras po nges par mtha' dag sangs rgyas kyis// sbyor bas blo gros sbyin rnams legs par tshim mdzad pa// dpal gyi rdo rje dri med ye shes rdor// rdo rje'i ska
322a7: bas 'jig rten rab tu gsal mdzad pa// bsdus pa'i rdo rje sbyor ba ldan pas legs bton te// rdo rje'i bdag nyid ngo bor mdzad pa'i mdzes rdo rje// dpal gyi rin chen rin chen 'byung gnas rin chen sprin// rin chen
322a8: rnams la rin chen gyis dgyes rin chen mdzes// mdzes pa'i brjid ldan rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis// skye bo rnams kyi phongs dang sdig pa rnams bcom nas// dpal gyis pad ma pad ma dam pa'i bla ma pad sems

322b1: dpal// padams rab dgyes pad ma las 'khrungs pad ma yi// drabs pad ma mtha' dag nges par rgyal mdzad de// pad ma'i rigs la 'jog par mdzad pa'i pad bzang po// sna tshogs dpal ldan kun gyi bdag po sna tshogs
322b2: mkhyen// sna tshogs dbang phyugs tshogs yul gyis mgos pa// sems can rnams ni 'dul legs 'jog mdzad sna tshogs pa// ci dga' 'odod la rig pa dam pa gnang drugs zhes so// de nas de rnams kyis sla
322b3: sems can ma lus pa 'dul ba'i don du 'di skad ces bstod pa// sangs rgyas tshul khyod phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas ye shes khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas gzi brjid phyag 'tshal
322b4: 'dud// sangs rgyas dpa' bo khyod la 'dud// rdo rje khro bo'i yid las 'khrungs// sdig pa bcom pa khyod phyag 'tshal// sdig pa bsal la phyag 'tshal 'dud// phyag na rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal// gtsug na rin chen
322b5: gzi brjid can// sdug bsngal bcom pa khyod la 'dud// thams cad grub la phyag 'tshal 'dud// chos kyi dag pa khyod la 'dud// pad ma dag pa rtog pa'i phyir// 'dod chags chags pa khyod la 'dud// 'dod chagra
322b6: gral la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sna tshogs rdo rje khyod la 'dud// sna tshogs sbyong ba khyod phyag 'tshal// sna tshogs tshul can khyod la 'dud// sna tshogs bde ldan phyag 'tshal 'dud// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis
322b7: ni// chos dang ldan pa thams cad du// nyin re zhing ni bstod byed ni// bsam pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos sa
322b8: rab dang ye shes rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa

323a1: kun gyis gsang // gsang ba brgyan ces bya ba ni// sems dpa' chen po legs par zung // sems dpa' chen po ni dga' bas// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbang
323a2: phrug rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dpa' bo chen po ci gsungs pa// rang byung ye shes pha rol son// chos kun dbang phyug dpal dang ldan// 'jig rten gsum gyi sdig 'joms pas/ ji
323a3: skad gsungs bzhin snying la ni// legs bzung dri ma ye shes bzang // rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// bde ba chen po bdag gis bzung // zhes so// bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang
323a4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' yab dang yum gyi tshogs dang bcas pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta bu'i rdo rje legs par gnas pa de dag thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang sngags rjes su dran par gyur to//
323a5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang ba brgyan gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs s+ho//// rgya gar gyi mkhan po brda sprod pa chen po bde bar gshegs pa'i dpal zhes
323a6: bya ba dang / sgra skur gyi mkhas pa sgra yi gzhung lugs la blo gros dkar ba kun dga' rgyal mtshan gyis dpalas skya'i dben gnas dam par sbyar/ mda' lnga'i gtsug ldan yid kyi srub shing gi/ dregs pa'i dra ba rnam par
323a7: dral ba'i phyir/ rgyud rgyal rgya mtsho'i rgyal po ltar 'di zab 'di bsgyur la 'gal gang 'di la 'phags rnams dgongs// ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha wa he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya bA da ta/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e bam+b+ha dI ma hA shra ma NaH//
323a8: sar+b+ba pA pas+t+ra ka ra NaM ku sha la s+yo ba sar+b+ba daM/ swa tsit+ti pa rid ma nu me ta dbud d+hA nu shA sa naM//
